content: If you are able to run the game (see all the comments below), the AI is exceptionally biased against human players, and you can only play a single map without the money grab for a DLC on top of the money you already spent. This reminds me why I don't buy app store games anymore.

I paid for this app thinking I would be able to enjoy this great game but no. The keeps giving me a blank page saying it needs to further download and no matter what wifi source I'm on it. Somehow it's always unstable and won't download. I can't even get a refund 😕. Highly ticked off
App does not work. Requires an additional download that does not exist.

Multiplayer needs a turn timer. It's either a connection or player issue. Have had maybe 5 games out of 50 where players were reasonably using their time. Often times a player will have 2 cards in hand and take two minutes to pass turn.
Rigged A.I. DO NOT BUY read other comments. Can confirm AI building without resources and dice non-randomization.

Don't buy! Rip off artist! I purchased, the game said it needed a further download. I approved to download and gave access. Download fails immediate. Asked for refund, they said it's against their policy. Can't even play any part of this game. I will see if I can do something about it through Google.
Same problem as someone else posted, says I have further data to download, I click yes and then it fails to download so I can't actually play it.
Does not work. Like others are seeing, when opening it says it requires an additional download which always fails. I got a refund.
Couldn't install
Love thus game

DO NOT BUY THIS UNTIL THIS PROBLEM IS FIXED. I can't play the game, it asks to download more files when you launch it and gives me an error. Tried uninstalling, downloading on/off WiFi, nothing works. Will update this review if the problem is fixed.

I paid for the app and it will not let me into the app itself, it is asking for me do use 39.39 MB of data to download, and I say yes, and it keeps returning me to the same screen where I cannot enter the app. I want a personal refund. Do not waste your money on this app.

The game says it needs to download an update before being able to play for the first time. It seems the game devs took down the server where that update was stored. The update fails and the game won't open. This is dumb. Before pulling the plug on their private server/going out of business, they should have updated the final version of the app that didn't require updates outside of the play store system. It turned the paid app into trash.
App crashes when I try to look at stats, and regularly breaks game rules (e.g., bots can move the robber to the desert hex and then steal from adjacent player settlements)
Pixel 5, will not work. Same as other reviews, the additional download issue. Check it quickly, as google will refund you but it's gotta be quick I think.
App says more downloads are needed, but throws an error when I try to download it. Literally unplayable right now.
Wouldn't even download. Not worth your time.

Love Catan in general. Can't say I've experienced any bugs in gameplay, but the game favors the AI so strongly that it becomes completely predictable how the game is going to screw you before you even get your next turn.
I purchased the game years ago and tried to re-download today, but it won't let me download
How do I get my money back? Will not download or open. Same error message as everyone else. Absolutely terrible product.
After I bought it, wouldn't let me open the app and no refund available!! Said I needed more data, I accepted the download it offered, the download wouldn't work. Stupid waste of $5.
This taught me how to play the game and variants. It has a few bugs but they happen rarely.
Used be great, now it doesn't work at all
Very disappointed this app has trouble working on my laptop. The only thing I like about this version compared to Catan Universe is unlimited games

Worst cheating a.i I've ever seen. I went 40 turns without a resource despite having a 6 and 5. Meanwhile 2 was thrown 6 times in a row, and guess where the CPUs cities were placed? Also the CPU builds what it likes without the resources to do it, I just saw the computer build 3 ships without spending a single resource. What's the point in the game if its rigged to hell? Deleted.

This game is a total rip off. I bought a week ago and still can't get it to open and download the update. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME! everyone is right total waste of money and un playable! Also for anyone wondering I've Un installed and re installed it multiple times and tried downloading it wifi and non wifi does not work. Customer service is non existence and no help what so ever! 100% stay clear. Hope this review helps your decision. 0/5
I had uninstalled the app earlier and now I am unable to download the content at all. Has this app lost support ? Seems shady to charge 7 bucks and then disappear.
I have owned this game for 2 years, loved it. Bought a new phone and downloaded the game and now it tells me I need extra space even though my phone has lots of space.
Love this game. The app is super glitchy
Decent, but perpetually resets settings for GDPR. happens often enough to be annoying

I love this game, have beaten it multiple times. But I got a new phone and on my pixel, it won't let me open the game keeps saying I need to install update, but get an error message, is there any fix? Please help!!
Won't work! Bought it and it won't download reset my phone and all won't fully download on the pixel 5.
Waaaaaay less fun than the internet has lead me to believe, and the robber makes progress damn near impossible. Gonna try for a refund...
Won't download. I was skeptical about buying it because of the terrible reviews. What a waste of money.
Won't download the update so I cant play having just paid for it!
Won't get past download content screen on Android 11
This app won't download the additional files required for playing the base game on a Google pixel 4.
The regular game is fine. But the online play isn't accessible. It says it sends .e confirmation emails so I can log in, but the emails never arrive. Not worth the $5
Says it needs additional data but then won't download it...
After initial install ( kept screen awake) it required additio al download that fails to initialize. I wish they would fix this or make the game free and then buy once you can actually play the game.
Won't download
Doesn't download. Wish I could get my money back.
Can't download paid content or open anymore due to failed download.
Use to work bought the extras. didn't play for few months come back new phone can't even load
Mandatory update on launch that instantly fails, broken app.
Fails to download content no refunds
Sucks
Downloaded 3 separate times. Update will not download and the game is unplayable without the download.
I liked this game in the past but it's saying it needs a update but just won't do it at all. It just fails as soon as I click it to download.

DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! I never even got to open the game. Paid the $6.99 and tried to download. It says I need 33.4 mb of additional data to run. I have over 33GB of available space. and no matter what info or how many times I try I get the exact same error message - the exact one that is in a whack of reviews here. No option for refund... DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
Told me right away that I needed to download an extender for the game and wouldn't let you bypass it. Tried to download it and only gave me errors
Android 11 on Pixel 5 is unable to download update therefore app doesn't start. Neither on WiFi nor 5G. Would like to sort this out or I will have to claim for a refund.
After install app says it needs to download additional data but then stops. I paid for an app that doesn't work. Last release was April 2020 - 9 months ago, so the developer doesn't care. AVOID!
Does OK. Almost ALL of the options are locked. Seems like a pay to play scam. Interface is also odd to work and not very intuitive. The Apple version with Roman theme is far better.
App would not open or download the update. Unfortunate. Would really love to know when they fix this issue so I can try purchase again.

I paid for the app, but have been unable to play it at all because when I open the app, a screen appears saying it needs further downloading. When I click the button to approve the download, it says there's an error and to try again later. I've tried several times in the last day, and still see the same error. A complete waste of money and I want a refund.

Edit: After putting the game away for a few days and reopening it the download miraculously worked. Still shouldn't have had to deal with the issues that it appears others are having also Can't even open the game, when I try it says I need to do an additional download that won't trigger. A broken mess they shouldn't be charging for, unbelievable!
Doesn't work. I can't download it. I wish I had read the reviews from hundreds of others with the same problem.

Loved old pc version, but this version has too many bugs, for example...the ready button while playing online, I have to click like 10 times to set myself ready. No timer for users if a user is purposefully taking too much time. No basic chatting option other then lame emoji, also they expect users to pay for their in-game expansion pack after already paying for game. Pls spend more time developing fixing basic problems first before trying to milk paid users or make game free & let users decide
Bought it for $5 and it won't work. Junk.
Working again on Android 11, so now as great as always!
Paid for it and the download doesn't work
This app is garbage, DO NOT DOWNLOAD The app downloaded fine but then upon opening it asks for another download which will not work. Therefore the app itself refuses to open so you can't play at all
Get an error when loading: "a problem occurred and the download could not be completed successfully" Bummer for a game that I already threw $5 at out of the gate.

Not sure what the other reviews are experiencing, but works flawlessly on Samsung Galaxy. A few clicking glitches but nothing unrecoverable during gameplay. Fun to play with no extra micro transactions!

Spent $5 on an app that won't even open, when I click on the app a pop-up message says I need to download additional data. When I accept the download it won't download and says it's an error with my network, but it's not. The app cannot open without the download, please fix this.
Wont let me open after paying
Cannot download to my Pixel phone. Downloaded on my chrome book ok but I purchased it to play on my phone.

I had this on my device and now it won't work. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling and nothing. Would be nice to have a working mobile version.

Unbelievably slanted towards you if you're winning. 7s every other roll, knights played every time you move the robber. What's even the point? You can play for 50 turns one point away from winning and they'll find a way to make you lose.
Won't work on android

I hope this helps some people with the downloads, you cannot let your device sleep while it's loading. I don't know why but it interrupts the connection. I tried twice before and set it to download and walked away. I wa only successful when I very intentionly kept my screen awake. I haven't actually played yet so hopefully the rest of the game fairs well
Same as other said, game now stuck at download additional files. In the past it was a 5 stars game,but until fixed...

I want a refund! This game will not download the additional files necessary to run the app spice I purchased this app.

The game does not load on pixel 4 xl, Android 11. The map download at the start of the app is unable to download not on WiFi and not on 4G. Tried to remove cache, data, reinstall nothing works, would appreciate some support

I have played this before and liked the game but I'm trying to download this so I can play Catan with my family during covid and of course I'm the only one that can't get it to download! And looking at other reviews this won't be fixed anytime soon.
Game does not work. No refund possible.
Game is broken and unplayable. Can't download the new package. This costoney too.. would love a refund if it were possible.
Additional files don't download. I've reinstalled and still same problem.

Paid for app and it would not work at all. Would not even open.

Crashes, strange bugs, like the robber can get stuck and ruin the game. First introduction of Catan was in 96' and the AI and cheap tactics ruin the fun. The "easiest AI" would win by buying up all of the cards, and appear to have unlimited resources. The worst was three games in a row where it won with four victory points and one game the AI had 27 (yes 27) development cards at the end of it. Crappy AI aside it's too buggy on two Android devices and a waste of $5.
It won't download on my pixel 3a
Can't download app content on first start. Did an immediate refund. Seems this is a known, but unacknowledged issue.
Currently unplayable, will not download additional files.
My favourite app and it just stopped working said I need to download additional data. So pissed off.
Used to be ok, but haven't been able to pay in a while as the game doesn't start, same problem a lot of people having.
App worked perfectly for a long time, now prompts a download that doesn't work, so it is now unplayable which is very unfortunate considering its a paid app...
Mine works great, completed a few times, just can't play online. Love this game
This app sucks!! Play enough and you realize pattern of play. Either they let you win big or mess with dice rolls, knights and sevens to take away your big lead.
Wonderful game! But can't access multiplayer....

The app is broken. It won't download the required additional data. Can't move past this. Why pay money for a broken unplayable game? You won't, and neither should you. This seems to have been an issue for a while now and they won't fix it, so I think the developers just don't care.
I've owned this game a long time and now it can't even be opened without crashing for several months now, with no communication from the maker.
Won't even start

They took a purchased game that worked and then broke it with the 2020 update. Now they ignore the connection and file bug. At least acknowledge your app is broke so people don't waste their time and money on it. This kind of attitude will hurt the Catan brand.
This app opens after purchasing and immediately asks for more downloads,but the downloads fail every time. I'd love a refund but apparently that's not going to happen!
The app wouldn't let me sign in for multiplayer, the UI is absolutely terrible and kept randomly switching into German. Entered password, pressed login and no feedback.

I had previously been able to download the game but was unable to connect to online mode, so I got a refund from google play immediately. I reached out to the developer to ask about the online mode and they told me to clear caches on google play, google play services; that the problem is with google play and no updates have been made to Catan that would cause problems. I tried to see if their suggestion (that they got from a google play forum) would help but I can't even download the game now.

I dont normally give reviews ever. But this game is so bad that I just have to. I like playing the board game girl right? So I wanted to just play on my phone to practice. Seeing 5 dollars I thought ok this better be good. I install the game to find that the huge majority of the content is locked and an in-app purchase is needed. The campaign is also locked which is the big reason i wanted to install this game. Overall this game was not worth my time and refunded immediately
Really wanted to play. Could never get pass the download screen

A below average interpretation of the Catan board game with obvious gaps in functionality and basic logic. I only play this because of the support for multiplayer with its choice of friends or random opponents. There are some big gaps in functionality: how hard would it be to have random rolls and the ability to choose the number of players? The timeout is nonsensical, resource trading doesn't have any "cancel" option, bad behaviour is ignored - so you can quit or disconnect without penalty.
How do I change my username

I absolutely love this game, however there are some features I think would benefit the app. I would love to see a chat function! And the ability to play with just 2 people without needing a computer or an extra player. As me and my friend like battling each other both in real life and on the app. I definitely love this app rather than the universe app. Easier to use.
Paid for a game that doesn't work. I get stuck on the launch screen that asks me to download extra files, which I agree to, before it crashes. Can't even get my money back. RIP OFF!!!

I have the same issue. It requires additional storage of 39.99 MB of which I have 2+ GB, no issues with internet connection and yet it still tells me it cannot download. Please fix, for now I'm getting my refund!😡
Can't download the additional game info so something I have paid for doesn't work. Any help would be appreciated.
Bugged loop trying to download additional data

Downloaded again after resetting my phone and now all I got is the msg about needing to download additional files, I say yes, and then it says it has an issue with the connection. Can't pass from there. Any way to solve it?
Same as other people ...switch phones now can't download

I'd expect a paid for game to work but it doesn't at all . As others have said I downloaded the game then it gets stuck in a loop trying to do an extra download . Why it doesn't install everything when you purchase it is beyond me . It's not like it's a massive download . I submitted a request for a refund which has gone through . So not too bothered but thought I'd post to let people know it doesn't work .

Similar issue to other users. Open app - needs to download 39.39mb of additional data - won't download due to unstable Internet connection - asks to retry. I have uninstalled the app 3x and rebooted my phone several times with no luck.

I have played this a lot on my previous phone but after switching phones and trying to play it has been unable to launch, saying "Checking required files..... connection failed. Do you want to retry?". What failed? My internet is fine... please fix or provide a work-around and I will fix my review... currently I am unable to play. Edit: The game just got fixed, thank you!
It is my favourite game ever. No adverts its a massive plus.

4.7.4 is very buggy. Games freeze, server disconnects, and when I return players have quit or kicked me out. I Force Stop, Clear Cache, and restart and get ,"error while Handshaking" message. this is frustrating, and I usually play this to relax! Update. I decided a reinstall might help. Now on open it, hangs up at Can't connect to Network to download game files. Ugh.

Dice rolls favour AI during campaign even on med difficulty (makes for challenging game, but I do find myself swearing at the AI players). I do find I am a better player against humans now! Game does still glitch on my Samsung Tab (crashes and graphics display issues) However, is usually possible to close and restart game with scenario progress intact to players last turn. Currently unable to progress to C&K scenario 5 despite beating s4 twice. Looking for a way to report this/ find a solution?

So I've tried and tried to download the extra stuff I need to play the game and there's always an "error that occured". Wifi, mobile data. Doesn't matter. Always pops up. Fix this nonsense. I paid for it.
Settings, Custom Game, and other buttons would not load, despite waiting MINUTES. No clue why. Refunded immediately.
I can't download additional data either. Using Pixel 3XL on android 11.

Previously enjoyed this game, but upon trying to install on a new phone after a year or so away it keeps failing to download the 'additional data' it requires to run. No issue with my connection and can see others are having same issue.

App won't install properly.

Come out with a new version, break the old one people bought.

Doesn't work. Asks to download additional files, the sends a message saying it was unable to download them. Maybe doesn't work in Android 11?

It feels like during the campaign the AI is stacked against you which is what you would expect from a campaign. However multiplayer is fair game. I've been playing Catan for at least 15 years. From the reviews I've read it sounds like the people who could not beat the campaign are the only ones giving it low Stars.
Makes you think, but not too much. Relaxing, gets my mind off of life's nonsense.

Купил. Обнаружил, что для запуска игре нужно докачать обновления, а для этого ей требуется разрешить доступ к моим фото. Зачем игре доступ к моим фото? Отказал. Сделал рефанд. На этом знакомство с игрой закончилось. Очень жаль :(
Unusable. Can't download extra files after initial installation on pixel 3 XL, Android 11
UI cheats

Registration for online play is an abysmal nightmare. Once finally registered can't play with friends anyway due to "friend not available". Support for this game is non existent as questions have gone unanswered. Purchased this app months ago still have yet to be able to play a single game
Great game
I love the game, the one thing I have a problem with is online gaming, I cannot log in no matter how many registers I created.... 🤔
Can't even play a custom game without have to reload the app after every move. Can't believe I paid for this!! Please fix or I want a refund!!!!!

Buggy, cheating ai, forced to buy addon to get campaign. The cheating can really get on your nerves. As a matter of fact the cheating AI is enough to not buy it. Don't be fooled by the dice roll stats at the end. It evens it out by rolling your numbers only after placing a robber on you. And the Ai will mercilessly keep hitting you with the robber.
Stopped working as of Android 11, won't install additional required files?
Love the game. It get you thinking

I was cautious after reading reviews about AI stacked against you. Clearly the developers have heard this and incorporated a lot of post game stats showing the dice rolls were indeed random. I have only played the classic version, not paid for any of the upgrades. Playing on "easy" I win about half the time and don't notice AI playing to beat me, if anything they leave me alone more than I would expect. This app has been good practice for me. Haven't noticed any crashes.
The computer cheats.i lost a turn when puting a road down on my turn then switched to the next player before I was even done
Playing the Alchemist card consistently crashes my game.
How do you roll the dice?
wont let me update
Its fun but AI cheats a bit and i have seen dice rolls not going to correct tile. 6s are often read as 8s

While the game is beautiful and sometimes fun to play I have to say this is some of the worst AI I've ever seen. As soon as the AI detects your winning they all bombard you with the robber card to steal from you and only you. When the robber is placed on a tile. That nr will be rolled more later for extra frustration. Even early on if you have more victory points than the other AI's it will stop trading with you until they catch up to you.

Online experience has been great with friends but impossible with random players. No penalty for leaving means games will rarely be completed, with players throwing a tantrum and leaving as early as the setup phase if they don't get their desired spot.
Paying for this app and having it freeze and just not be super functional was frustrating.
Buggy, the AI gangs up and robs you, loaded dice rolls against AI, but still a lot of fun.

As others have said, the AI is horrible and ruins what would be an otherwise good rendition of a great game. But i've also noticed AI players seem to get 4 csrds from a year of plenty - anyone else spotted this?
Love the game. I wish the npc's were more difficult to beat.
What this game needs is even more GDPR notices...

I played more than 100 games, and won c. 60%, but I am fed up with how unfair the game is: 1. Dice is stacked against you, i've played games where 11 is rolled more often than 6 and 8 combined 2. It is 1v3, especially if you win 3 or more games in a row, AI players gang up on you like there is no tomorrow 3. AI can see your hand, it knows if you collected 4 victory points, and acts accordingly Long story short, if you are a true fan of Catan try it out, but ultimately it is garbage
Do much fun but graphics suck.

Why would I buy the full game just to get absolutely destroyed by the AI with absurdly lucky rolls every game. I tested this with the campaign and you'll only win an average of 1 every 10-15 games. Great for playing against other players, but not against AI.
Used to be my favourite game, but now it crashes everytime I play. Everytime the multi resource tile is rolled the game freezes

This is absolute rubbish Ai. Tactics of immediately taking your city and all your commodities as quickly as possible with you being unable to do anything about it. No random number generator. The dice are fixed in the games favour. Game is allowed to have many abilities you are unable to employ. Use a TRUE number generator and let the game take it's own chances.
No longer freezes up like it did in February install. Enjoy!
Great game

Dice rolls are very unfair (tested over 10 games) the odds of the die rolling with non of your numbers is high(even if you choose 6/8). Can't play online as it didn't even send me a registration email (tried two emails, neither received registration email) Would not recommend buying this
Working well for me
Great app. Easy to understand. Brings the board game to your phone.
I purchased an expansion pack. Uninstalled and reinstalled the game and it still says my login is invalid. Loved the game until this point. 🤷 Please fix error.

Every time I have downloaded this game I have found it to have gotten worse. I wonder first how this is possible and then whether it has been sabotaged to redirect people to Catan Universe. The dice rolls and AI are rigged. This makes the game infuriating to play. Each time I have downloaded this garbage, I have wound up deleting. Each time the duration between these two actions has shrunk. Your ratings have plummeted! Is that an insufficient clue, developers?
Game is a waste of time. Not even worth the $4.99. Controls are crappy and gameplay sucks. Dice rolls feel like they are rigged and AI definitely cheat. Uninstalled and refund has been requested.
Havent been able to play because they wont send me a code when i try to aet up an account. I love this game and would really like to play it. I pais $5 for a game i cant play.
Love the game. Can y'all fix the rotation. If i flip my phone, the game doesn't flip as well.
Every time I move the robber, it freezes my game and I have to force close. I end up set back several turns and can't finish my game.

AI is deceitful. Takes all your cards or rolls only the numbers it has on the board, leaving you without anything. AI is vengeful when you place good settlements or cities, making sure your turn was for nothing. I've seen better AI in Tiger Electronic handhelds. Can't believe I bought this game, what a crappy AI opponent. Makes playing no fun.

True to the board game. However, the AI cheats when its losing. Horrible dice luck (tested over multiple games), theft to the point you have no cards to build on your turn for 10+ rounds in a row. Ya you'll win here and there, but the AI is just awful. No human would play like that or have that luck that often. Online multiplayer might be alright assuming the dice rolls are more "fair" (random), but I never got there. Save your money if you're looking for a solid offline board game.

A lot of bugs like really bad one, sometines impossible to play at all. Some things apperaing right aginst the game rules. My oponents were able to place their settlemens right next to each other ive got kicked out of game many times for tecjical reasosn. Every time i press stats button it kicks me off the app

Buggy! When you leave a game and resume it later, autozoom is turmed on again, the annoying comments are turned on again - even though the corresponding options are displayed as "off". Lots of rules to get started. Fun once you learn a few strategies.
Ok problems fixed after being unplayable in March 2020. Previous review: If you like strategy and random play then you'll realize this is the best there is.
Awesome boardgame. This app has been great for years. No issues. It's nice to play with friends across the country.

I have played the board game enough that I understand the rules; otherwise I am not sure this app explains how to play very well. Beyond that game play feels intuitive and it is easy to control. The game will keep stats on most things so you can see that over time the dice rolls, etc. are fair. There is a good variety of computer opponents (though on-line play would be a sure improvement!)  I don't know the board game versions of the expansions so I have not gone for the IAP yet; the standard game is varied enough that I have been happy as is.  Games take about 30 minutes (you can save, of course).
Lots of crashes especially when playing with someone on iPad.
need a timer this game is just a loss of time.
Why doesn't the game sync with my new device? I lost all my progress from my old device!
The game is solid, occasionally buggy (trying to access my stats through the scroll causes the game to crash, for example) but the bots are mostly solid and multiplayer works well.
Didn't even work for me

If the board game is mainly waiting and being angry, this app version is ten times worse. AI needs a lot of improvement. Interface is slow and inconvenient. Trades are buggy. Single player is insanely slow and there's no way to fast forward the AI's turns.

Visually this game is great. It runs well on multiple mobile devices. The strategy is fun and immersive. However, the game gets one star due to when you play against AI, it's not a 1v1v1v1, it is a 1v1 where the AI all work together against the human player. It plays like you, the player, get one turn and your opponent, the AI, gets three. How can you win like that? The dice rolls are always in favor of the AI.
Perfect

unable to play. Game keeps kicking people offline and crashing.

Since the new update I have started having more issue with things like the game stalling/freezing on a movement of the robber, and sometimes collecting two resources from discovering a chest. Requires a restart when that happens. Otherwise a fantastic game.

Would love to rate this higher but can't. Catan is an incredible game. I've paid for this on 2 accounts. This app works MOSTLY correctly but some details are not right. For example, I have this installed on 4 devices. Only one of those will handle Harbormaster correctly. On the other devices, using the same APK version Harbormaster is never awarded no matter how many Settlements or Cities are built on Harbors. Also, the dice rolls consistently avoid common numbers. I know that this is statistically possible (Craps is one of my favorite Casino games) but it happens nearly every game. How often can an entire Catan game have either a 6 or 8 completely avoided. It seems that happens every time I play. Love Catan but Fix Harbormaster and fix the number randomization.
Catan of the phone!... Mental
ALWAYA CRASHES AND NEVER WORKS! I can't login in at a despite paying money for this app. Don't waste your time or money its crappy and legit never works

Possibly one of the most frustrating games while also being immensely fun. There game has loaded dice when playing the computer. If the player get ahead, the numbers role un-mathematically and play to the computer's adv. The game play becomes vindicative - The system begins to limit the player's ability to play by unusual dice rolls and incessant robber moves. It's still fun but lacks the reality of a boardgame. It's ok.

Playing this game for years. The online version is VERY slow and kicks you off mid-game often. I really like the multiplayer and the AMIs are intelligent enough to make the game as challenging as you want it.

I hate how gaming is less about reading the developers description and more about reading reviews calling out the developers so often. In this case the reviews are right. I try to ignore negative reviews so I can offer my own opinion, but the reviewers are the ones paying $. This does not deliver..

I've had this app for a couple years and play it frequently. I love that you can play offline (great for airplane mode) and there are enough free-bie boards to keep variety. In general play is faithful to board game. Computer AI is a little predictable, and I'm not really sure any bots are very different from one another. Ive had problems since April 2020 updates. Bugs crash the game when a gold mine space is rolled in game. I also am frustrated that random boards are not really.
Great experience. Absolutely flawless playing multiplayer with friends.

Deeply disappointed with this app. For a game that you pay for, you expect a certain level of quality and user experience. What you get is tons of bugs, app crashes, and poor usability. Online is near unplayable due to it being difficult to navigate, limited communication options, and old game design. The boardgame Catan has the potential to be a great app, though this version fails to deliver. With the money they generate from purchases, surely they can invest in fixing this disaster.
BEST GAME EVERRRRRRRRRR!!! I do not know why there is so many bad reviews.. I have had no problems, in the past 7 months that I purchased this game. Good and luck and have fun everyone!

I play this game all the time. However, it is super frustrating when you can just tell the game is stacked against you. AI players go out of their way to take from you even if you are last. The game obviously knows when you have 7 or more cards and will for sure roll a 7 on your turn to make you discard. One time, I lost nearly 20 cards to robber and monopoly in a span of 3 turns. But overall, it's a decent game, but you are definitely punished for being in the lead.

replyContent: Hi Laura, the latest version 4.6.8 of Catan Classic for Android tablets includes an error that causes in-app purchases to be incorrectly displayed as 'locked' - without any option to restore them. We’ve already identified the reason why this happens, and will provide an update as soon as possible to fix this error. We sincerely apologize.

Unbalanced Rubber Band Physics. I love Catan the board game but this is just junk. Rolls favor the AI to the extent it's impossible to win. You can get out ahead but once you do, in the late game you'll get 2-3 resources a round, I didnt have any 8s and I watched it hit 8 four rounds in a row. Then all of a sudden they go from down by 8 to winning placing a road and a settlement each round, and drawing two victory points. Played this game for hours and won 2. Garbage!

The game is fine, enjoyable for the most part. People do complain that the game is fixed, and it is a little. The computer will team up against you, even when you are losing or there are better options, and rolling 7's seems to affect you more than the computers. Even the roll of the dice, but it's not to over the top, and it's not every game. You can always just restart the game if it is way over the top.

content: This is a solid and good game for single player. The dice are not rigged. The fact is, they show people the distribution of random rolls. Because of this, everyone assumes it's cheating because it doesn't match the bell curve. There are varying degrees of AI depending on who you play against. They are all beatable. This interface is less tedious and easier to use than Catan Universe at a fraction of the price. Multiplayer over the internet needs some work, but I've played good games there.

content: Updated: The online version doesn't work. I paid for this app, but even if you're able to register, the online version wont start. Disapointing Second problem has to do with the game fairness. I played over 200 games at "Hard" level and it's very difficult to win. Not because the robots are "smart", but because the dices distribution changes. the probability of getting a 2 on each dice is around 3%. the probablility of gettting three consecutive 2 is 0.01%. However, you'll see that happening a lot if you play against the computer. Suddenly you're leading by 5 points and the dices roll are highly biased towards the computer and then you finally loose. The developpers of this game clearly took a shortcut to make this level "hard", which brings out the fun of the game. Conclusion: Very fun game in real, but the app has serious flaws that makes it not enjoyable.

my fave board game in app but AI is predictable. Numbers where the AIs have hexes get more dice hits (like if 2 AIs have hexes w 2, 2 will likely be the dice roll result than a 5, which is a higher probability number). When an AI puts the robber on the non-AI player's hex, the next dice roll will be the number of that hex. If a non-AI player gets a higher score, dice rolls for thr next few rounds will not go their way. It's super frustrating. Because the algorithm is built for AI wins.

the game itself is fun as a catan fan. works well in Android. Fixed RNG is total garbage. Have the lead in points? it's a lock you will get wedding cards saboteur or other cards that are useless. no wheat to remove the robber? it will take 100 dice rolls to get a seven. then the very next roll after will be a seven to put the robber back. ai is predictable and dumb. so the only way to lose is for the game to cheat with RNG. very frustrating in this way

replyContent:
Hi Kirstyn Scott , please try the following: 

Go to your phone's Settings menu.
Scroll down to Display.
Tap on Change screen resolution.
Choose a smaller resolution
Start the App again 

We are actively working on a solution for the issue but this is a quick workaround.

Look through comments. Designers deny it, but a lot of people have noticed. Opponents teaming up is a part of the game. My problem is the OBVIOUSLY unfair random dice generator. When you get a little ahead, you will notice A) only your opponents resources get rolled, and B) everyone else at the board will roll LOTs of 7s. Example: all 3 opponents roll 7 and steal from you, then you roll a number you don't have, then all 3 opponents roll 7s again.

Should be disclaimers that initially you are playing for only about 15% of the actual game. RNG biased towards AI; an incredible streak of 2s or 3s when it favors them, rolling a seven as soon as you move the knight to their spot but never when they have more than 7. And trading with AI is broken. AI will trade anything to each other but will never trade you anything you need to build.

replyContent: Hi Merey, thanks for your feedback. Regarding the RNG or pseudo RNG please note it is absolutely possible for one game (let´s say 50 rolls) that distribution differs from the normal distribution due to the limited sample. If you prefer the normal distribution for your games check out the different dice modes before setting up a custom game.

While the die rolling is hardly "random", there is an option to play with a simulation of a stack of cards representing all 36 die rolls, making the distribution of numbers rolled more representative of actual probability. You'd think this would make it more balanced, except my last game with this option had more 5's "rolled" than 6's, by a margin that couldn't be chalked up to random draw. So if you want to play Catan, I'd recommend you do it with friends at an actual board instead of this racket.

Игра (сама игра, а не это приложение) очень привязчивая, не даром у нее столько поклонников. Так как это, по сути, единственное приложение с этой игрой на Андроиде, то поклонникам приходится играть именно в это приложение и тут масса проблем. 1. Игра дико греет телефон и сажает батарею. Так не делает ни одно другое приложение. Ощущение, что вся мощь процессора задествована в этой игре. То ли создатели игры майнят криптовалюты, то ли используют мощности телефона для облачных вычислений - по другому объяснить это нельзя. Даже 3D-игры с крутой графикой так себя не ведут. 2) Разбалонсированный генератор "случайных" бросков кубика. Я сыграл достаточно большое количество игр и статистика выпадения чисел далека от нормального распределения. К примеру, 4 и 10 выпадают в два раза чаще, чем 5 и 9, чего быть не должно. 3) Раздражает откровенная игра против меня на сильном уровне сложности. В этом случае все игроки и компьютер объединяются против - разбойник практически не слезает именно с моих карт, а в половине случаев после попадания разбойника на мою карту, на кубиках тут же выпадает число именно этой карты, что чисто теоретически не возможно.

content:
Love this game. For the best challenge it's best played with 3 AI players 
on the hardest setting, with the points turned up to the maximum, and in 
settings making it turbo and removing the annoying zoom feature. I'd like 
the option of further increasing the points required to win, as this I find 
can be pushed further. To the person who thought trades being ignored was a 
bug... Well it isn't. It's just the AI player opting to trade strategically 
with another competitor when the offer is the same.

Kudos to the developers for fixing the error that removed previous 
purchases so fast. I wasn't able to play for a couple of days and I missed 
it so much! That's because the game is awesome and will always be my 
favorite. Worth every penny and more.

content: I want my money back! This is garbage.
I can't play online...

I really enjoyed this game, but had only played the board game once before 
with friends. I was looking for something to play with my wife and daughter 
while on a trip a couple time zones away, so I was very interested in the 
comments about playing online, specifically against them. Based on the 
comments, I was unsure, and so I emailed the developer. They replied the 
next morning, and gave me clear and concise instructions on how to do this. 
I think it works great! We had a three-way phone call going on in the 
background so that we could talk to each other while playing. Sometimes, we 
added a computer opponent just to have a fourth player. I also played some 
games by myself against computer opponents. I'm no statistician, but didn't 
really notice any unfair "dice loading", but maybe as I play it longer I 
will. I noticed some options for how the rolls are culled, but didn't 
investigate it yet. Only negative, was that in the middle of a game, the 
language changed automatically. Not sure how, but I fumbled around and 
changed it back. Oh, and I wasn't able to play a computer opponent game on 
the airplane (didn't want to pay for wifi). Other than these two minor 
items, I rate it as 5 stars. Oh, and the fact that it was part of the 
family library is fantastic! That was one of the biggest selling points for 
me.

The robber feature is heavily weighted to hit you any time you build up 
resources the trade table against bots awful.. more random rolls without 
robber hitting would be nice I hit robber 4 times bots zero..each time I'm 
about to build..no adjust avail in setting for robber either, only $5 but 
guess a different purchase would have been better

I keep running into a bug that the NPCs target me with the robber multiple 
times around. I keep losing resources to them and have less than the 
previous turn. I am stuck like this until the end of the game when one of 
the NPCs win.

I don't understand why the AI cheats, if I don't have an 8, it throws 8's, 
if I don't have 6's it throws 6's. Frustrating, how about updating?

No fun. It cheats too much. Set to use the deck so numbers come out evenly. 
My primaries are 8 and 9. So far only 4 of each. But 10 7s (with 7 robbers 
on me), 9 6s, 7 5s, 5 4s, 5 10s, 5 3s, 3 11s, 12...

content:
Would have rated better but I can't see the point of playing a game that

The game is very fun to play. But, as some others have mentioned, the dice 
rolls seem to favor the AI when I'm doing well...

The game CHEATS! The AI was able to build a road on their first turn when, 
based on the rules, it was impossible for it to have any brick.

This game's idea of a more difficult setting is making the dice rolls way 
out of your favor, rather then making the AIs better. I can not tell you 
how f'ing annoying it is to play an entire game controlling the #6 tile and 
yet not a single 6 rolled. That is just one example, but it really just 
gets absurd. I love Settlers, but this is just annoying. Lazy programming. 
I promise you, you'll spend more time pulling your hair out and wanting to 
throw your phone than you will enjoying this game, because the impossible 
dice statistics will drive you crazy.

Add chat option in game for informing people to end their turn and custom 
search. Rest game is great

Apparently any idiot can make a game like this... And the guineses that

drawing boards geeks...
You know there is something wrong when they roll 12s and 2s more than 8s

if you want to learn the rules of Catan and be discouraged from ever 
playing it.

The bots seem to steal from the player 90% of the time, so the single

Don't buy it. It will heat your phone up to the point where it will degrade

content: Very fun

Catan player in board game and tablet form here. Played all the scenarios a 
year and bit ago on iOS. Recently got around to getting this and all 
expansions again on my new android tablet. On reading the reviews here, I 
am glad I am not going mad. That they HAVE changed the computer player 
difficulties. However I am finding them very much easier... I absolutely 
FLEW through ALL scenarios, winning by a mile, each and every scenario.. 
first time.. which was so disheartening. Not at all a challenge!! Like it 
should be, as catan is a challenging, brain busting game. Moving through 
the playable boards, in custom game mode. When changing computer player, 
moving up their difficulty levels with each scenario... the same. They are 
a whole lot easier to play and win against... which is NOT good. Catan is 
so amazing because of the complexities. The fact you need to use your brain 
and strategise. Change it up when things don't go to plan, finding a new 
plan and way to win! This is missing here now. As it's so much easier to 
win! To the utter detriment of the game. The last time I played this, it 
took me MANY MONTHS to work through all the scenarios, then each custom 
game with every player combo. Not this time... mere weeks! Then the dice 
thing... playing on normal dice settings it is LESS RANDOM than it should 
be and used to be. I think you've mucked this up too? Seeing this mentioned 
in many other reviews. Die rolls skewed against player... but. With how 
much easier the computer players are. I suppose this evens it up and makes 
it harder this way. Not the right way to go about it though! Skewed,non 
random dice rolling is just infuriating. And is CHEATING. And as a huge 
board game lover my entire life, I cannot abide cheaters. This truly is a 
major deal with this game. If you don't fix the AI at LEAST give the 
options for properly random dice again! Even if it's in a changeable 
setting option for the player... BUG ALERT --- Also during a game you need 
to regularly exit your game then re-enter it. Due to losing visuals. Like 
when you hit to see your cards, it's blank. You can't see anything when you 
do have cards. Or when go to build a knight, half of the visuals on that 
screen are just gone. And game exit and entering again is the only way to 
solve it. This needs fixed. I'm not the only one to mention this issue too. 
I never play online due to the game throwers when they aren't winning. 
Makes it all a giant waste of time!! Rankings are needed to help stop this, 
and make it actually playable. I long to Play online! But throwers are 
cheaters... And I've mentioned how I feel about cheaters 😃 4/5 STARS 
despite the issues... it's still good! But ... it used to be 5/5 and hands 
down the best game on tablet for me for years! Please please please listen 
to us, the loyal Catan fan base.
Highly addictive and fun game, do note that as difficulty increases, ai cheats more as do the rolls.

replyContent: Hi Nate, please contact our support team via android@usm.de to get some help with the registration.

content: Super fun, play all the time. Still having issues with glitches but it's usually just when loading the game.  More scenarios please!

Mediocre. I am a big fan of this game, actually I played it for years with my friends on  Sundays. Sorry to say that the distribution of the dice is very far from being random as it should. I had a game with more 3's and 9's than 8's. Another with plenty of 2's and 12's but almost no 5's. I played a few times the same board just to test my theory and I was right: the distribution was not completly random, it is somehow board-dependent. I also suspect that it has something to do with the hex that's being held by the robber. The minute the robber is on 6, 6 is the most likely to come. I had my wins and my share of losing, I do not make a big fuss about this but it's just unfair and unfortunately it spoils the game experience. My real board-game experience with this game has almost nothing to do with this app... and I also have all the extensions ;-)
I love this game. My heart will always belong to the board game but this is fun also.

Uninstalled game today. I have the full version and have been playing for a couple years now and I can honestly say that despite the developers claims, the dice rolls are not random and the AI is diabolical and will make you hate this game. 7 comes up way more than it should, to the point where you will do nothing for multiple turns in a row while you rarely get resources and the AI regularly steals what little you do get. Whatever number the AI is on and you're not will come up more often, even outpacing 6 and 8 in favor of 3,4 and 11. The random die and stack don't have any real difference either, with the stack regularly pulling way more of a few numbers than any other, typically picking digits that the AI is on. Development and progress cards are even skewed, with the AI seeing more Knights and Monopoly while you get drowned in Road Building and Victory Point cards. AI also hoards dev cards and will even make 4-to-1 trades or use Year of Plenty purely for the purpose of buying another dev card. Unless you go out of your way to completely deny the AI access to the resources to buy dev cards, they will eat the entire stack 2/3 of the way through every game - And that's with only TWO AI vs a human opponent. I have never played a physical Catan game with real people where we ran out of dev cards, even with 6 players! Cities and Knights is no better, even if you keep up the same level tech upgrades as the AI, you will see the AI receiving way more of Spy, Bishop and Resource Monopoly while you continue to get Road Building, Inventor and Smith. If you somehow manage to get lucky and score an Alchemist or something useful, rest assured the AI will probably steal it from you. And once you have a steady lead, be prepared to start getting Saboteur and Wedding, now that they are completely useless to you. Don't believe me? Skim through the other reviews and you will see I'm not the only player reporting these issues. Its not random if multiple people are calling out the same behavior, because that's called a PATTERN.
replyContent: Hi Anna, thanks for having played over 100 games with our app. That is impressive! Please note that you can receive development cards like Spy, Bishop and Saboteur when developing your city in the politics section (blue). Roadbuilding and Inventor are cards from the science section (green). The other issues we can gladly discuss via android@usm.de

content: Still an all time favorite.
Too buggy to play. When you switch screens then go back I just get a black screen. Makes it impossible to complete a game if you need to check emails etc along the way. Useless.

The main drawback of this game is still multiplayer play. It would be nice if it were easier to choose the multiplayer game they are going to join. If you choose the quick option, it takes a while to find the game and then when it loads you either accept or reject, and if you reject you were taking all the way back to the main menu. It would be much better if upon rejecting you were immediately shown another choice.   Also it should be possible to boot people on the screen where you confirm that you are ready to play. If two people drop out in the middle of a game, one of them times out and then you get taken back to that screen which announces they have timed out. But if the other person never presses that they are ready to play, the game can never continue. So if two people leave at once, the game is impossible to complete. That has happened to me twice this week.   If you guys are ever updating the intelligence of the AI, I would make them respond with greater variation to deals that offer two resources or three resources for one. Generally, it seems like they accept or reject the deal regardless of how many cards you are offering them for the card you want. Real players may change their mind when the number of cards is increased. In Cities and Knights, AI does sometimes change its mind if it is offered a commodity instead of a resource, but being persuaded by multiple resources is a different thing.

Setting the difficulty above easy doesn't make the AI better players, it just makes the dice rolls absurd and the AI players target the human players from the start. As a one player game, it isn't even fun. In fact, it's laughable. The dice rolls are so predictable it will make you laugh out loud when every time the robber is placed on your tile- and I do mean every time- and the next dice roll is that same number. Every. Time.  And it doesn't really matter how you play, the dice eill be skewed against you. I've played literally hundreds of single player games... hundreds... And the number of times I DIDN'T finish last in total resources collected can be counted on one hand. No exaggeration.  That's just lazy programming. And that defines Catan for Android.  Do.not.spend.cash.on.it

content: I love this board game, but this app ruined it for me.  Rather than program an effective, strategy based AI, the devs clearly designed the game to cheat.  The dice rolls are not random, and favor the AI.  If you are playing against multiple AI opponents, they work together to beat you the way human opponents wouldn't.   There is an in-app chart that shows what numbers are thrown, but it neglects to point out all the times the dice roll your numbers right after the AI places the baron on it, as if the app is specifically designed to gaslight you.  Even in the games you win, every opponent earns more resources than you in every game; the only reason the AI doesn't win every single game is because it spams development cards, and it rolls so many 7s that it loses a lot of resourses.  The AI isn't written to play like a human being.  It's written to be a pain in the ass. If I played the physical boardgame against human opponents who played like this, every game would end in a fist fight.  I am sorry I paid for this app.  Spend your money elsewhere.

How hard can it be, this is not a graphically intensive or super complicated game, AI is not that clever, gameplay has hardly changed in years and yet..buggy buggy buggy (LG G2, iPad mini, Samsung A3, Moto G4plus)

Bs rng

The RNG tilt that occurs when you take the lead is absolutely ridiculous. The dice statistics page is deceptive because it only shows you total rolls for each number, but not how it influences the game. From my experiments I believe the dice works like so:  Before each dice roll, the correct probability of each number is computed. This depends on if you use normal, stack, or stack 5. Then, dice rolls that allow strong moves for and against the human player are identified and their probabilities are weighted, depending on the human player's progress towards winning the game. For example, your chance of producing ore will tremendously decrease if you hold 2 grain, 2 ore, and have a 2 victory point lead.  This system is clearly designed to make games more "interesting" by throwing freebees to losing players and slowing down winning players, but it reduces the game to a Las Vegas-style slot machine and ruins the entire app.  "My  great uncle Theoderich would have cut the programmer's hands off immediately!" - Sir Sean

I've had this installed on various phones for several years and up until now I've loved it. Today I finally uninstalled it in anger, frustrated by the dice rigging.

I was bummed to find out after paying five bucks for this game, that you have to spend more money on any of the expansions to play any campaigns. In the base $5 game you can play random games or online games, but all the campaigns are locked until you pay for more expansions.

The games dice a rigged. The game either makes the game too easy for you or screws you with every night placement and dice role. Certain characters (usually winning ai) role 7s constantly moving from themselves to you. Then it roles the number several times while its blocked. Its bunk, and doesnt seem to have any randomness.

This game SUCKS. Lucky if you win once out of every 25 games!!!😠 U love a challenge, but 4% success rate?!? Don't waste your time... Or your$. Play the board game w/ friends. This game is nothing like the fun of the original.

content: GAME CHEATS!  When set to 'hard', the bots don't play better, they just become prescient about upcoming dice rolls.  I don't mind them playing as one team, I don't even mind the fact that they always know the exact resources at my disposal, but their apparent ability to accurately and consistently predict the next dice roll would be terrifying in a human opponent.  Watching one player bot play a knight (robbing me), roll a seven (robbing me again) AND THEN PLAYING A SECOND DEVELOPMENT CARD, USUALLY ANOTHER KNIGHT (letting each bot take three resources from me in one turn) not only explicitly breaks two rules but gets tired when repeated three times in one round.  It happens with greater regularity than seems likely for a coding error.  Why is seven the FOURTH most common dice totals with well over 6,000 rolls?  Also, I've seen four consecutive rolls boxcars and snake eyes occur several times, usually when all development cards are gone.  Why does the plot of dice rolls look less like a bell curve and more like the second IF coming off of an old-style NTSC television tuner?
If I could only log into the app... And I could find no other way of letting you know. However, disappointing... Especially since I rushed to pay for it...
replyContent: Hi Andrei, thanks for letting us know about the login issue. If you need support with this issue (or any other related to the Catan app), please send an email to our support team via android@usm.de. We are sure that we can help you resolve the reported issues.

content: Much improved again, but still battery hungry.

When you do return, the move you made has been reset. Don't even bother to buy Development Cards as you cannot use them, because the same thing happens as described above. Last, but certainly not least, the game's RNG is complete trash. The roles will all be near the NPC settlements and if during the NPC phase, if you have more than seven (7) resources, a seven (7) will be rolled before your turn... guaranteed every single time. Complete waste of money. If only I knew a way to get refunded, I would in a heartbeat.

content: Really plays the game well. The only thing that I wish I could change is the robber. There are times when he is just taking and taking and taking from me. In a real game, you can sometimes bargain with your friends LOL! I wish that I could turn off the robber but that you would still lose resources when you roll a 7 if you have eight or more resources. But stealing from each other is sometimes really exhausting. I can go rounds and rounds without any supplies on my turn because the robot players are just stealing from me and they seem to always roll a 7.

The perfect way to RUIN a great board game.  The AI is horribly written and cheats constantly.  The rng is a joke and heavily favors the AI opponents. The amount of times the AI moves the robber onto your tile and follows it up with a roll for the tile that was just covered is an astronomical impossibility in reality. This app is not fun, it is frustrating. I love the board game and thus purchased this app and the expansions without reading the reviews.  I urge you not to make my mistake and take a pass on this app.
replyContent: Hi Jesus J., the AI will "attack" the player in in the lead using the robber. Also you mostly want to block high value. The AI will to do the same. Have you checked out our alternative dice modes? These will ensure a more statistical equal distribution of dice rolls the rng can´t produce giving the small sample of just about 50 rolls in one match.

content: There are many rules in this that are different from the actual game rules. I don't really understand how these mistakes were made, but they make significant changes to gameplay. Fun game, but it's just not the same.  The robber should not be allowed to be moved between two tiles of the same number i.e. tile 6 to tile 6.  In the cities and knights expansion, development cards are included in hand size, and it should only consist of resources and commodities.  Starting settlements should not be allowed to be place on a port. They can be placed on coastlines, but not ports.  I'm not sure if this one is just a stream of bad luck or if it's actually programmed, but victory point cards shouldn't be visible to the AI. As far as I can tell, the AI will target the winning player with the robber, and if I'm tied then get a victory point card, I get targeted with the robber. This shouldn't happen because victory point cards are supposed to remain facedown until the end of the game, therefore, the AI should think I'm still tied.  This is all i could think of right now, though i feel like there are a couple I'm forgetting. Somewhat minor things, but like I said, it causes some large changes to gameplay.
replyContent: Hi Zach, maybe you are reffering to rulsets of older versions of Catan but i can assure you all rules implemented are according to the lastes edition and approved by the Catan GmbH.  Apart from that: The AI has no knowlage of your  VP cards when you  play a game with the basegame ruleset

Developers, can you please improve the AI. It's OK for players to gang up but not acceptable for rigged dice roles. I have been checking the dice stats and the dice always roll in Favourite of AI players at the start of the game. I had some games where I had control over the tiles 6 and 8 but the computer had most around tile 5. For the first 25 rolls the number 5 was thrown 16 times, 6 thrown zero times and 8 thrown 3 times. This has been consistent across most games. Creates a challenge to beat cheats that rig the dice and I have to huddle around their land in order to ensure getting dice hits. I also had one game where the number 7 was rolled 6 times in a row when the AI was needing resources from me. Some of this will just be coincidence but the probability of some of the rolls are just impossible.

content: It's a fun and addicting game, a must for any Catan addict. HOWEVER, this app has many problems and lots of ways it should be improved. content: I haven't noticed any glitches. The robber is ridiculous. I counted 11 times a 7 got rolled and got moved between my properties. Even when I had zero resources to steal. Use it to play online with friends

This online version of Catan is not as fun as playing with friends and family, but it is a lot more convenient to play. Sure, the AI is not very good, but with this version, you can play anywhere, anytime. Add the five dollar price (which is practically nothing compared to the board game) and this is a must have for Catan fans. Also, while I do think that the AI needs improvement, the problem that I have with the AI is not what other people have been saying. From what I have seen, the dice rolls are not rigged and the AI does not cheat. Also, while the AI players do often team up on you, it is only because you are ahe ad of them in victory points. The problem that I have with the AI is that it is nearly impossible to get them to trade with you. Hopefully, the developers will fix this.

content: Would be nice if the interface allowed the adding of buddies... As it stands, this UI, and by association this app, is 100% useless and unplayable. Refund please

This is another one of those games that start you off with a low price like 4.99 to buy then force you to by more at higher prices to unlock the campaign and jack the prices on everything else so sick of the bait games

A lot of Catan for the money.  A couple bucks and you're allowed several boards which will keep you entertained for months.  I bought this month's ago and I'm still playing it daily.  Part of what bothers me about the game is the AI bots will gang up on you if you are winning or have the longest road.  There is also the problem of staying hidden with the victory points.  Say you get a victory point card.  It is automatically added to your total.  This can raise the alarm of the AIs especially if that puts you up to say 7 or 8.  They then start to use their knight cards and targeting you with the robber.  Not so for the AIs.  They can keep their victory points hidden as development cards and then Spring them on you all at once for the win.  This is a huge advantage for the AI.  Something the player should also have or nobody should have.  It is not uncommon for the AI to cash in 3 or 4 points for the win.  All the while the other bots are targeting you with the robber and ignoring the other guy because his score doesn't reflect victory points the way that you do.

Dice rolls are not truly random. 80% of the time, your number will roll immediately after the robber has been placed on it. I became so irritated with this trend that I began to log every occurance and this is not a statistical abberation. AI will build roads to nowhere, spam development cards, and place initial settlements in the most ludicrous places.  The app hasn't ruined the game for me. It can be fun but extremely frustrating.
$5 for one small map, no campaign without spending more $$ to unlock them. No way to refund within 24 hrs, and Google support for refund is a joke. WASTE OF MONEY!!!!!
replyContent: Hi Mark, please scroll down to the other unlocked maps in the custom game mode. With your initial purchase there are different maps and even different rulesets available.

Here goes my short review after having the app for two weeks:  I don't normally spend money on apps but I own the original game with five expensions​ and really enjoy playing with them so decided to spend the $5 my first disappointment was that I had to spend another $5 each if I wanted to play with cities and nights and/or seafarers. Then much to my dismay there's no way to play with the 5&6 player expension in the app. While I was happy to find that the rules were kept exactly the same and there was a multiplayer option so I didn't have to play against an AI which are obviously no fun to beat although it would be nice if it would show you all the current available games instead of choosing one for you and making you exit and come back in if don't like the one it chose. I wasn't​ to impressed by by the design which is at best avrege. The thing that really shocked me though is that I've noticed at least a couple of bugs so far which have entirely messed up at least one have for me. This is not ok when you're charging $5 for an app and have in app purchases​on top of that. I still play on the app because I'm a huge Catan lover and have had some great games with it. So if you like the game then go for it but just know the app is not perfect yet.

It is a very fun game, besides the bugs.... Wish that you could keep on seeing what resources are needed for building roads, settlements and cities, they seem to disappear as you advance in the game...same goes for the Development Cards.....It makes the game less amusing to play...
Add local multi-player with a chromecast and this game is perfect!!

The AI over-compensation for poor strategy is to skew the random distribution of die rolls.   Played a game where the 2 and 12 were well over the normal distribution - not one, but both - and the 5 roll was deeply suppressed.   Ironic that I had cities on both 5s on the board?   There was once an option for fixed dice, and I wish there was a hack to reset it.
Great entertaining game

replyContent: Hi Andra, as long as the distance rule between two settlements is applied (there must be always at least two roads between settlements) you can place a settlement there. This will cut off the longest road of your opponent and it´s a viable tactic. If you are not sure if that was the case you can send a screenshot of the situation to android@usm.de.

This game is a rip off

It's SoC for your phone! What's not to like? Well... The dice rolls are "clumped" in weird ways, even in the supposedly balanced "stack" mode (had one game where 9 was rolled far more often than 6); the "fairness" rules are implemented in ways that aren't fair (they steal from me twice and still get a free wildcard resource for not having "generated" a resource?!) and the AI's pettiness is trumped only by its stupidity (it will happily play a knight before rolling, steal its eighth resource card from you, and then roll a seven.) The way the AI plays a lot of the time would see a human player never invited to play again- stealing twice in a turn, trading repeatedly with players who are running away with the game, building or "robbing" in ways that offer no advantage other than hindering the human player, and offering countless trades of things the player already has in abundance expecting things in scarcity in return. I realize this sounds a little "sour grapes", but I do win a solid majority of my games. And despite my grousing, I spend a lot of time with this game, and enjoy it. I've just been waiting for a digital Catan with AI that plays like humans... And I'm still waiting.  ADD Feb 2017: In addition to an ever-increasing disappointment with the AI (don't play with 3 AI opponents. Just... don't.) the game is growing ever slower and kludgier with every new "update" while seeming to offer little of value in return. It recently out-and-out refused to launch while I was offline because it couldn't update. I understand needing networked game players playing the same version, but if I want to play offline, I really ought to have that option without the creators' meddling getting in my way. I'm lowering my review to 2 stars, and I'm seriously contemplating deleting it rather than continuing to watch it bloat up in my precious and limited storage space.

Great game with frustrating online experience. The game is really addictive, good bit of strategy and looks good.  Sadly, though online play could be amazing, the whole experience is tainted and unsatisfying. Opponents often drop out leaving you playing against default ai characters. Especially annoying when they drop out because you are going to win. Also disconnected players can often leave games in limbo, where they can't be ejected after initial vote failed. Games also get lost when you have to shut down the app to refresh as objects disappear in the game. Proper ranking and control online could make this game a legend I also agree with other player comments on the whole.Why no way to save setting between matches..Have to choose character and colour every effort to find a game, if you can be bothered. Have often experienced games too where one person is clearly controlling 2 players
I have had this mobile version for years. Do not like the updates. Do not like the ai anymore. I do not play against people, just the ai and it is no longer enjoyable.

The AI in this game is awful. Honestly, I love Catan, but I've been tempted to uninstall because the handicap system is so bad. The AI isn't intelligent at all; instead, the game rolls unfavorable numbers at a high percentage when you are ahead - rolling 7s on your turn, favorable rolls for the NPCs, and Knight Cards every turn. It's essentially resource control, which is really frustrating. Game could also use an undo button. I don't know, it's OK. Probably wouldn't buy it if i had the choice again.  Edit (1/28) - Alright, just played the Knights and Cities expansion, the AIs flaws even worse. Just went through 20+ rounds not being able to do anything because AI has an endless stream of progress cards that sap ALL of your resources. Awful. Uninstalled, will never play another game from this developer again.
Do not purchase this game. Worst A.I. possibly in any game I have played.

One suggestion for improvement: when trading, it would be helpful to have an option to view the game board before accepting or rejecting a trade, in the same manner that you can view the game board before playing a knight at the start of your turn. I'd like to see my odds of receiving a replacement resource before trading it away.  Overall, fantastic work dev team!

content: I encountered some serious glitches that cost me the win on more than one occasion. First, although an 8 was rolled and I should have received 2 wood, the game showed the animation for transferring me the resources, but they did not get added to my total. That happened twice in the same game, same roll - 8. So I was shorted 4 wood. As a result my total resources were 6 instead of 8 & then 10, but when someone rolled a 7, it still made me discard 4 resources, >:-( leaving me with only 2. I tried discarding more wood but it only showed I had 1 instead of 5 & wouldn't let me discard more than 1 even though it was apparently accounting for them for the 7 dice roll. I was in the lead with 8 when this happened twice and I couldn't do anything for a couple of rounds, which I would have been able to if this hadn't occurred (i would have been able to spend enough resources with the wood I should have had the first time to be below 7, and for the next time it happened as well, and I would have had the extra two VP needed to win). Then my opponent who was able to play their turns normally ended up winning instead. This happened in another game also. Really upset, I don't mind losing fair and square but Catan isn't exactly a short game, so to put the time in to have it stolen from you is extremely frustrating and makes me want my money back that I spent to get this app.

Great game and great single player mode. But the online multiplayer could use a lot of work. Can be very slow and buggy. Player inactivity timeouts are too long or just dont work at all. If they could make improvements to make the online games go faster this would be a 5 star game.
