content: I had been enjoying this, learning more about the game. But, it gets very frustrating when the AI gang up on you, and it's just constant robbers being rolled and the AI's jumping between only your resources. I win a game here and there, but mostly it's just waiting for the game too finish due to not getting to keep any resources I may roll (tends to roll my numbers while there is a robber) Makes for a boring game, and I won't bother anymore. I will uninstall rather than it take space on my phone.
Constantly freezing and crashing during multi-player on line. Spend more time trying to get online after then it's worth. The AI is a joke. Terrible app.

If you choose to play against computers you'll rarely ever win.  The computer players will trade with each other. I can offer all my resources for just one and they will never take my trade.  The dice rolls are also ridiculous, they always favor the computers.
I like how the knights and cities expansion caters for the strategically minded whereas sea fearers for the more creative

I built 2 roads in online multiplayer game, ended my turn, and the person after me did something that it took us to lobby, everyone confirmed ready, went back to game , but my 2 roads are gone, and person after me gets the roll and builds his road in the place I had my two . What's that a glitch , a hack, I want my money back
Fully functional, expansion packs available, lots of settings to customize the game
- npc asks me to trade. trades then with the other npc. - I choose trading with bank. when I then hit accept, the message "no offer" appears. - some more things.
Interface is not worth the price, and the campaign content is locked behind DLC. Skip.
Just needs better multiplayer

Man, I would play this all the time if it worked like Words with Friends. I convinced a couple friends to buy the app so we could play online, but everyone has to have the app opened to start a game. Can you please make it so we can send invites to people on our friends list to start a game?

My husband and I love Catan but don't play as often as we would like since it is a 3 player game. This app makes that possible with the addition of the AI! Campaign mode is fun too, though beating the computer can be too easy at times. My only gripe is that campaigns reset with each update.
Glitchy

This would be an awesome game if it didn't have so many errors.  Every time I have to move the robber to an opponent's hex, the whole game freezes, and I shut it down. This happens when I am playing alone or online with friends. Haven't been able to finish a whole game yet because of this issue.

This game is fun and awesome but im having problems when in campaign. Im currently playing cities and knights  and when i click to go buy a development card the screen is blank with no options, how do i fix this?
replyContent: Hi Keith, have you tried to torn of the auto zoom in the options an also to alter the animation speed to ultra? This work around helped other users.

content: I loved it. But its still very rough around the edges.   A big thing that urked me is I bought a DLC "scenario" thinking that would unlock Campaign (You have to buy a expansion, guessing the 5$ one, to unlock it I am guessing) and there was no indication. It just said "Buy a expansion pack from app store to unlock!". I am guessing the scenarios are for campaign but I cant play the one I just bought because its unlocked :/.  Other wise online wise fine. Its weird that you all have to press X at the same time to start the game. But other then that yea...   Do I recommend it? If you REALLY love the game and want to play with friends then yes. If you want the campaign make sure to buy the actual EXPANSION PACKS and not the scenarios.   Would easily be a 4 or 5 if I didnt have those issues.
Love the board game and game play in this is good, but the registration/sign in process is too buggy. Goes to German after a failed log in, and pw reset emails don't come when trying to recover.
replyContent: Hi Matt please contact our support team via android@usm.de we should get you online in no time.

content: Too many bugs, and the server is busy half of day. This game should be free, it works like an alpha version.
Once in a while the servers go down, but most of the time multiplayer online gameplay is smooth. This is one of my go-to games.
App von Amateuren entwickelt
Super fun!!
I can hardly finish a game without it freezing.

The dice combination always stick to 6,7,8 but sometimes 4 is more frequent. Effective trading with AI is very limited, they dont trade with multiple items you are offering. Very easy to win if you stick with 6,8, area
replyContent: Hi Ronald, 6 8 and 7 have the highes chance to gett rolled when using  2 dice. Therefore it it not unusual to win when building on tiles with 6 and 8 ;)

content: Agree with all the others that the game seems to use dice rolls and card draws as a way to increase difficulty instead of simply having "smarter" AI players. It's a cheap way to get out of what is probably a challenging task - developing AI that has its own strategies and can counter a live player's strategies. However, I have played the version of Catan for Xbox and it seems to do so rather well, so I am sure it is possible. I still like the game and play it quite a bit, though, and I thought buying the expansions would be a good way to re-familiarize myself with them, since I haven't played Seafarers in a few years.

Currently, in the Cities & Knights expansion, when you have built city walls around a city and you are the lowest contributor when the barbarians come, you not only lose the city walls, but also the city itself. Unsurprisingly, that's annoying. With a simple fix for that issue, it's a 5 from me.

I've tried 3 games so far and each time someone has quit. It would be good if there was some sort of punishment for this (maybe there is and I don't know yet) because it's frustrating to have three games in a row end that are midway through. Other than that, game seems to function great!
Cannot connect to new game. If in game, it suddenly stops. Very slow. Cannot load new game. Disappointed! Want refund.
It is a great version of the board game. Don't have any issues with the gameplay
It seems to crash if the player builds a third port settlement

The game is beautiful and I really want it to be a good game, but the AI cheats as bad as any game I've seen. As soon as you get close to winning the rolls just start going completely for the computer players. I'll have two towns on a six and a six won't be thrown for a while, but as soon as a computer player puts the robber on that tile, six's come flying at you. Also,  as others have said, the Knight cards and victory point cards constantly go to the computer players. Visually its great, gameplay cheats.

Fun sometimes but the AIs  will target you no matter the point difference every game. The dice rolls seem weighted to whatever numbers the AI's have. Multiple  games will have 11s  3s  12s  and 2s  rolled more than 8s  and 6s. Devs  need to fix this unfair game.

It cant be true.   If I leave "online" match and get back to game after 1 or 2 h players is stil there and ready to play. Online game is not real its fake !!!!And last thing is that people needs to pay extra for campaing and other maps

At first this app was great. It gave me my Catan fix when there was no one around to play. The more I played however, the more I noticed how buggy this app is. First I began to lose my progress cards halfway through the game. Although they were technically still there you can't see them. And then I began to notice what other reviewers were stating about the AI being unfair. I realize it should be difficult but when every player gangs up on you the entire game it takes the fun out of it especially when you add mysteriously ai favorable dice rolls. This app has a lot of potential but need some work!
I bought this game recently. After I moved the robber, I can't access the pass dice button. Please fix this or return my money.
Awesome game works really well apart from last few nights where struggling with lost online connection.  Presume this is a server issue, if this could be resolved would be 5 stars
No refund
Best electronic version of Catan currently out there. Only issue is that there is no way to filter when searching for games (i.e. look for only Cities and Knights games, or only Base games).

Game is really fun and I am not the gaming type. I like that you can play offline, like on flights especially. Agree with others about the dice magically rolling the AI's numbers when you start winning, and they always magically have most of the Victory Point cards
Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice. Biased dice.
I don't.know what's the matter.. I have the.fully paid version.. it has been running fine. This evening it is just not.connecting online and is showing errors and shutting down.. need help
Having trouble connecting to online games.  502 bad gateway?  What gives?  I tried reinstalling the app and I still have that issue...
This application is non-intuitive and simply poor quality. Save your money and buy the physical game.

Online play randomly pauses and eventually times out. One or more players get kicked out with no way to resume or add them back in. For a game that can take up to two hours with no recovery option means I won't be risking online again.
Menus start disappearing, dice rolls do not feel random.
Never played board game but heard lots about it. This game is great.

Human player gets mostly road development or knight cards while computer players seem to get monopoly cards often. Dice rolls seem to favor computer opponents. Computer players easily trade with each other but offer unfavorable trades to human player.
Only downside is the AI's seem very unlikely to trade.
Great game! Great app!
online profile buttons on leader board dont work when pressed... no way to see progress.

The basic Catan game is fine and true to the original board game BUT the campaign expansions are poorly optimized for Android and buggy. I'm playing on a second gen Samsung S2 Tablet which is current hardware but the game seems to run into issues with device resources as a game progresses. You can see the dice roll slow and eventually progress card, knight and build menus stop rendering text and graphics. Trying to blindly play a progress card from a screen placeholder when there are multiple invisible cards there is kinda tough. Maybe it's a Touchwiz issue but I haven't had any problems playing other titles.   The AI is quirky as well on moderate difficulty, if you jump out to an early point lead the game will constantly saddle you with the robber to frustrate further progress but if you play possum and let other players advance, they'll be stuck with that problem and you can win easily unmolested.
Very buggs closes on its own all the time. Multiplayer is unuseable.. terrible experience can i get a refund please.
Until connection errors are fixed, I cannot give this game more than 2 stars. There is also no way to select a search for cities and knights only vs base game only.
Music, visual effects, audio effects are really annoying, visuals are slow. And superfluous to gameplay. Also needs a chat system.

They should rename this to "Player Gets the Baron Every Turn Until AI has someone with an impossible lead to overcome"...just don't subject yourself to this game. Inevitably what happens is that all AI players swarm you with Robber Barons. One player will fixate on development cards until they have eight Knight Cards (happens all the time), and place it on you if you are close the lead. The remaining AI players build such substantial leads you can never catch up...
Best Board Game Ever! Even on mobile!
I don't think any other reviewers have tried doing a multiplayer game. My wife and I have never been able to complete a single online game. It always freezes halfway through the match.

Bought the 10 dollar expansion because love me some Catan. I'm pretty much saying the same as everyone else here in that the dice rolling and luck of the AI seems almost like they're cheating. The game is still playable but if you get too far ahead the AI will rob the crap out of you and in the process it will seem like every dice roll ignores you. On the seafarer expansion, I've built a ship and when I try to highlight the ship to move, it takes my screen to the bottom left corner and locks it in the ocean
Great game. Only found one bug among many plays.
Great adaptation for phone

The basic game works well, but Cities & Knights has several bugs: Master Merchant is badly broken, can't play Wedding or Saboteur when in the lead (rarely useful, but legal plays), discarding progress cards happens during the wrong phase. Developer won't fix, even years after being notified of rule-breaking bugs.  Often can't re-join a multiplayer game after a crash, quite frustrating.
The gameplay so far as I've played seems fine but goodness it's resource hungry. It's chomped through my battery! Think some further optimization is required

The game looks good on our Dragontouch 10 and Samsung Tab 8, however, the AI cheats.  It CONSISTENTLY will move the robber onto my or my SO's space blocking us, then roll the exact number the robber is on. That is not RNG, but RN-cheating!  Also, the battery drain is considerably worse than GPS/location services and no GPS isn't turned on.  I've never seen the like, I installed the game with a full charge, registered, played a few games and was at 57%.  Then went to play with the SO, It's at 25% now.  The SO's tablet was draining faster than it could charge while he was playing.  NEED TO FIX THIS!

The game is good and addictive but the dice roll is extremely and ridiculously biased against the human in AI gameplay. The dice often rolls in favor of the human player but only when that particular number is blocked. Please fix this.
I used to play this game on board & I loved it, you created the perfect virtual version. Its perfect!! Thanks
Loved the game. Only way I can rate 5 stars is when 6 player expac is available or integrated
Freezes up a lot, doesn't pick up on taps, AI is not that tough and only seems to be able to win by stacking the deck and changing probability on dice

that thinks the dice rolling and AI suck. At the initial stage they are all ok. But once you are the game leader, AIs will rob you for million times over. Not to mention the dice that seems to have a mind of its own. It just decides to show less possible numbers but more favorable ones to the AIs, or number 7 so you will get beaten again untill u have nothing left on your hands. If you want frustration as an end result, this game will not let you down.

This app is so buggy. When in the game lobby waiting for everyone to get ready, the check has a hard time staying that way and switches between x and check. In the ranking page, i cant view my ranking because the buttons dont work. I cant even change the page to see more rankings past top 10.
Accurate representation of an absolutely terrible board game

I loose dev cards that I buy. Get robbed constantly. AI spams Dev cards and always gets monopoly. The only Dev card I ever draw is knight, and if I do get another kind of card it's inexplicably gone by my next turn. As soon as I save up for something I get robbed almost every turn. I don't see how the computer can spam cards like it does while still spamming roads.

Love this game but the AI's are ridiculous, the second I get in the lead I'm immediately piledrived by them. They rob me utterly blind to the point of madness every time. It takes the fun out of it because I avoid being in the lead like the plague.

I bought this game thinking it would be really fun.  It takes forever to get started, it's clunky as hell and even though you paid, you have to pay again to even play campaign mode.  Worthless price of garbage, don't waste your time or money.  I want my money back!
Great game, agree with some the reviewers that the AI is limited. Overall good mechanics. There is an issue with audio streaming to Bluetooth wireless earbuds.
I don't usually buy games but I thought I would try it with a game I know.  Unfortunately,  the price includes practically nothing.  What a disappointment.
Although I liked the board game, I got bored  quickly with the app. Unsure what's wrong.
Nexus 6P

Love the game I play it daily. Couple of things I would fix. 1. I can't change my online username? 2. Online there should be a limit to how many times you can abandon or stall the game before getting kicked.  3. Once you purchase expansions you should have a separate quick play option to avoid wading through basic games to find other expansion gamers. 4. If you are waiting for players to join an expansion game it shouldn't turn into a basic game when someone non-expansion player flips through quick play.
Despite on some defects the game is still attractive
Awesome

I think I am yet to see an AI player use the robber on another AI. This is very frustrating. Also without being face to face with those you are playing this game loses a lot of what made the board game succeed.

Says it requires download of additional data but does not proceed. No buttons available just white screen and message. Edit: the buttons are hidden behind my tablet's main toolbar,  if you spam click the area in the bottom left you can get it to proceed.
replyContent: Hi Julian, please make sure your device has sufficient storage space avaiable for the download. Also, please only start the download when your device has a steady wifi connetion. If the issue should persist, please contact us via android@usm.de.

content: The game is awesome and would be brilliant to play...if the AI did not permanently cheat. It's soon bad that it makes the game completely unplayable to just play against the AI.

I don't know how long that game has been doing this to me, but the AI literally get extra points. I was playing a game where one cpu was at 8. They built a settlement and were at 11! They ended up winning. I counted all VP after the game, and the winner didn't have enough VP to win, even with the development card they were holding. I was crushing everyone. Bogus.     Just happened again. Cheated by 2 VP. Yes I'm sure it wasn't the longest road or largest army card
replyContent: Hi Nick, surely there is an expanation for this. If you should encounter a situation like this again, please send us a screenshot of the game via android@usm.de and we will have a look at it.

content: I have a Note 5 with no issues. Havent been able to get a successful online game going. Wait forever just to have someone drop or quit during placement. 24hrs Ive had this and havent even started a successful online game. Thanks for takin my $5. Ill stick to the board game, ugghhhh.

The look of the game is great. And No Crash issues for me. ...but the AI in this game is....bias. Honestly 12's, 3,s, 11's get rolled at unbelievably high rates in favor of the AI. If you want to win, build next to the AI that way you have a chance.  Update July: Game still biased towards AI               update dec: still awful AI one star
The boardgame is one of the greats, the means by which the computer controls games in this app manage to strip any of the fun amd much of the good strategy from the game. Don't bother.

I love this game, but only as a boardgames it seems. Phone adaptation is very good in itself, but the way the AI works against you, constantly setting the robber on your fields even when you are behind and the dice AI being an obvious non-random factor as well is just plain frustrating. On top of that, the content you actually get access to for 5$ is a joke.

Ive been trying to install the 2 expansions you have available. I beleive its islands and "new scenarios" and its not letting me do it for the life of me. Ive tried everything i can think of. Any help would be much appreciated. Other than that, this game is perfect.
replyContent: Hi ryan, please contact our support via android@usm.de. We will do our best to resolve the issue as fast as possible.

content: When I am playing online it will show me that it is someone else's turn when they have already played and it is actually my turn. I try to back out of the game and go back in but it still shows it is the other person's turn. Everytime this happens I'm not able to finish the game. This is annoying due to paying for this games. I love the campaign and online play except when this issue happens.
One of the coolest board games ever but absolutly pissed that i buy a game and cant play the campain unless i buy more expansions
The app/game could be fun if it didn't run so darn slow and crash constantly.  It's unfortunate because I love Catan but rarely have enough people to play.
Love it
Fun game. Convenient for car trips and just being out, but unplayable solo as the AI cheats hardcore.
replyContent: Hi Ramlatus, please contact our support via android@usm.de and describe in greater detail when this issue occurs.

content: The difficulty seems to be programed to favor the computer. I don't recommend playing the pc. I would only buy this for playing other people. I love Catan but this version is not good.

I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 2014 edition and I start a game at 100% battery, by the time I am 80-85% done the game (30mins) I get a 2% battery warning. I love this game but no other game does this :( I have all latest updates for the game and don't know why this game is so hard on my tablet.
I've created three accounts with three different emails, it just won't let me login to any of them.
See above.

Love this game! App runs smoothly for the most part. I have experienced a few issues with people losing connection, but there's enough people playing that I can always find an online match. Can we PLEASE have an option to create a 3 player game? I find a lot of people, including myself, prefer to play 3 player. That requires the first three to quickly click ready before a 4th player joins, or kicking the 4th player from the match. After kicking player 4, that slot is still open for anyone to join.
I enjoy this game... But I think I prefer it un-digitised.. Atleast I might get rolls or not see snake eyes come up 5 times in a row that an AI is conveniently placed next to.
replyContent: Hi James, did you already tried the Dicemode "Stack" or "Stack 5". These dice mode will guarantee a more even distribution of the dice roll. For more info tap on the "?" Symbol right next to the Dice mode when setting up a game.

content: I play on a samsung tablet and sometimes when i start the app, my tablet shuts off! Plz fix
Ai exclusively moves robber to your hexes.  No.exceptions.  If u start on both 6s, be prepared to see 8s rolled at a ratio of 3:1 against the 6s, and visa versa.
The games plays like the real game.
Bad user interface

Not what I was expecting. Waited over 30 mins just to play a quick online game. Then the games kept ending because people would quit. Thought this app would be a fun way to get better at the game, but probably just going to delete it.
replyContent: Hi Michelle, have you tried the "Custom-Game" Mode? You are able to  create you own game experience by altering the settings avaiable there. Also check out our tutorial which will give you an overview of the rules and gameplay mechanics.

content: I already bought expansion packs!!! Why can't I play the campaign!? Either fix it or refund me money!
replyContent: Hi noah, please contact our support via android@usm.de and let us know which in app purchases you made.

content: This game cheats! I have had this game for a year now and can not win. Every time I get just enough resources I get robbed, the dice rolls are always benificial to the computer, and I stress this you can not win ever.
I enjoy playing this game a lot. The only thing that kept me from rating it five stars was how annoying the AI can be when they are offering you a trade. Other than that, I love it.

I absolutely love the game of Catan. I enjoy it so much that this is the first time I have ever paid $5 for a game....unfortunately this app is unplayable. When you get the lead the AI rolls 7 almost every other roll. Just played and counted 13 out of 18 AI rolls were 7 once I got the lead of 8 vp's. On top of that 8 times out of ten when a thief is placed on a tile that tiles number is the next # rolled. All I can say is the AI rolls are disgusting. I really want my money back.

All too often this app requires downloading new data after opening it. For some odd reason, it is not updated via Google play. This is extremely annoying when abroad, on a plane, or when you're simply not on Wi-Fi and don't want to burn that much data. Not downloading is simply not an option if you want to play, and this occurs with frustrating regularity.
replyContent: Hi Eric, please contact our support via android@usm.de. The download for the additional data should only happen after the initial installation of the app.

content: buddy function need development
Can't do anything after using Knight card
replyContent: Hi Rob, please contact our support via android@usm.de and send them a screenshot of the sutiation. I am sure we will find a solution for that issue.

content: Fun game to play but has a few hiccups . A.I counts cards, knows exactly what you have and will take exactly what it needs if it can. Unable to save and exit a game on Galaxy S7. Also would like to see some more expansions!
replyContent: Hi Chris,1. The AI can only "remember" your ressources a few turns back like an observant human player could do. 2. You should be able to quit and save a game. Use the Button on the right, tap on the 3 dots and the door symbol. The game will be saved. 3. We are always working on the improvement of the Catan experience ;)

content: The game would be great but there is something wrong with the dice rolling once you are ahead. And the AI is simply bashing you even another AI is winning. Wish I could get my money back. And the game mostly crashes without saving, could be a device issue but I cant finish campaign games and unlock maps.
replyContent: Hi Peter, please contact our support via android@usm.de regarding the crashes and give us a little bit more info. All Maps used in the Campaign-Mode are also available in the Custom-Game mode. You can even modify certain parameter there to customize your gaming experience.

content: I love the game and play it with my co-workers at lunch. I would give it 5 stars, but we can't figure out how to save our online games with each other so we can finish the next day. On the occasion that one or more of us are able to get back to the game there are AI playing our opponents roles. Are we doing something wrong? If not please make a save game option.
Game is fixed to benefit the computer players, particularly if you're in the lead. Makes an otherwise enjoyable game too frustrating to play for long.

Please update game to allow auto rotate, being stuck on side of landscape mode is odd especially if charging a certain way. Also please enable the nav bar at the bottom to minimize away. Even simpler free apps are able to do this. Have had this game for a year and seen betters updates in other apps.
I wish people wouldn't quit all the time

Love the game. But this app is in dire need of some updates. It crashes/freezes frequently in the middle of games which makes it almost useless after a while. Super frustrating. Also happens in the iOS version. There are other minor annoyances as well. If it weren't for the crashing I'd give the game 3/5 stars... it's OK, but if they would just listen to the feedback from the user base it could go from C+ to A-. I'd pay double for a version of this game that does not crash (or even auto saves frequently), and has a few features/options lifted to match what players are asking for.
Ai is rigged, but online play is very buggy too
Very biased. The robber was always placed at my numbers time after time by the other computer players. Did not enjoy it at all. Deleting it.
The random dice is very heavily in favor of the computer.. Every game! Also, it kills the phones battery!
Game locks up every time during a game creation. Always at the screen to select the game board. Will be requesting a refund, if I can figure how to do so.
replyContent: Hi there, it would be geat if you would contact our support via android@usm.de and describe the issue a littlebit more detailed. We will do our best to find a solution.

content: Every time, first move catan has stopped working, waste of money...
replyContent: Hi Danny, please contact our support via android@usm.de wel will do our best to find a solution for the issue.

content: They look different than in the app photos which i'm used to play with and is really annoying. Other than that great app, great scenarios variety

Once you get to grips with the idea of the game it soon became addictive. To unlock the campaign it asks you to purchase an expansion pack. Having enjoyed the custom games for a few hours I thought it was worth the punt.  Having purchased one of the packs the campaign mode is still locked. Would be 5 stars if not for this issue
replyContent: Hi Butty, only the two expansions "Seafarers" and "Cities and Knights" include campaigns modes. You can reach out to our support via android@usm.de to learn more about the different in-app purchases.

content: I do enjoy this game however I have noticed that since the last update somtimes (not always) after a few games it slows down (closed down to bear minimum apps in the background with no difference ).  New game starts with flash screen of garbage tiles and then shows the game board. Screens take ages to load and selections are very delayed in responding.  Dice rolls take the 10x longer until the final roll shows.            Please fix as I really do like this game.
Pretty Good

This game is full of Rape! If you play against 3 other ai characters they all gang up on you even if you're not in first place. And the dice are always in favor of the ai players. It's just not fun! The ai and dice need sorting out big time!
If someone could tell me how to see the probability dots this would be 5 stars
replyContent: Hi Brian, the "dots" you know from some board game versions of Catan aren´t included in the App. To help you out: 2 and 12 would be one "dot", 3 and 11 would be two "dots" and so on. 6 and 8 are highlighted red as the numbers with the (statistically!) highest ressource outcome. I hope this helps you to place you settlemets more effective.

content: AI, dice = cheating bastards.
Campaign is pay to unlock and online login doesnt work for me. Great
replyContent: Hi Niko, please contact our support via android@usm.de. We should get you online in no time. Have you already checked out the custom game mode? You can play the unlocked scenarios there with individual settings.

content: Al principio me encantó como estaba hecho, pero leyendo otros comentarios y vivenciandolo por mi mismo puedo afirmar q el dado se vuelve en contra de quien va ganando de forma descarada. Como si tienen que salir cinco 11 en seis rondas. Siempre q vas a ganar en tu turno sale un 7 para alargarlo. Comprendo q lo hacen para darle más vidilla. Pero deberían de hacerlo al azar. Cuando cambien eso cambiaré mi opinión.

please fix. when i play a knight card in the treasure islands board the game darkens then freezes. close then open it and does the same thing. makes it completely unplayable. thanks...update- and on the four islands. on both its later on in the game which makes it extremely frustrating
This is almost more addicting then playing it in person.
Love it

There is no penalty for just leaving a game. Virtually no game lasts, with bad players or bored players just leaving mid way through and your whole game gets ended. Really frustrating and giant waste of time. There is also no chat or way to interact with players so if they are taking forever you can message them you have to just wait and hope they play or quit the game and you start over. Agree with the dice issues others have mentioned, ruins this game. Playcatan is free on PC. Use it.
Just playable, look at Ticket To Ride for a mobile conversion.
Really good game
Not as good as board version. Hard to see who has what resources, no instructions, trading is confusing.
replyContent: Hi Christopher, have you checked out the tutorials we inculded in the app? You can find them via the "?" button in the main menu.

content: No offline unless you buy more? Can I please have refund
replyContent: Hi Robert, have you already checked out the custom game mode? There you can find all the scenarios aviable and play them against up to 3 AI or human players locally.

content: Was fun until they nerfed play against AI beyond repair.

How the hell do you require an email confirmation to play a game but never send that confirmation? I have an app that does nothing because of an incompetent system. I wouldn't be so upset if I didn't see many other with this same problem. To the devs, I'm not going to email you to fix this problem. Go through your worthless email system and confirm everyone who is in my predicament. Pathetic.

Try the standard dice, stack and stack 5 and I don't think the dice rolling changed at all. At the end of the games, the dice rolling all follows the same distribution. Fix that godamnit. And I also agree with the other reviews, the AI dice rolling is so biased. So are their ridiculous chances of sweeping all victory points, or all knights for the same AI player. Have come across some AI players (normal difficulty) with 4 victory points or getting 6 knight cards. It's no better than casino cheating I say!

The AI in hard is ridicously aggressive on the player constantly placing the robber on an area where the player is in without considering if any of the other AIs are about to win or have more settlements in other areas. They just needlessly focus on putting the player down. I had hope in hard mode AI would play smarter not dumber.

I love catan, but I'm really close to uninstalling. I've been tallying the numbers and 7's are rolled waaaay to often. Additionally, they happen at least once or more a round. Also, the computer almost always steal from you, and friendly mode is only helpful until you get your first point...then the endless tirade of 7's begins. Please fix this, it really ruins an otherwise awesome game.
replyContent: Hi Christine, please note that the number 7 is simply the one rolled most often with two dice: 3+4, 6+1, 2+5. If you are interested in details and (maths), googling “2 dice distribution” will over some further information. However if you want a less random distribution, you can always set the dice mode to card stack in the options.

content: When it's working properly, this is a good app. Gameplay is intuitive and true to the game.  Unfortunately there are pretty frequent glitches, from lagging to timeouts to matchmaking difficulties. Apparently it's impossible for the engine to find a 4th player for any match.  This game settles my catan craving, but doesn't quite acheive victory.

Unable to unlock "Brawn before brains" and "outsourced" achievements after meeting requirements multiple times. Contacted support, but they won't verify problems. Support should reattempt achievements after updates.

I downloaded this for 10p having played the board game.  I was disappointed that it didn't include the story mode... So I spent 1.29 on a single expansion pack.  Possibly not the first one. Still no story mode.   So I spent 6.29ish on buying all expansions, which added a lot of story mode.  16 scenarios of seafarers and 4  in knights.  I just completed that.  Then I notice in the store that it says that islands isn't installed!  So I spend another 1.29 on islands, and no change. Can I have a refund please?
replyContent: Hi Paul, the island expansions has no dedicated story mode. You can play the Island map pack by entering the custom game mode. Browse through the aviabale maps, you should be able to find it there. If not, please contact our support via android@usm.de.

content: Just launched it the other day to have a quick look, started a game, got distracted so went out of the app. Haven't relaunched the game ask day and in a few hours noticed my battery was at 15%. Checked the battery settings and Catan had 33% battery use, was preventing dose and had CPU running for several hours. That's in a background mode! Would be a great game if not for this horrible bug.
Remarkably challenging AI.
Cannot play this game without a touchpad. DOES NOT WORK WITH KEYBOARD AND MOUSE.

Catan took a terrible dive.  This app is the pits.  You CANNOT:  a) send text (HUGE strategy limiter), b) find a game where no one quits (ruins ELO), c) report cheaters, d) view game stats DURING the game, e) play a game in under 45 min (slow interface), f) see trades suggested by other players when someone is trading, g) suggest a trade when not your turn.  This app us for casual play at best.  Still waiting on its turn to glory.
Doesn't run on my honor 8.

Fab game! Had to buy after playing the board game. Android version is just as good. FAO the developers, there's a minor bug where the sound is still active even when the game is in the background - the HTC boomsound notification is on and there's a faint hiss from the speakers. Fixing would improve battery life too. On Android Marshmallow HTC10

If the game wasnt so good this app would be terrible. Connection issues, no chat, time out problems. Same problems still exist. Kills battery, uses way too much memory. Amateur programming to a great game.

This game is potentially perfect. Having played it over and over again, mainly single player, I'm convinced that the dice rolling is biased against the player. If that is a balancing mechanism to make the AI competitive (as some suggest) it is is a bad one. It takes the fun out of the game. One option that should be considered therefore would be to have a "backwards" or "undo" button that can undo your turn. This would help the player randomise the die roll better if thevthink that the biased die rolling is getting out of hand (some may see it a cheat). Without such a single player enhancement the game as it stands at the moment is not value for money, especially since replayability is too frustrating with the apparent die roll bias against the single player.
Even if it's not 20c I think it'd be worth it.
Great game

The game doesn't send notifications for your turn. You cannot close the app or the game ends. Why in the world is this app designed this way? This requires all of my friends to be staring into their phones for hours at a time, which is not reasonable at all. Please add the functionality that will allow users to close the app and be alerted for their turn. That is a basic functionality of multi-player phone games.

Wanted to play online with friends but everyone has to be online at the same time. Unbelievable. Can it not have the moves saved and just notify each player of their turn. This was the only reason I bought this app and am severely disappointed.

I bought this game, but unless you purchase expansion packs (e.g., seafarers for $16.99), there's only one board you can play. All the others are locked.That's a bit ridiculous and makes the single player campaign useless. The description is very deceiving.
And still have to buy in app purschases for playing the game
replyContent: Please check out the custom game mode and take a look at the aviabale scenarios, you can either play against up to 3 AI opponents or human opponents on one device. You are also able to go online an match against other players there.

content: Google +.... Nope!

The game concept is solid and would be fun if the AIs didn't keep pulling way ahead due to the "random" dice rolls. Played a few games and eventually you end up skipping turn after turn until the AI wins
Issue fixed after reinstalling. Eager to try now!
replyContent: Hi Hai, thanks for updating your review!

content: Would like to see the dots on the dice number discs.
Confused at first about how to play against A.I. but team were quick to help out.
replyContent: Hi Charlotte, thanks for updating your review!

content: Why am I paying to get half the game?  Either make it free and incomplete or paid for and complete
But playing this electronically is not fun at all. I think the best part of Catan game is the real / offline human interaction.
Wasn't a fan
It is so much fun.
Refund
replyContent: Hi Wouter, please make sure your device has enough storage space avaiaale for the download. Also please make sure that you use a steady wifi connection to download the data. If the issue should persits contact our support via android@usm.de

content: Bought the "all expansions" set but cannot use it on my tablet. If I click on buy google play returns "Error: you already own this item". Solved by rebooting the tablet... Game is quite fun
You don't even get the campaign with it, not worth it.

The game itself is good, but it seems to be programmed poorly. I can drain my battery in less than an hour, the phone gets very hot. Never observed that with any other app. I would like to rate it higher, but as long as I almost burn my fingers while playing, that is not possible...

After purchasing this game, downloading it and running it, the first thing you notice is that you can't play the Campaign unless you purchase it. Once again, the trend of sad lazy money hungry games designers strike again. I can't recommend this game cos I didn't expect to have to purchase the game twice.
Alot quicker than the actual game, no set up required. Glitchy with the sound when I go online, theres an echoing affect. Otherwise good game overall.
Haven't finished 1 game out of 20 since players will leave when they feel like it. Stupid game.

Each app can write in its own folder on the external storage without requiring storage permission. This permission request send fraudulent. Why would a game need to access my private data on the external storage?
Sorry... Gonna have to delete game... Its impossible to play without a timer for online players... It takes FOREVER for people to roll their dice and play their turn... So sad...
Needs to buy expansions 😐
Deleted.   To rigged.  Bye bye  I have only been playing for one day and it is SO rigged . If that manyCombos came in a row at the casino I would be a millionaire
Disgusting game...
Well known problem with tutorial where it says to build but the building icon is not there. It will get 5 star if they fix problem☺
Could you please add in the option for real random dice rolling than making it an advantage for AI?
Boring
Tried twice to install on Nexus 5, but it failed to download the required files twice. Uninstalled.
replyContent: Hi Wayne, please make sure your device has enough avaiable data space. Also make sure to download the data using a ssteady wifi connection. If the issue should persist please contact our support via android@usm.de

content: Have not played much yet but multi-player could be better. Please add an option in beginning so you can play the game with us friends sort of like quizduell. You have 24 hours to make your move and other people get notified when it's there turn. I would not have to wait in game anymore and you could play it when u have a spare minute
I buy the game and it doesn't even have a campaign mode. YOU HAVE TO PAY FOR IT!

I love Catan. I really do but the AI in this game just doesn't make sense. First of all there is the mob mentality that the AI goes into whenever you start winning. I have been playing the game for years and Noone plays like that. Second of all trading with ai is terrible. I have traded with an AI player only for them to then offer a second trade asking for that resource back (i.e I give ai player a stick for wheat, then they offer to give me a brick for wheat.) 3. No one hoards dev cards. What a shame.
Plus side is that it's so much fun. Bummer is that people take forever to take their turn.
You buy it and there is nothing to do except online unless you pay again
replyContent: Hi Eddi, check out the custom game mode. You are able to play a variety of different scenarios and rulesets there against the AI or up to 3 other human players on one device. Just scroll threw the scenario list.

content: I used to play the online version on my PC, but they discontinued the product keys for that version for some reason. So, I waited for 2 years while they created this version. I downloaded it as soon as I discovered it was finished and have enjoyed many many hours of entertainment since. It does have a few glitches which is why I took off one star.
Here is to hoping that they add some Traders and Barbarians scenarios.
You buy the game and then have to buy every campaign you want to play. Poor trading practice.

There were times when I couldn't move a ship or upgrade a knight when I should've been able to. Another time, the trade with the bank was crazy...swapping 2 for 1 ended up being 2 for negative one. Such a shame this is ruining the game experience
replyContent: Hi Vivian, we would appriciate if you could send us screenshots and more detailed info about the issues you are experiencing via android@usm.de. This should help us to identify possible bugs more easily. Thanks!

content: Do not like that you first pay money to get an app that you then need to pay money to even try a campaign. Uninstalled straight away.

What a disgraceful developer charging for their app but STILL not giving full access you can't even play a solo campaign it's online only unless you pay them even more money after buying the app. Shameful . Will never purchase am app from this developer again, I hope they go under and take their utter greed with them.
replyContent: Hi daniel, you can also play offline against the AI or up to 3 other players local on one device. Check out the Custom Game option in the main menu and take a look at the different scenarios and rule sets avaibale.

content: As above
Dice rolling goes against you when you start to do well.
I pressed the home button to exit, but it keeps running in background n drains battery
I didn't buy a game just to be billed again for the campaign. Literally no campaigns are available, you have to buy them.

Good implementation. More improvements to the multiplayer would be good, such as being able to view development / progress cards while waiting for my turn as well as checking up on the rules. Also, sometimes the other human player doesn't receive my trade request.
You have to pay more to get the campaigns, which was the only thing i wanted. I guess the description doesnt say that you do, so i guess it was my own fault.
Just bought this and the campaign is locked until you make an in app purchase?! This seems a bit of a con to be honest
I love it!
Awesome version of the game. Can I just ask for one fix? Technically the game is not won until the end of your turn, not as soon as you reach the required score. Can that be fixed please?

All too often, the game does everything in its power to make sure that you do not get the dice rolls that you need. I understand that this is to balance the AI, but that does not mean that it is not an exercise in horrible frustration to watch as your opponent is getting resources on 11s and 3s, while you have gone literally a dozen turns without a single resource generated on 6s and 5s. It also has some fairly serious issues with crashing, which is not very justifiable for a game that I paid money for.
This is a great app for a great game!

Wants to download 40Mb of data almost every time it is launched, so it's very unreliable and annoying on trips! Please fix! The issue appears to be when the app is launched when offline, if it can't 'phone home', it shows the download warning and won't let you play.
replyContent: Hi Richard, please contact our hotline via android@usm.de regarding this issue. You should only need to download the additional data once after the first installation.

content: I agree with all the posters that have commented on the shady dice rolls when you have a lead

Why does an app that supports single player games require a data connection/most updated app to work? It should just disable multiplayer when the app isn't up to date. I often want to play when i have downtime. Like at the lake or on airplanes. Places i frequently don't have a data connection. The game is fun but the data limitation is very annoying.
my only complaint, is that the cpu relentlessly targets a human player with the bandit, even when other cpus have more points

Searching for a quick match was buggy and slow.  I also encountered a frustrating bug that didn't allow me to buy anything even though i had the resources (the error message said i didn't have the resources)

Online games seem slow, and it doesn't seem like it's just people being slow with their turns. On my Galaxy S6, the app crashes when I try to continue a synced game... super annoying. Like many others, the game clearly begins to work against you when you start winning. Knight card start getting played like crazy, and sevens get rolled non stop. The computer always picks you. I've lost entire hands over this because they always steal from me. Suddenly uncommon dice numbers will be rolled much more often.
Game crashes way to often, usually when moving the robber.  Devs havn't figured this out by now?
Getting an online game with friend is extremely cumbersome. There is no way to send game invites / requests to friends.
Logging in to online failed everytime, refunded. Bought again and retried and got it figured out.
replyContent: Hi Quentin, thanks for updating your review.

content: I had a problem logging in to online play, but after mentioning the problem, it was fixed for me. I appreciate it! 4 stars. (I never rate 5 unless there's absolutely nothing wrong)
replyContent: Hi Tom, thanks for updating your review!

content: It doesn't update through the play store, I just get stopped at the first screen with a notice that I need to find WiFi so the game can download an update. Really inconvenient for anyone that has limited data. I rarely remember to check this app before I go anywhere.
My saved games are disappearing! What gives?
Why did you charge me five bucks if I can't even play the whole thing without paying more money? Dice are rigged. Still the best board game ever though.
Not great. Tried playing online but the community isn't there and usually quit half way through a game. Wanted to love it but it's not polished enough for $5 with in app purchases
I keep trying to register so I can play online but it won't send me the verification email

content: 1. Click on custom match 2. Go to add buddy .. It gives blank screen .. Can't believe paid apps like this are so ignorant about their bugs and not doing anything at all about it

content: I have had fun playing this but everytime the AI online goes to pick gold, nothing happens for me. It just continues to wait on them, but it works for the others I'm playing with.

The single player coding needs to be fixed. Everyone can clearly see that when you are close to winning the game will switch to pick numbers only for the computers and the computers will rob you multiple times in a row leaving you no moves until a computer wins. That is not how the game should be set up and needs to be fixed.

Single player is great, but when I register for online it won't send me the email to activate my account. I've tried multiple times but still doesn't work. Will change my review when I can play online.
replyContent: Hi Conner, please contact our support via android@usm.de. We should get you online in no time.

content: Great game but every few games it crashes in the middle and that game becomes unplayable. When I'm able to play through a game my phone tends to overheat but otherwise it's a fantastic game

A lot of troubles such as : 1. If you are good the other players will leave the game. 2. Too much time to wait till it's yout turn again. 3. There is no rank so you can play with low lvl players. 4. Can't talk with other players. 5. Finish the battery in 5 minutes so you have to stay connect to the electricity. 6. A lot of bags and network problems.        It can be a good application but now it's not worth the money.
Send my online confirmation, requested from 2 diff emails then I emailed you. No response yet. I sent money on this, fix it. (It's not in my trash folder)
replyContent: Hi Russell, please contact our support team via android@usm.de. We should get you online in not time.

content: A lot of connectivity issues, very laggy.. also why aren't players who are sitting there waiting for their turn, allowed to look at settings, almanac and stats whilst waiting??? It would be a waste of others' time to look at that stuff when its your turn.. please fix this and allow this when not your turn in game.
Love being able to play Catan, but the app has trouble syncing on both my phone and my tablet. It will just get stuck on the "please wait, game data is syncing".
need tougher AI and scenarios, otherwise great

From the moment the game boots up it sounds like it is having a sound issue. Like there are two instances of the game open and they are both playing the music and the sound affects and they are out of sync. In the end it is just a lot of noise. I am running the game on my Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+. Please fix or suggest what i can do to correct this issue!
You still have to play for more stuff inside and. It feels a bit like monopoly

I like it a lot I agree with others (I played hundreds of times) that once you start winning the dice rolling changes against.  The dice rolling should never be used as a difficulty option, there are other factors that can be used.  The game used to consume a lot of memory and battery and heat up but it's fixed now.
Never get's old
I love the game but it takes up an insane amount of battery even when the app isn't open.

Title says it all. I love this game and this adaptation, but I do not love being forced to play synchronously.  The biggest appeal of digital board games to me is that I can play with friends a turn at a time, whenever we can squeeze it in
Brilliant pastime for moderate commutes
Great game, but look up for friends needs to improve
Great game but please make scenarios available in multiplayer. I'm mostly playing multiplayer, so it's quite sad that the scenarios are not available.
Absolutely addicted to it !
Love Catan! :)

So.... The game is fun and all, but when I finally decided to play online... I can't seem to create an account. I never received the confirmation e-mail after registering and now I can't use the same e-mail address to register again. Can you guys make an account for me under my e-mail address so I can play... because the in-game register function isn't working for me. Thanks.
replyContent: Hi Wilson, please contact our support via andoird@usm.de and we will get you online in no time.

content: USM, your AI on hard mode is ridiculous. It consistently breaks statistical norms of dice rolling. I've played many a game where the AI had territory on the 2, 3, 11, and 12 tiles and the dice stats at the end blew the middle dice range out of the water, sans 7. In these same games, all 3 AI opponents bounced the robber between 3 of my tiles, only. They saw me as the only threat. This is a completely ridiculous method of implementing difficulty. Fix this nonsense. Sure hard is meant to be difficult, but the way you all have gone about it is absolutely cheap to the gameplay.
i never got a registration email and hence could never login and play a multiplayer game.
replyContent: Hi Srikanth, please contact our support via android@usm.de and we will get you online in no time!

content: Great game, last update fixed it freezing a lot

This game has the most cheaty-face dice roller ever... As soon as you start to do well the dice turn against you. Every. Effing. Time.  It has options for bell curve dice (stack and stack 5), but you can't use them in campaign mode... Wonder why...? I want the money I spent on campaign mode back.

App is amazing. So much fun playing against CPU but i have still after 5 days not received a confirmation email for online play. I have tries registering with two seperate emails and still nothing. I would love to be able to play online. Can anyone please help me?

content: Love the app. But could you make all resources hidden during "handover" phases during hot seat games? This seems like it would be an easy change. Currently it's too easy to cheat, whether intentional or not. Thank you!
Latest update seems to have fixed whatever bug was preventing me from accessing the full game. Really nice to see a dev team who knows their stuff and quickly solves problems! Thank you!

content: It is different to play Settlers in real, on a board, than virtually, so don't expect the same experience. That said, I love this version and enjoy the more complex ones with both seafarers and Knights the most. Never gets old, and is its own phenomenon!

content: I wish they would let you have greater customization of the rules. Like turn off the robber and remove the desert. The computer always seems to get what it needs and I have been tracking the dice rolls and the number 7 is rolled disproportionate to the human player than the computer. Can you please add in a greater level of customization?
Great game. Lots of choices. Some small issues and occasional crashing spurts. Just needs better updates. But super fun and addicting
I play this daily.  I love the variations. I own 2 actual Catan board games.   How about adding the star trek variation!?  Thanks
Very good. But a few more and more diverse campaign scenarios would be great and sustain interest.
After the latest update, I click on online play. It says connecting...then goes blank.

I payed for the full game. Yet, in the C&K version the developement cards are not displayed. Though, in the seafearers version, they work. The game is unplayable, without the use of developement cards. Hence, half the product, I payed for, is useless! Please fix this issue as soon as possible, or give me a refund.
replyContent: Hi Florian, maybe there is a display issue which occurs on some devices. Please try to set the animation speed to ultra and deactivate the auto zoom in the main settings. This helped other players. If you need further support, please contact us via android@usm.de.

content: Love this game, works well on my samsung note 4. I'd like to see more campaign scenarios available please!!  I'd also like to have the option for online play against buddies to be more turn based like "word with friends" where you can put it away mid game and it will just notify you when it's your turn again vs. kicking people off if they are inactive.

Absolutely love this game. Great for online and single player! Areas for improvement: adding a colorblind mode for players like myself who can't distinguish reds and greens and browns, and allowing players to access the menu (viewing dev/prog cards, quitting, etc) when it is not their turn.

I wish I could upload screenshots. If you start winning, the game appears to cheat to even it out. Impossible dice rolls (8 8s in a row), combined with no trades and constant robbing leaves you with the inability to do anything until the devo card deck is empty. Even once a new AI takes the lead, they continue to gang up on you and play knight cards to move robbers OFF of the player in the lead's tile to yours. It makes no sense. This has gotten worse with updates. Reducing to one star.

I got the game several days ago and registered for online. I still have not received the verification email...I can't even use a feature I payed for. It is not in my spam folder and I have contacted the support without receiving a response yet. Support finally reached out to me and created my online account.
replyContent: Hi RMusic1994,  in some cases the email gets stuck in the spam folder, have you checked there? You can also reach out to our support via android@usm.de and the colleagues will set up an account for you manually.

content: I really enjoy the game. I even got both C&T and Seafarers expansions.

nothing like playing the real boardgame - refunded.
Good feel, great to play.  However, the game disappears when I switch off. So I need to reinstall every day.

content: Wonderfull game and I am much in love with it and recomend it offten but no matter how hard I try im not able to get the verification email to play online. content: Great adaptation!

Great value but since latest update it keeps bombing out. In Treasure Islands if robots find a 2 roads/ships treasure, the game halts and bombs out. Also the AI seems to move a boat and then place one in exactly the same position. Also they do seem to avoid going for Treasure on Treasure Islands chosing to move boats away. When they do get treasure then problem as mentioned above. I have also had issues where the robots build boats randomly that are not connected to any existing route or settlement. Good to hear that you are working on fixes.
replyContent: Dear Peter, we are currently working on a patch for that issue. We will release it as soon as possible. Thanks for your patience.

content: If you want a version of Catan where the AI players only beat you with the development deck, this is it.  AI players play way too many knight cards and when they do it is 9 out of 10 times against the human player, even if the human player is not winning.  Dice rolls are not properly randomized and seem to favor AI players at well.  If I set on a 6 or 8 the 2, 3, 5, 11, and 12 will roll more especially if the AI players are on ore.  It fascilitates false difficulty that can never be overcome by strategy.
Bots seem to know your cards occasionally, but solid game all around. Would like to see more expansions and scenarios though.
replyContent: Hi Locke, thanks for updating your review!

content: Let me preface this by saying that I love Catan. But the app...not so much. Dice rolls are rigged. Robbers nonsensically get placed on your tiles. AI trades with itself and cuts you out if you have even a hint of a lead. I couldn't even register for multiplayer.

I am often in no wifi zones and when I want to play, sometimes it wants to check for updates. When it can't connect it simply closes automatically instead of letting me play and do the update later. Please fix this!! Otherwise this is a fantastic game!
Does not open any more. Says there is no internet connection although i can comment on google play with my connection.

content: I'm sure it would be a fun game if I could play it. Saying it can't find an internet connection when my phone clearly has one.
