content: The game continues to crash during a game. This started after the update. I have tried Uninstaller and reinstalling but in most games it shuts down and gives me a message the game has stopped.
My girlfriend keep draining my battery with this game!
Nice CPU version if Catan, but the AI rolls low occurring numbers often, and I'm stuck in scenario 12 because when anyone captures a certain treasure the app closes. Very frustrating.
If it's $6 I expect a crisp product. Frustrating to be told that a game "no longer exists" after investing 20 minutes into it.

I love the game and own all of the digital expansions. The game has been bug free for many months but it now crashes consistently while playing the new Uncharted Islands scenarios pack. I always play with the max required victory points (maybe that info is useful for debugging?). The crashes seem to occur only on AI and loading the last save point does not help - the game merely crashes as soon as it reaches the same point in the AI turn.

If I could refund I would.  This game has so many bugs or features that weren't implemented right.  1. if someone leaves the game it should add and AI  2. dice statistics just wrong!   3.if a play takes is time, there isn't any timeout or something. you just waiting for them to make a move.

As so many other reviewers have said, the AI cheats and robs you of all the fun of playing a real Catan game. Playing a 4-player app game is nothing like playing a 4-player real-life board game. In the app, expect to have a 7 rolled almost immediately after you play your first town, and the robber will remain with you until game-end. And don't get excited if your number FINALLY rolls 3 times in a row. That often just means a computer player has a Monopoly card and is setting you up to steal those resources.

I bought it thinking I had paid for the whole thing but then I had to buy the expansions I thought it would be fun and others would still join but as it turns out others don't have the expansions so no one joins and its just a big waste of money. I want my money back just for the expansions then I will leave a more positive review and a 5 star (please get rid of the expansions as you refund me) other than the expansions I think it's a great game

I've played this game enough to where I'm 100% convinced the rolls are predetermined. The rolls completely go against all probability. They're designed to make it harder to beat. Never had this problem with the regular game. How can you possibly have 3, 4, 9 etc consistantly rolled more than 6 or 8? Or how can I have the robber on my space for 10+ rounds before I finally roll a 7 only to have the computer immediately roll a 7 and put it back. This happens almost every other game. Not possible! First game I've ever regretted buying.

The game is exactly the classic board game,  but the online multiparty needs more work. Just the introduction of an online rating system or more dynamic scoreboard and penalties for people quiting games early as it happens far too often.
(Tried to) play the campaign mode 5 times now... 4 times it has either lost all possible inputs (so nowhere to click to move on) or simply unresponsive. Not a great experience.
I'll get into the middle/end of a game and then it just shuts down. I'll try to restart it and continue the game but it shuts down immediately. VERY frustrating for a paid game, I want my money back.
I don't know what has happened but recently on Treasure Islands it keeps having a fault when a computer player finds a treasure that allows then to build two roads/ships. Really frustrating
replyContent: Hi Kate we are currently working on a patch for that issue. We will release it as soon as possible. Thanks for your patience.

content: Basically the ai and dice rolls in this game make it feel like it is designed to beat the user.  The NPCs trade with each other all the time but rarely will trade with you.   They ignore cards when choosing where to play the robber.  Rng for the dice rolls seems broken as over a large sample size, more 4s and 10s get rolled than 5s and 9s.  Also have noticed that dice rolls regularly skew against the user.  If you are looking for frustration instead of fun, this game is for you.
Generally good experience, but since the last update crashes in the middle of games.  Appears to happen on some treasures.  Unplayable.
replyContent: Hi Joan, we are currently working on a patch for that issue. We will release it as soon as possible. Thanks for your patience.

content: The game play is great. Bugs are stopping me from inviting a friend to play in a game, and dead end after a game in campaign mode. The bugs really bummed me out cause it would be pretty good otherwise.
App constantly freezes and crashes. Very glitchy. Definitely not worth the money.

The AI probably plays by the rules, but it certainly doesn't feel like it when it's combined with skewed dice rolls. At the start of the game the AI players ignore you and dice rolls seem fair, but once you start leading they gang up on you with constant 7s and knight cards, and the game only rolls dice that give big resource to the AI without you getting any. You can easily spend 4-6 turns getting no resources (same improbable numbers being rolled repeatedly e.g. 2 and 12) and getting robbed twice a round.
I paid for this game awhile ago, but new update REQUIRES access to my friends list in order to play.

The game itself is fun, the App is not. I am constantly having it lock up or glitch, especially when moving robbers. Also the GUI makes it very difficult to zoom in our out.  Opponent   trading is very dimwitted and it can be difficult to even tell who's turn it is at times.  I have learned my way around these things but for 5 bucks I really should not have to trick the game into letting me play it correctly.  Also, campain is not available until after you buy an expansion.. another $4 minimum

Looks promising, but one of the in-game menus does not work (can't play without it.)  Support gave me some troubleshooting steps to clear RAM, etc., but they didn't work.  This was on a Galaxy S7 Edge- one of the most powerful phones on the market.  It appears to be an issue with the game itself.

Ignore the comments by the frustrated players here, the AI plays the game exactly by the rules! But, because the bots aren't quite as good as a human player, you end up in the lead. And then the AI quite naturally focuses all of their robber attacks exclusively on you! (And it's way worse in cities and knights, there's nothing quite like losing half your resources to a saboteur, a couple more to a wedding, your last one to a bishop, and then having two of your roads destroyed, in one turn!)
There are more players online, would be top game for Android. Flawless otherwise.

Should be like words with friends where you can come back to your next turn later. Hate that you have to play a whole game in one sitting. Giving it one star for being ridiculously buggy though, I virtually can't play it.
All issues fixed.
replyContent: Hi Ma La, thanks for updating your review. Enjoy the App!

content: Minipay..
Is there a possibility of 6 player extension?
After the new update, it said that I didn't own the cities and knights expansion, after I had already bought it. Everything else is great and is a great time killer especially on road trips.
replyContent: Hi Matthew, please contact our support via andoird@usm.de.I am sure we can help you out real quick.

content: I like the app/game but the app crashes too often and has too many bugs.

Do not purchase this game unless you have friends to play with.  The game is programmed specifically to mock and frustrate you.    For example, 1.  If your 6 or 8 is blocked, (and it will be for 75-90% of the game), that number will be rolled constantly, in order to award your opponents numerous resources.  2.  The AI buys development cards like candy, and often wins with 5 victory points.  3.  If you move the robber, a knight or 7 will be rolled within 1-3 turns to move it back.
Game with desert crashes when ai discover land. Great game with a bug.

Love this game, but when I play yhe new expansion Islands, everytime one of the AI gets a treasure chest, the whole game shuts done. If I try to continue the game, it just does it again so I can finish any games.

I really enjoy this game, every part of it, except... this game is obviously biased towards the AI. I wasn't going to write a review, but I have started to notice that the AI can magically move the robber without rolling a 7 or playing a resource card in C&K. This is extremely irritating, especially late game.
I downloaded the islands update and see no way to play it. Please help
replyContent: Hi Frank, you should find the "Islands" in the overview of all the scnearios when starting a custom match.

content: Update forced on me has several very noticeable glitches: the dice very stilted at roll and usually land on one set of #'s and then change; even more geared to AI winning by ganging up on the human and stealing what few recourses the human does get. Very tempted to remove game from all my devices!
Would be 4-5 stars, but when I pay for a game I expect the whole game.
Cant find a game.
replyContent: Hi Nick, please contact our support via android@usm.de and describe your issue a littlebit more detailed. I am sure we will find a solution.

content: Love the game, but AI mode is so cheap anytime you get close to winning either a crap ton of sevens and knights appear to drain you of any resources because AI only takes from you, even when you have no resources left or magically the odds of probability go against any number you have, have had houses on 5-10 and did not get a resource for 3 straight rounds, while magically the AI has 10-15 each and never does a 7 appear unless you have >8 and will win. Game is totally rigged, not worth the $.

Fun game but the save game function doesn't work correctly. If I try to start a new game and have to quit before I finish, I select the save game option. When I start it back up though it takes me back to the first game I ever played, not my most recent save.
replyContent: Hi Zach, is this about the progress in the campaign? If so, we integrated a possibility to jump to any scenario of the campaign.You can find a detailled description of what to to here on googleplay in our store text (on the very bottom) or contact us via android@usm.de.

content: Perfect

Used to have this game on this phone a while ago. So when I saw it pop up thought I'd install it again for another round. It will download but not install.    DON'T WORRY ABOUT A FIX AS I AM PLAYING SOMEONE ELSE'S GAME NOW.
replyContent: Hi D Petts, please contact our support via android@usm.de and give our team some info about your device and mybe send us a screenshot of the situation where this error message is promted.

content: Gameplay is fine and true to the original, but the app has many bugs that mess with play and are annoying. Additionally, the UI is quite small and hard to read, even on a Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 10.1".
This game destroys my battery, (nexus 6p) can take it down 10% in 20 mins. Continues to do so until force closed

Game is fluid and works fine. However the game needs to implement a system for players that leave games. In the last several days I've only finished a few games with all original players. If I was to quit I could join another match instantly. Something should be done to penalize quitters. Secondly, it would be nice to communicate with players easierly than emoticons. I usually just want to say HURRY UP AND FINISH YOUR TURN YOU HAVE 3 RESOURCES AND NO DEVELOPMENT CARDS WTH IS TAKING SO LONG
Original game great. C&k great. BTW don't buy the new expansions. It's too gimmicky, and not fun at all.
I love Catan but the recent update which I downloaded today July 28th 2016 has caused a bug that shuts it down middle of my custom games hope they fix it soon
Great game
After making several game purchases the game shuts off randomly.

This game is a blast; the tutorials give you a reasonably quick, interactive guide to the basics of gameplay and there are a few different game modes included to shake things up. A great game for commuters since it'll run happily offline too.
replyContent: Hi Clancy, thanks for updating your review. Enjoy the App!

content: Wasted 5$ on this crap, do not buy!

I loved this app, but now there's a mysterious prompt to download an additional 40mb in graphics. There's no way I'm doing that. You want to update your game? Do it through the play store. Dodgy... Uninstall.
replyContent: Hi Kelly, if you are installing the game for the first time (or again) the donwload of the additional data is necessary. These additional data only include grafic assets in the proper resolution for your device.

content: It now works.
replyContent: Hi Jason, thanks for udpdating your review!

content: I love this game but a fix is needed for the dice rolls. I was robbed 9 times in two rounds by 7s and the knights. Don't pee on my pants and tell me it is raing that there is nothing wrong!

All in all I like the game and think it works well. I have to agree with a couple of comments that I have seen and say that the AI obsession with development cards is irritating. I haven't found that it wins them games often, but, between them almost always choosing you to put the robber on and them having all of the knights, I have had games where I haven't been able to play anything for 6 or more rounds in a row. This can really suck the fun out of the game.
The forced update has made the game glitch, crash, and run like it is on an old 286. Really appreciate it if this can be fixed ASAP because the game is unplayable.
Crashes on every robber
replyContent: Hi Boyd, please contact our support via android@usm.de and describe the issue in greater detail. It is possible you have to choose which player you want to rob if you place it on a tile with two adjacent settlements. You can do so by taping on the settlement in the players colour you want to rob.

content: True to game. Love it!

I have had this installed for years, this new update with new boards is a great improvement, but about 4 of the new boards crash before you get done and will not allow to play more. Cannot finish the board.
This is such a great game. I just wish there were more senarios in the cities and knights setting.
Love catan!
Best boardgames excellently executed

This game was great for years, and I was enjoying the extra scenarios after paying for the full version.  Then it auto-upgraded, and now it doesn't go a minute without crashing.  This is making me very upset.
Making the game crash since the late update 😞

Love the game despite a very biased AI, the game has several bugs, but the latest one is REALLY annoying. Every second game (usually one in which I'm winning) the game just crashes with the message "Unfortunately, Catan has stopped." Even after closing the Catan and restarting the same game it just crashes straight away... seriously expect more for my money.
Online spiele sind aber immer noch zu langsam
Good play on the board game.
Force update deletes all your settings. Trade animation when offering a deal takes the whole trade screen away, extremely annoying. Did you even test it?
AI focuses user to hard.
There is no such thing as fair ... they rig it to give the computer extra rolls .... sad cause it would B a great game if they didn't cheat
I had to download the new data today and now it crashes mid-game.
Current version crashes. Please address this bug in the update.

There should be a timer that stops people from not playing for whatever reason. Thirty seconds timer would be the best. The "voting a player out" option sometimes comes very late, or it does not come up at all, or the other players do not give the same vote. If someone is reconnecting and we are transfered to the original page, someone can choose not to click the " I am ready" button and therefore we cannot enter the game. An option should also be added there. Online championships should be available to all
Since the last update,  I have not been able to finish a game without the game crashing.   This is really disappointing.   On a Pixel C.
replyContent: Hi Sidharath, please contact our support via android@usm.de and describe the issue in greater detail.

content: Is there an update? The game is great and works fine on my phone but on the tablet the select or purchase development cards goes dark/invisible about half way through every game and you can't see if there are still any cards and you can't see or play the ones you have. Super annoying.
replyContent: Hi Jon, have you tried to set the animation speed to ultra and deactivate the autozoom? This workaround helped other players with similar dispay issues.

content: Everyone is right about the roll matching the hex the robber just got put on every single time... as long as it's yours, and also about the AI cheating every time you get ahead. Despite that, it's 5 starts again when it starts working again.
Paid game has so many expansions
Great
It's a fun game but it stops working randomly and won't let me exit out of a current game without closing the app. Pretty lame for having to pay for it.  Please fix, then I'll give a higher rating!
Requires a 38mB download every time I start the app, which takes FOREVER.  Haven't even been able to play it. Don't bother.
What game there is is relatively fun, but I was disappointed that the majority of maps require an additional fee that is considerably higher than the price of the app itself.
Awesome guys!
Works well but AI will willing trade with itself but not so much with you. Bug report: Often I will agree to a trade and the program thinks I canceled the trade.

I love Catan and I think this is a good edition, however there are problems. The AI, even on Easy at the start of Campaigns, will stack Development Cards far too much. Also the game lost my saves so I must start again. Not fun.
Almost every game I'm in, when someone starts winning, everyone else abandons the game. There needs to be a penalty or scoring system like with ticket to ride which discourages that.
App works great. Not as much fun playing an AI
With so many other boardgames with bad AI I thought it should be known it's good in this game. It isn't rare to be defeated by it. It's not a sucker for bad trades. It knows who to put the robber on.
Great game but Windows version is better

AI makes dumb trades all game, when you try to trade it only excepts stupid crap. Good trades never work. AI does not know how the robber works, keeps putting it in the exact place it moves from. Just horrible. If you wanna play it BUY THE ACTUAL GAME.
Everything about it is awesome! Best money ive ever spent on a game for my phone. And to the people saying the robots cheat, stop being sour losers because it is not rigged at all!
replyContent: Hi Mariena, if you place the robber on a tile with adjacent settlements of more than one opponent you have to choose who you want to rob by clicking on the respective settlement. If you should have further issues with  the robber, please contact our support via andorid@usm.de .

content: I'd LIKE to enjoy this app, but I paid for it, downloaded it, and it won't let me login......and support won't reply to my emails.  I'd gladly change this rating if this is amended, but currently it seems the only way I might get in touch
Descriptions are not clear, interface is not intuitive and good luck bringing up the in game menu.
love that game BUT after swapping from galaxy note2 to galaxy J1 I can't download. will give 4.5☆ after fixing or 5☆ after implementing an ingame chat.

I've played the board game for many years and love it. This game is fun and operates how it should for the most part. However, there are 25 scenarios and I can't get past level 16 of the Seafarers expansion even though I've beaten it twice now. This is a longer scenario lasting up to 18 VPs. I want to play the other 9. Also, it would be nice to play older maps again.
replyContent: Hi Scott, you have already beaten the campaign mode. To play the other scenarios, enter the Custom Game mode and create a single player or local multiplayer game using one of the scenarios avaiable. You are also able to jump to certain scenarios of the Campaign mode by using the "cheat" method explained in the description here on Google Play.

content: I have always enjoyed this game when I was a little kid! Never have had any issues with this game besides one irritating issue. The AI stocks up on Development Cards and win the game because they have 4+ victory point cards. Sometimes the dice rolls can be questionable like when three's were rolled four times in a row and the computer won when all I needed was a six or an eight. Ohh well, part of the game and can't always be an easy victory. Overall, great game and hope more updates to come!!

Game is good. Me and my friends play the board game. This app is good, but what it seems to be missing is an offline-mode for multiplayer. I.e use the local wifi / blutooth rather than relying on the internet. That way i could play this on the train (why i bought it) with friends and not have it cut out every 5 minutes, which is annoying.
replyContent: Hi Adam, it is also possible to play a "hotseat" mode by choosing more then one human player in the Custom Game mode. Up to 4 human players can play by passing one device.

content: 1. Everyone just leaves when they're losing. 2. Often everything gets out of order and it seems the server can't keep up. Just played 5 or 6 games over the last day or so... All forced me to quit cause the dice wouldn't roll on my turn. In one game a player left and was replaced by AI but then the AI just never took their turn. 3. Playing against AI comes up with some suspicious dice rolling and trades. 5 sevens in a row...? I want to love it but you don't get much for your purchase.
Often gets stuck in "syncing game data" and that ruins the experience.
I like it a lot
Interface is very hard on the eyes, borderline unplayable. User interaction is easy but not intuitive . Overall it's a subpar implementation of a quality game.

It's very limited, seems to crash a lot & is missing some basic programmed options, i.e. being able to quickly back out of a trade proposal while the 'pinwheel of death' keeps you waiting. The computer's primary strategy is to amass Development Cards, by which it often wins with VP cards.

I liked the game but dislike the paywall and how the 3 bots proceed to steal all your stuff lategame. It's not uncommon for the robber to be moved between your two tiles for half the game and bots stealing 3-4 resources per turn from you
Going into airplane mode enables you to buy as many development cards as you can before timeout. Leaves you with negative resources.
Very much enjoyed it.

Well lack thereof. This doesn't have random dice rolls. I've purchased all the available dlc for this game. I love catan but cannot stand this rendition. It's simple... add true randomness to the rolls.
Game requires WiFi to download game data EVERY single time it's opened?! Why can't it just download once and save so I can play offline? Fix this for 5 stars

Why am I only getting the 'Lite' version of the game after I just paid $5. I totally get having to pay extra for the expansions but i should have accces to all the scenarios of seafarers for my $5. Also to hijack campaign mode and tie it to an expansion buy is not acceptable to me. Nowhere did I read any of this prior to my purchase

I have played several games using random AI opponents.  While it does seem that they buy development cards at a faster pace than human players might, I was able to win multiple times.  I think they do a very good job approximating the challenge level of live opponents.  It was definitely worth the $4 considering the board game is $50.
Cannot get past the tutorial trading, it tells me to upgrade to a city and the button to do that is gone and nothing ever happens. Re-installed twice still happens.

Great Catan game as always, online was as smooth as can be. Only problem was we rolled a 4 and then a 9 a total of 13 times in a row. 90% of the rolls were those two numbers, made a boring, one sided game.
The bots will not trade with you, but do trade with each other.  I will be losing and they put the robber on me instead of the leader.  It is not enjoyable to be constantly beaten upon.
Dice rolls in the campaign are not random. Reply any scenario and track dice rolls. This is a huge deal breaker in game mechanics. Why anyone would be so lazy in coding this way is far beyond me.

I bought this intending to play it in free moments against the AI. But the design is pathetic. To make it "challenging", the AI always work specifically against the player even when the player is in the worst position. 12 times the robber hit players, 10 were against me. The AI blatantly work together to block road and progress. And trade with the one on the cusp of winning to put them over the top. This was a poor purchasing decision on my part.
Robots always win, no matter how much of an advantage you have against them.
Menu disappears during the tutorial for trading, unable to continue. Shame because it otherwise looks like a good app.
This is the first dumb game which I'm unable to play in my phone case which also serves as a stand, because it won't rotate. So I have to hold my phone constantly in my hands or flat on the table.
Once you master tendencies, you will win 80% of the time. Game is really addicting though.

Very addictive but the AI seems to unfairly and exclusively target the human player even when you are doing poorly. It gets to the point that I don't want to play any more because there are long stretches of just being robbed. I would prefer an option to turn off the robber or maybe limit the number of times you can be robbed. Solid game otherwise.

hello, iv'e installed all the expansions, and it says that i would get 16 sea-farers senarios, 6 C&K senarios and The New senarios expansions.  Nevertheless;  The senarios ends at senario 10 in Seafarers and senarios 4 C&K  How do i get the additional senarios?
replyContent: Hi or k, you can find all the scenarios you bought when creating a costum match. Open the list of all avaiable scenarios via the button with the 4 green squares. Please note that the campagin includes a selection of all the scenarios you purchased with the expansions.

content: AI rigged
Great adaptation of the board game. My only complaint is how expensive the additional content is. $8.99 is pretty steep
Very often the controls disapear it makes the game unplayable. Waste of money
replyContent: Hi Tomasz, please try to alter the animation speed to ultra and turn of the autozoom in the game settings. This workaround helped other useres.

content: The game itself is soo good but the programmers where drunk when they done it! There's so many stupid annoying errors. I go over ten points and I dont win, but the stupid computer gets to 9 points and it wins....

Buy this game if you want to be completely annoyed with the AI. NEVER FAILS...you will be ahead and each AI will roll a 7 and rob you. EVERY TIME. Im not saying over the course of several turns they will roll a 7...no. each one will roll a 7 more and more the further ahead you get. Bs
I tried tons of different emails,usernames, and passwords and won't register on multiplayer, just says username or email is already in use. Pls fix
Great game! Please continue to make additional Campaigns and Scenarios.
replyContent: Hi Darin, if you should experience issues with the online registration, please contact our support via adnroid@usm.de .

content: I was really enjoying multiplayer, and then all of a sudden today it gets stuck on the connecting screen. I downloaded the update, no change. :(

I love this game it's a convenient way to play catan whenever you want. However, the computer glitches are driving me insane! When playing against the computer it gets away with things, consistently, e.i. computer had 7 progressive cards in its hand and was never made to discard one I had 5 and had to. The computer then proceeded to use all 7 progressive cards against me which made me almost throw my phone. Anyways yeah computer glitches need to be fixed asap!
Very  Fun  to  play
It used to work but it suddenly stopped letting me go past scenario 4 on knights mode! please fix!
Dice cheat.

I really think I could love this game if I could only learn to play...as a couple of other reviewers have said, when going through the trading tutorial it tells you to select the build menu to build a city. But the problem is that the menu tab that is supposed to be on the right, is nowhere to be found. There's no way to progress through the rest of the tutorial if you want a complete understanding of the game. Fix this and my review stars go up.

I don't want to share my google contacts nor my device history. Also the first and only game I play the AI trolled me hard by waiting many turns with 18 to 20+ resource cards and sending the theif on me every second turn. At the last second before my winning turn, builds a city and has an extra point card. Lose the troll AI. Uninstalled. Call me a rage quitter, but that just was not a fun game at all! Gaming should reward the player not beat them into submission on the first go.

All of the bots you play gang up on you and as soon as you start winning the only numbers that you get are the ones the bots put the robber on. The game is stacked against you 100% of the time and the bots would sooner help another both win than stop ganging up on you. Online is laggy. This is definitely a game that should stay on the table top and not be played through the phone where boys know exactly what you have and exactly how to hit you, not to make all bots win, but to just make you lose.

I haven't finished a game in ages as something always goes wrong when playing!!! Incredibly frustrating, needs more measures to ensure that games can be finished regardless of glitches or human fault such as people leaving the game. At the moment it is more frustrating than fun.

The game play itself is good however the menus are kind of confusing. Online mode is also very lacking as it requires all players to actively be playing instead of allowing for them to come and go as time allows. You can also tell who has what resources by if your trades are instantly denied or not.

Lots of fun and additing, but I'm disappointed to see no updates in over a year. Quite a few bugs need fixing. No matter how hard you try, AI comments can't be turned off (it might work once or twice, but that's it). Weird save game glitches, scoreing glitches. Building settlements where players roads intersect doesn't work, whereas the official rules say this is fine, etc. I could go on. Please don't abandon us!
Downloaded in on my new Galaxy tab and it wants to download/connect to fricken google games every time I open it! I downloaded it for when i go travelling and its absolutely useless!

I hope there will be more update in the future. To fix the two sections of the tutorials where the tools menu dissappear and robbery completely unaccessible. This could be a popular app, just need abit polishing.

Can't even finish a game. So clunky. People drop out all the time. These Catan folks will never manage to make a good online game. Pity. Actually in many respects the old version was better. Old one was at least playable.

DON'T BUY this game. Full of little annoying glitches that never seem to get fixed. You don't even get the full game you get 1 boring map. Extremely annoying and I'm pretty sure this game gave me cancer. Again I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone. DON'T BUY
Very much like the board game, really enjoy playing it. I just hope the AI was a bit more competetive and diffcult to beat.
Great game buggy implementation. Menus stop showing half way through game
replyContent: If you should have issues with the proper display of menus, please try to alter the animation speed to ultra and deactivate the "Auto-Zoom" in the main menu. This workaround helped other useres in the past.

content: Lots of fun.

I really loved the game until the newest update. I play on a tablet and it's become so tiny. Can't read it really. AND THE BATTERY IS DRAINING LIKE CRAZY!!! I tested it a couple of times. 50% down in 10 min. I'm serious. And NOTE that I'm playing in Airplane Mode!!!! This is an outrage!
replyContent: Hi Thaido, are you using any kind of interface modification or a custom Android version on your device? If you could provide some details to our support team at android@usm.de we'll try to sort out the issues you're describing. Furthermore you are able to restore your campaign progress by using the cheat codes described in the FAQ.

content: UI vanishes in the middle of a game, making it unplayable. You can still click on the invisible cards to play them, but it sucks.
replyContent: Hi Bill, please try to alter the animation speed to ultra and deactivate the "Auto-Zoom" in the main menu. This workaround helped other useres in the past.

content: Each time my turn came to move the robber, the game stops and players are waiting for me. But i dont have any button to move. This is payed game how come it is not playable?
replyContent: Hi Dipto, you can drag and drop the robber to move him to the tile you want. After you moved him a checkmark should be displayed at the right side of the screen. If you need further info please contact our support via android@usm.de

content: Have been playing this game for ages. Very addictive. Strategy definately plays a big part, particularly when dealing with the AI players. My advice is always keep a knight card up your sleeve.
My only issue is there are sometimes weird glitches where you'll deny a trade and it will happen anyway. Or you'll agree to a trade and the NPC will trade with a different NPC instead.
Great strategy game!
I'm using a tablet to play it. The font in the game is so tiny!!!!! Can you make it bigger please!!!!
It requires me to "download additional game file" every time my Nexus 7 2013 restarts; frustrating if I don't have wifi. Otherwise, great adaption of board game version.
Roads cannot be placed on the lower portion of the island.  Too bad because I like the game.

Have you ever played a game of risk where all other players team up and hunt you down? Playing against the AI will seem like this! The AI will constantly place the robber on your resources. If you are holding more than 7 cards, you WILL roll a 7 on your go. The AI will not trade with you, yet will bend over backwards for the other AI teams that are about to win. It does seem like you are actually playing 1 person who gets 3 turns to your 1, and 3 times as much resources. This game needs to be rebalanced!!
Lots of maps and you can edit victory points and other things to keep things fresh. I really like it.
Downloaded the new version and it's much better. However, it says we should have some expansions and they are not available in the game (though it says installed).
replyContent: Dear Erin, thank you for updating your review!

content: I love the game. The game keeps crashing. Everytime I go to open my saved game it exits out of it. So I can't even play my saved games

Good game but as I get closer to winning the scenarios I feel the game makes in harder to win. Your numbers stopped being rolled, and other players' key resource numbers are rolled over and over. The thief is played almost every turn except when the computer is gathering cards to beat you. Makes the game play frustrating at times.

As a mobile port of the board game, it's great. Just don't play against the AI unless you enjoy being ganged up on by 2 or 3 people. Don't you dare feed me the "You can change the difficulty to easy!" line. The same onslaught happens regardless of what you're playing on. The AI takes every opportunity to bugger you silly while happily trading and co-operating with themselves. I'm getting my money back.

I love passing the time with this game, and I have the expansions, but one frustrating glitch I've had to endure over and over again is screen freezing. In particular, I've noticed it on the "Move Ship" option during my turn. I can't click on anything, including the x or checkmark. I have to then shut down my tablet and restart. Otherwise, I like playing this game.
More payments to be made as the first menu item.. Not okay

The game is addicting. It cheats in several ways. The 7 does roll too often. Especially, when the human is in the lead. The AI will take 2 extra resources just because it needs them to buy a development card or build. Once William had one resource and no development cards on his roll, received no cards from the roll, yet he took 2 resources and bought a development card. Huh? I've been shorted resources on a roll. Though the cheating hasn't stopped me from playing. We play on difficult and win about 90%.
Great game but the ai is severely lacking and it chews through battery harder than any other app I have ever used.
Very buggy, and the online is awful.Not worth the buy.
I bought the C&K + Seafarers combo, but did not receive the scenarios that it advertises.  Just want my purchase to be complete.  Will not buy any expansions until this is resolved.
replyContent: Hi Jeremy, please contact our support via android@usm.de. This issues should be resolved very easily.

content: It makes me DL a 38 mB file every time... please make it stop.
replyContent: Hi Andrew, please contact our technical support via andoird@usm.de and describe the issue in greater detail.

content: I love the game but almost every time I play on my Nexus 5X it crashes.  It's always when the computer player has to pick what resource it wants from a gold space. It just gets caught in a loop and won't let the game progress. I have screen shots if needed.  Please fix my friends and I love it, but it's just too frustrating to keep doing to ourselves

The app crashes and restarts regularly(even when playing offline), and online play is so glitchy it is practically unusable on the Google Pixel C and Nexus 7. Our router , ISP, and wifi are not causing our problems. When you pay this much for an app, you expect it to work properly. So disappointed, because it would be fun otherwise. Another little suggestion - don't just offer people the option to stop all trades until your next turn. Sometimes I just want to stop trading with that particular opponent. Would be nice to have that option. This app has potential, but not without the major bugs being worked out. Likely not worth the money.
You have to make this game work offline!!! I can't play on the airplane :(
replyContent: Hi Matios, you can play the game offline aigainst the AI or via "hotseat" on one device with up to 3 other human players.  Check the options when setting up a costum game.

content: Like a

Disgraceful AI. It purposely robs you even when you are no threat. It never trades with you yet it trades with other ai. I've lost to an AI player that had 4 voctory points. It very much damages the board game that you really enjoy so if you like like the board game stick to the real thing otherwise you will end up wasting your money to just uninstall this game like I did
I think the random dice generator is broken.  4 games with 80% 3 rolls? It seems there is to much consistency with certain numbers.

which is too bad because Catan as a game is fantastic. Tutorial is poorly written and not helpful. The app freezes up often. There is no way to communicate with other players. Players can leave a match at any time and not be penalized, and leaving the match often causes the app to glitch, therefore causing others players to quit. When a player disconnects during a trade offer the game is stuck in limbo for 10 minutes, forcing you to exit the game and then guess what... it ends the match. Sigh.

My bf bought the game so we could play against each other but we quit out of frustration in the middle of the first game. It kept saying I'd lost my connection but we were on the same WiFi. It was completely unplayable like that. I'm really disappointed that he spent the money only to find out it was super glitchy. Side note: the menu button for all the gameplay options is right beside my home button. I'm constantly clicking away accidentally
Does not work on my tablet
But it needs a better treading

A friend recommended this app, and the price was reasonable.  However, after opening the installed game, I was informed that an additional 50 MB needed to be installed to run the game.  You're kidding!  What an incredibly, inefficiently written piece of junk code this thing is!  And that's just for the base game...  Until it's trimmed down to at least half its present 70+MB size, I'm not going to bother with a bloated, 20-year-old game.
The AI players are almost all too difficult. I would enjoy a wider range of abilities to choose from.

All seemed fine on 1st game until I had to move that matey. It doesn't seem possible to progress from that point. Anybody else encountered this playing on Android? Against Ai.            Edit: my bad. Swipe up from the bottom and press the tick
Four dollars only gets you the light version. You have to buy campaigns in-game for an additional four dollars a pop.
An expensive game to start with.  The first thing you see when you start the game is a load more even more expensive add-ons.  I'll pass, thanks.
Now available on app. Best game ever

The auto generator for the board does a really bad job distributing the tiles evenly for the game. The end result is someone having a power house with brick or rock and everyone else struggling like a huckleberry in a paddle boat. Start making it more even tile distribution or let us pick where to put tiles. This is a really serious problem. I lay awake for hours at night and this usually puts me to sleep. Not anymore, now I write harsh reviews.

I have the full game. All the expansions. Both boxed and digital. This is a good way to learn to play. That being said, any changes to difficulty or opponent selection have little effect on the computer opponents. Setting dice mode to stack its about the only real change you can make to the difficulty to assist yourself. I have won some campaigns but it's never "easy". I enjoy a challenge, but come on dudes, not every round needs to be a beat down.
I also have the disappearing menu bug. Cannot finish the tutorial
I still haven't been able to launch the game after many tries,  uninstall and install again etc.  Samsung s6 latest Android update.  Solution or refund.
replyContent: Hi Daniel, do you use a steady WiFi connection to download the additional Data? Also please make sure to have enough storage space on your device. If you need further support please contact us via android@usm.de .

content: I have 14 gb of free space on my sd card and it says I dont have enough space
replyContent: Hi Timothy,  please contact our support via andoird@usm.de. I am sure we will find a solution for your that.

content: Had to refund.  The menu button is not visible on my s7 edge, so I can't build or trade or anything.  Disappointing.  Will repurchase if it's fixed.

The game is awesome. However, zshpuld improve the connection. The game should at some feature like able to link more phones (through wifi or Bluetooth or at friends mood) to play custome with their friends this can help to level up the satisfaction from players.

After more than 60 games with over 4500 dice rolls, the dice statistics graph doesn't look like it should. Instead of increasing from 2 to 7, then decreasing to 12, it's got 4 and 10 rolled more than 5 and 9, and 6 and 8 rolled more than 7. I have a screen cap of my dice stats page if the devs want to see it. I understand that game-to-game the dice rolls will be random, however after 4500 it should look fairly uniform. Other than that the game is perfect, the AI doesn't "cheat", they are just challenging.
The game has its share of bugs from tutorials locking up, to not being able to do the 2:1 trades.  It needs a lot more polish.  I have the board game and had hope for this one...
3.99 for the game "expansions" cost more such as the - this includeds extra maps and campaign mode. The game is ok. Takes up alot of space, install then have to install more.

For a family that seems to be moving farther apart as the kids grow up, this is a great adaptation of a hallmark of my childhood. The online play is great, and surprisingly smooth.  When family can't play, I love the option to play the campain.  The A.I.s present a challenge, and even experienced players will have to be careful.  My only gripe is that some of the extra expansions are only available for local play.  In my opinion, this game is well worth the 10 dollars it costs for the base game and the expansions.

Game hangs up randomly, no 6 player maps available, paid expansions only include Cities & Knights and Seafarers. Also: locked screen rotation? Really? Anyone who has real friends is better off playing the actual board game.
Devs responded to my issues and now it works great
replyContent: Hi Tim, thank you very much for updating your review. Enjoy the app.

content: The game has great potential and is somewhat fun, but the AI makes errors that destroy the game. Such as the way cards get distributed, menu missing in some tutorials, and the worst of all is the robber steal resources from me when I have no settlements near it. AI almost always refuses trade and seems to always get the victory points. Also be warned, even though your paying 3.99 for the game, it might as well be free. You only get 1 map to play and the core game. All other maps and expansions are IAP.
Games been crashing a lot lately. Also, I suggest the developer to add an emoticon of "zZZ" because some players take too long of a time or forget to hit the dice button.
replyContent: Hi Jenny, thanks for the feedback. You are able to hold more then seven ressource cards if you have build a city wall in the C&K expansions.

content: This game is so awesome. A lot of strategy to win
Computers rob you exclusively, please fix this
Constantly glitches unable to connect to server kicks you off from mobile device
I love catan and the gameplay is great... when it's not being a pain. Takes a heap of attempts to click I'm ready and then sometimes just crashes. A few more updates and it will be good i hope
Freezes often and sometimes there are errors when trading

Enjoy playing the game, and have played it hundreds of times, enough to say with complete certainty that the game is rigged and that the computer AI cheats with abandon. During a game with only computer opponents, if the robber is moved to a high value space occupied by the human player, there is a significantly high, completely nonrandom, likelihood that the very next roll of the dice will be that very same high value number. Proof to me that either this kind of cheating is intentionally built in to frustrate players or that there is an overlooked bug.
The game cheats in computer mode... I rolled 3 7's in a row, unrealistic.
Build menu tab doesn't load properly in tutorial.  Cpu A.I. button doesn't load in custom game. The game is unplayable... How do I get my $5 back?
It's a nice.
Garbage
Stuck in the tutorial
I love this game but I sometimes can't start the game. Just a black screen then it goes back to my Homescreen. That's why I don't give 5 stars

The AI characters in campaign mode very rarely use the robber against each other, even when it would be in their favor such as when one is leading or in a better resource position.  They play knight cards almost every round and move the robber back and forth between my tiles.  It has sucked all the enjoyment out of the game and I don't play as much.  When the game isn't fun, it only gets 1 star.
Stupid
Still waiting for T&B and E&P

Merchant disappears per world quit, "Great Canal" canal graphics don't update per continued game (completed canal graphics, to be exact), C&K Greater Catan has 2 wool harbors and 0 grain harbors, Greater Catan (3) and (4) rules out of order

The game is great, but whenever I play against AIs and I use a Knight card or roll a seven I can move the robber and hit the green check mark but then I can't go anywhere from there. I always have to close the app and re-enter the game and hope I don't roll another seven. I'm on the Droid Turbo. Please fix this!
Was not expecting some access to expansions

Absolutely ridiculous A.I. settings in this game but overall well-developed app. Been playing Catan for years but not recommended platform if you've never played Catan before--not a lot of how-to instructions up front.
Great game

The menu and featutes should be improved. First of all, there should be an option for starting a 3player or 4 player game. Sometimes you press ok with 3 players in the room and the 4th appears in the last second and you have to play 4player game. Another issue is with the opponents leaving the game when loosing. Leavers spoil the fun of others and there should be some kind of consequences for doing that. Also, the system for players taking too long doesnt work well.
The random generator behind the dice emulation is a complete disaster. Makes game completely unusable.
I reached 10 vp and even though the rule was first to 10 the game did not end!! Second time this happened...
This game is awesome. Bought all the expansions!

Driven to playing with the bots because the human games are ruined by those who quit when they won't win. And the bots cheat. No matter how well you play or how far back they are, they will always have three or four knight cards for every one you obtain and enough victory cards to snatched victory out from under you. Unless you want to play knowing the programmers have stacked the game against you DON'T BUY, DON'T PLAY. Never again for me. They did something I never dreamed possible - made me HATE Catan.
Addicted to this  game!

I think I will like this game and just spent money on it. But now I can't play because the tutorial is unfunishable. menu keeps disappearing on the trading tatorial. it that get fix I do think this will be a good game though until then wasted my money on it.

Warning if you get frustrated easily this game will cheat on you the moment you get any kind of lead all the computer players will start rolling sevens and they only steal from you. Also keep an eye on the cards because that's all the computer will buy. The computer will not trade with you but expects you to train every turn
Like other reviewers, my in-game menu disappears during the trading tutorial, making the game unplayable as I can't finish learning how to play it.
replyContent: Hi Andrew, please trie to alter the animation speed to ultra and turn off the auto zoom. Some useres with similar issues reported this workaround did the job for them.

content: I don't recommend paying for this version of the game if you are wanting to learn it because you cannot get past the tutorials!  In the Trading tutorial, you're walked through how to make a trade and then asked to open the building menu to build a city...BUT THEN THE MENU DISAPPEARS AND YOU HAVE TO CLOSE THE GAME AND RESTART. Totally disappointed I paid $3.99 for a game I can't even learn fully how to play :( but it's already paid for so I doubt anything will get done about it.
Great game and it would be a big 5 star rating if the audio wouldnt be glitched! Just for notice im using lg g3 and i have to turn off my audio when i play the game and that irritates me!
Game crashes when I try and access online play. Very disappointing. Please fix!

content: I really enjoy the game, however it is a real battery killer.
Good game except in the campaign I'm at level 18 and have played it several times and won but won't advance. Need to fix this!

Love Catan but there is a bug in online play.  When you are playing with another person plus two AI players and the roll is a number where one of the AI players receives a gold (pick resource of your chouce), the game freezes.  Plz fix this issue.  Thanks.
This is an improvement in interface and aesthetics compared to other electronic versions.  However the game is buggy; I haven't been able to finish a game yet.  Please fix, I am a big Catan fan.
Great game. Play with family

The tutorial tells me to build a city and   there is no option to do so. There is no way to exit the tutorial besides closing the app. If the tutorial was so difficult for the developer to do, I can't imagine how many flaws will pop up while playing the actual game.  Hopefully I can Lear to play the game and enjoy it besides the terrible tutorial.

Total battery and memory eater... You can't play anything outside the tutorials. Online mode doesn't retrieve started games to the level saved, times out... Very disappointed.... Loved the board game but this is not worthed:(

Love this game, and own every version of it, but would you be able to create some new scenarios/boards? The Enchanted island and great canal are so cool, but after a while you want to play something different!
Unable to loggon to play with other real people online. Waste of money...
replyContent: Hi Puck, please contact our support via android@usm.de. We will set up an account for you in no time.

content: Pay for the "game" only to find out you have to pay even more money to have any kind of campaign.
This is a really awesome game, but the only problem is that the buddy list is REALLY buggy! It's a shame. Would play it much more if it would be fixed!
How can I to continue a campaign? New campaign forces to erase previous game state which was not finished or lost ... and there is no any continue button ...

The game is generally great.  Where it lacks is in the online play.  The game is supposed to have a search function to be able to find friends who also have the app to make a 'buddy list' but the search function only searches WITHIN your buddy list making it useless to find other users. For example there is no way for me to find my wife who just got the app to add to my buddy list to play private games
replyContent: Hi Scott, you can add friends by opening the buddy list and tab on the little window which says "Username". After entering the username of your friend you can add him or her to your buddy list by tapping on the green symbol. The search in the buddy list is global. Please make sure to enter the exact username  in order to find your friends.

content: This was a great way to get my Catan fix between actual board game happenings.... but since the last update the AI is banking on victory point cards and it just isn't fun anymore when the ai wins every time with 3 victory point cards.

The game is a good port from the board game, but the knights & cities expansion is buggy. The victory point totals arbitrarily change and don't calculate correctly all the time.  The game also is missing some cancel buttons for issues (like selecting a ship or road). I've you make a choice, you can't back out of it. The software team doesn't seem to look to correct these issues in a timely way either. This still continues today. It hasn't been fixed.
Feels like the dice are rigged, especially playing against the computer. Playing against other people is better than against the computer as it's 3 against 1 and not 4 equal players
Won't let me place a legitimate road  or settlement.
replyContent: Hi Richard, please contact our support via android@usm.de and describe your issue in greater detail.

content: Ita good. Buy it.
Rooting freezes while starting up are costing it a star. Once running it's fine.
Expansion packs over priced
It's a fun game, but the controls in this are terrible - confusing or counterintuitive, not very responsive, sometimes broken.

Having the app on my phone is great. My bf and I play while we wait for meals at restaurants and such. When I play one player with 3 computers though it's like playing Mario kart 64 in terms of how rigged it is for the ai. I just finished a round where I had a solid lead, 9 victory points where the computers were all down at 5. Then not one, but 3 turns in a row all the computers rolled only sevens (so 9 sevens in 12 rolls, seems unlikely) so I literally could do nothing.  Fix the unfair dice please.
Pretty good. I am new to Catan. Wish the Almanac has more pictures in it. Also, not sure what the different symbols mean in the player's info while playing.

content: Want to find another so similar cos I've spent countless hours on this one!! Love the campaign too! Just gets a bit easy after a while

Love this app. I have the table top version, but my family never wants to play. I bought this and all of the expansions. Now I don't need my family. The app does have trouble launching. I play almost everyday, and 2 or 3 times a week I have to close and launch multiple times before I finally get the menu.

Bought the game and played a custom game with 3 other friends.. Within 4 or 5 moves someone rolled a 7.. One person got rid of 4 of their cards which worked fine but once the robber was moved the UI disappeared and you cannot complete the game... Waste of money.
Crashes on start

content: This app works great on my Samsung Galaxy 6, but it is really glitchy on my Tab S. Unfortunately, I am not able to accept and confirm the move when I play a progress card. The screen freezes and I can't make any more moves. The only way to move on is to restart the game, and not use that card.  It happens with many cards.  Please fix!
replyContent: Hi Elaine, you can try to set the animation speed to ultra and deactivate the auto zoom. For some players this workaround has proven to be helpfull in order to resolve issues with the UI.

content: Buyer beware they steal your money by asking you to pay for an expansion so the actual campaign is locked even after you pay for the game. This is extremely unethical and ridiculous, do not waste your time or your money here. Not only that but Catan has been replaced by far better games in the BG world.

Be wary of my words before you set down the road to purchasing this computer based version of the game Catan, for you may not hear them again... It was about six months ago when I saw this version of the game, thirty whole dollars cheaper than the physical version of the game. It beckoned me. I purchased the game, checked that it was an actual version of the game and not a facsimile and then spent another ten dollars an all the various DLC and bonus missions and quite contently started playing against four of the AI players. Little did I know at the time that it was not that simple. It wasn't a surprise to me when I lost the first few games against some of the middle difficulty AIs. After a few of these games I decided to get better through the "Missions" that you gain after purchasing the game and started playing the tutorial. Oh, what a fool I was as I clicked through the tutorial messages and started playing against the two easiest AI characters in the game.  I placed my settlements in the best places I found and, much to my astonishment lost. I lost again and again and again. Weeks past by me, months past by  me in my dreams I could see the AI players, they were taunting me.

I have played this over 20 hours and come to the conclusion that to make it competitive the program is designed using the dice to put you at a disadvantage.  Example, the thief is moved to your place and the next roll is that number. This happens more than statistically possible.  There are other anomalies that are annoying with the dice roll.  It has taken 20 hours of playing to decide to uninstall it and move on... Fun and frustrating at the same time.
Not supporting Android 6 on Lenovo k3 note
Works perfectly
Menu not available in trading tutorial (after trading for the resources needed). Very frustrating indeed. Will change rating if this is fixed...

Would have given it a 5 star if there was a harder setting on the game. It is no fun winning 95% of the time against the hardest difficulty on the Knights expansion...  Please, developers, hear my voice. Make it so that on hardest difficulty it is actually hard to win! Please please! A cheaters way to do that is to make biased rolls, though it would be better if you could make the AI smarter (i realize that it is very hard to do)...  Please make the hardest difficulty actually hard and it will be an awesome game!
I can't even use victory cards at all EDIT: You mean to say that victory card only work with the expansion sets!?!?!? Update1: victory cards still DO NOT work
replyContent: Victory point cards work in the base game and the expansion the same way. If you draw one you recive +1 victory point. The difference is that the card is kept on your hand in the Basegame and the Seafarer expansion (opponents don´t see that you have one). In the C&K expansion you don´t keep the card in your hand it is openly displayed.

content: It stopped working on the N Developer Preview. I would love to play again.

Stupid game keeps crashing I can't complete even one game.

content: Enjoyable game. The AI can be infuriating at times so it'd be nice if they mirrored human play a little more, but still fun.
Unless you have time to dedicate to playing real players, who take as long as they want, then there is no reason to download this game.

I love the board game, but the AI for this game is so broken it is rediculous. You can have 6 cards and in one rotation you'll have lost all of them as they target you with the knight cards, even though there is another person who is one point away from winning and you only have 4 victory points

I love Catan and this is a really slick implementation. The AI is very smart and challenging! The deal breaker for me is a glitch I get where the menus stopping fully drawing halfway into a game. You cannot see your dev cards, which makes C&K impossible. There is a work around (see dev response), so I changed my score from 2 to 4 stars.

content: After buying this game it only lets you do 2 tutorials and then campaigns start at $7.99 or so. On top of that even those free tutorials are buggy. On the trading tutorial after you trade to get an ore, you can't pull up the build menu to do anything. And you can't even exit when it does that. You have to just hard close it from your phones application manager. Ill give 2 stars for letting me refund it.

Road building bugs are game breaking. You have to repeatedly exit the app and reopen in the hope it might start to work. Support and updates are pretty much nonexistent. Battery drain is suspiciously high too. Pixel C on Android 6.0.1 and the Keep Awake usage was massive even though the game wasn't in use.

I'm no fancy schmancy stat junky, but I have actually studied statistics and there are some definite aberrations with the AI of this game. To give one example, I just went three rounds and did not gain a single supply. I had three towns and one city. On the other hand, the computer generated players all had at least one city connected to a 9, and it rolled no less than five times during those three rounds. And before you tell me there are easier settings and players, I already had it on the easiest setting playing two Mary Ann's and a Louis. Your game sucks.
Love the classic Catan. It's everything I could ask for. Too bad I have to pay twice the price for the expansions or I might think the in game content was worth it.

I played a move, blocking someone (after I traded with the person I blocked). Then the person I blocked quit. After he quits my trade and block was reversed  Then the computer player blocked me. Ridiculous!

I have gotten stuck many a times with the inability to use the menu to continue the game. I have a Google Nexus 5. It's frustrating and happens in the tutorial and in the regular play. I will be getting a refund and will purchase again if this issue can be fixed....  Looks like I can't get a refund even though I bought it last night... What a shame, very dissatisfied.
It doesn't save settings, like audio preferences. On a Samsung S6.
Great adaptation

The AI makes the game so frustrating to play. Once you are winning by a single point, all three of them will rob you evey single turn until you have nothing left. They refuse to trade even if they have the resources which forces the player to rely only on them self. They also trick you by having to pay to play the campaign and additional maps after the initial purchase.
i love this game and all. my friend saw me playing it and wants to buy it too. unfortunately he has an *iPhone* . can i add him as a buddy and play together if he bought it??????
replyContent: Hi Don, within the online mode you are able to play with your friend regardless of the OS you and your friend are using. All you need to do is register and addeacch other to your friendlist. If you have further questions you can always reach out to our support via android@usm.de.

content: It seems as though this app, in lieu of making the AI actually get smarter as the difficulty ratchets up. As the human player, you are the victim of the robber and knight an extremely disproportionate amount of the time, well beyond the point of rational play by your opponents. This makes the game not only frustrating, but substantially less competitive.
Unable to register to online mode. Tried all scenarios none works. Please help.
replyContent: Hi Gena, please contact our support via android@usm.de. We will get you online in no time!

content: Bugging out. Sign up process kept screwing up and took days to sort. App keeps reverting to German at times??? Very basic game for the price you pay be prepared to pay a lot more in app. Great game, horribly designed and functioning app.

Was a great game but I lost access to the extension pack I paid for when I changed phones.   I stopped playing it for a while and now want to install it on my latest phone but it won't let me play unless I give it access to my google circles, which I won't do.   I'm angry because I paid for this and feel I shouldn't have to give away personal information before I can get the goods I paid for (by the way this is illegal in my country)
replyContent: Hi Michelle, please contact our support via android@usm.de and describe in greater detail which phone change you made. I am sure we can find solution for you.

content: I just bought the game and yet it wont starttt. Please help.. I am using octacore Lollipop 3gb ram phone
replyContent: Hi Pio, please contact our support via android@usm.de for technical advise.

replyContent: Hi Bob, please contact our support via android@usm.de and describe the issue in greater detail. Maybe you are able to send us a screenshot of the situation. Thanks!

content: What a game
Thoroughly enjoy this game, keeps me sharp for league matches. Great for traveling and plane rides no doubt.
This app is buggy as hell just wasted my money on a buggy game I'm using Android 6
I cannot download the additional data needed to play. Ive uninstalled and reinstalled the app but it still doesnt work.
Tutorials get stuck in places, e.g. building a city is impossible as build menu is disabled. Single player often crashes. Dev doesn't respond to support requests. Don't waste your money.
Everytime that I try to connect to an online game, the game keeps force quitting! I am very disappointed and would like a refund please.

1 star, yet i still play this addicting game. Galaxy S6 battery life gets clobbered while playing. Wireless Bluetooth earpiece battery drains even while game is paused, seven hour battery gets to zero in 7 hours even though game was played only 2 hours, and few calls made. Somehow the Bluetooth stays engaged when not playing.

First off, it blows my mind that there is no in game chat?? Me and my friends have to switch back and forth between a messaging app just to talk which becomes irritating; especially in a game like Settlers where trash talk is prevalent. Also the zooming in and out seems veeeery slow to me. It would be nice if I didn't have to gesture multiple times just to zoom all the way in or out.
I'd much rather pay more upfront for the full game.

The NPC's will NEVER make a trade you actually want, and the RNG socks hard. The robber will just stay on your territory. One of the worst computer based versions I have experienced, and I have been playing since Settlers debuted in USA.
I still end up the first to play when I select start at random player in the settings...
Great game. I previously reported a problem with it on my S6... it's fixed
replyContent: Thanks for updating your review! Have fun with the app!

content: First, I'm wondering what "the resource production odds of the owned fields means (the P with the circle in the stats). Second, there is a huge bug with counting your wins with the online ranking system. I've played over 20 games, and it says I have played 2 games. Need to fix.
This game is so buggy I can't even enjoy it. I wish I knew how to get a refund

The online mode worked more or less fine on my nexus 10 cm13 for a long time. Since the last update i cannot connect to any multiplayer session! That sucks!! Cant play it anymore. Go and fix the multiplayermode

content: Would be a fantastic game, except whenever I move the robber, it bugs out and won't let me pass that point.
replyContent: Hi Logan, please contact our support via android@usm.de and describe the issue in greater detail. I am sure we will be able to find a solution.

content: Fun game, they've really cleaned up a lot of the bugs in gameplay. Make sure to kill the program after you exit. After quitting and fully charging my phone, it uses 48% of battery usage when phone is off. That's nuts!
Very easy to use and rarely glitches
I've tested other games to see if it's GPG that isn't working but every time I try to connect in catan it says it can't find and connect to the network. Please address
Great
The computers always seem to know what you have and they won't trade with you at all late in the game. They seem to always get lucky. It's impossible to win.
This is a good game, lots of fun to play.
If you play with computers they will always gang up and 1v3 you making it nearly impossible to do anything.

I love the game... totally addictive.  Some things could be bigger on the screen.  And, things could be explained better in the expansion.  It's hard to follow what you need to build to expand your cities.  But, my major problem I am looking to fix is...  while halfway through cities and nights expansion... windows stop popping up on your screen to select stuff.  All you see is a check mark and x.  You can't see your progress cards, exit window, etc.  Help with this would be great.

Please add a simple user profile with wins/losses and penalize players for leaving in the middle of the game. It'll make this game a little more competitive and (more importantly) make me stop wasting my time playing against people who are going leave 30 minutes into a game.   If you can't ever realize your path to victory (or at least finish a game), it completely takes the fun out of playing.  Please make the proper adjustments to improve the online experience. This could easily be a five-star game.
Ai always cheats
Addicting game, but there needs to be a timer for turns because people take way too long.
Addicted
Not what you think. Online is horrible and laggy and you still have to buy a whole lot. Want refund

I have played dozens of games of this. The AI cheats. If you start beating AI players by more than 3 or 4 points the AI will start giving you bad rolls and the AI players great rolls until the AI catches up to you or your resources are blocked/drained. This happens consistently everything you get a decent lead.
If it was anything under $1 it would be good for that price range.

Matchmaking is garbage. When you do finally connect people always quit or just sit without playing. Also you cannot play campaign without spending more money as soon as game starts. Very limited game play.

I've played this app a lot, and will probably continue to do so. That said, there are many problems. To name a few: (1) I've several times run into errors that drop me from online games. (2) The AI is far too easy. I've won 78% of my 86 games so far. (3) The online rating system is useless: it has only recorded 3 of the two dozen or so online games I've played. (4) One often can't look at development/progress cards before making a decision. (5) There is no chat or social aspect to the app. (6...) etc.
Allow us to play w/ friends on other platforms then you get 5 stars
replyContent: It is possible to play against iPhone useres in the online games.

content: Please fix the online gameplay. As of 4pm 2/17/16 it doesn't work when trying tlit for the first time. :( both me and friend bought this about to refund :'(
At least 1or 2x/ week the app goes down. Needs to be more reliable.

I'm getting stuck at the trading tutorial also. Once you have traded materials the build menu does not appear, so you are unable to upgrade a settlement. Every other aspect of the game works fine as far as I can tell.
Awesome game, love being able to play with friends. Really wish there was a chat option for online. Would be nice to be able to talk to the people you're playing with or on your friends list!
A+

WiFi issues- For everyone who comes across the issue regarding a lack of WiFi connection...make sure airplane mode on your tablet isn't activated. I had WiFi connection but was in airplane mode and it didn't download.
Constantly crashes...
One upgrade that would be nice is in game chat. Waiting for the expansion pack to allow more players.
Best time sink yet.
A great way to practice for the big games.
The online area of thr game does not connect. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the game and tried updating the game and nothing works.
Online is now broken, cannot get into games. 502 bad gateway error.

I love this game, but it freezes and crashes during online play a LOT. My husband and I both bought all the expansions to play one another since we can't always set up the board game. Would be 5 stars if online play wasn't so buggy!
Great game, but online play is buggy as hell.

I usually don't pay for games, but when I do, its so that I don't have to deal with in-app purchases. Much of the game (campaign, most maps) cost extra. I think this is pretty pathetic for a $4 game. On a side note, boats don't work on my device. (BLU Vivo Air) When I try to sail, the screen just goes off the map and I can't do anything.

Awesome game!  I don't play any of the scenarios, so I didn't need to by the in-app purchases.  The AI is kind of dumb in that they can't tell when you create 2 long roads next to each other and connect them at the end to win.  Real Players would see that coming.
Also,  hijacks my sound system so that I cannot adjust ring levels without force quiting the app or delving into the settings menu.
In 10 minutes I've already gotten to the point twice where I'm supposed to open a build menu, but there is nothing to select to open the menu.

Your game is rigged. Everytime I play a campaign no one trades with me and then i am normally up by 5 points i miraculously lose because other com players manage to smash my knights and build citiea with multiple progress cards and not enough reaources. Please review your game for multiple glitches
Players are slow, freezes at times. Rarely finish a game with all that started.

All of a sudden the "online" button doesn't work so I can't play against other players. 5 stars if this can be fixed. I have emailed and left messages but no reply,  want my money back or game fixed, then 5 stars.
Trading resources is cumbersome
It would be a buggy. Cannot connect to server. Multiple problems online and simply cannot connect. Bad gatewaygate.
Absolutely love  being able to play on the go. Only thing that would make it better is if you added the Traders & Barbarians expansion.

Amazing game, love the ability to play it online with my friends. But! Lately I started to experience problems connecting to the game servers, bad gateway error is displayed after a long wait. I like the game a lot. Being able to play against computers or people (hotspot) was a nice touch!
It keeps asking me to download the update every now and then, even though I download it every time.
Love this game but for the last week I get an error every time I try to play against real people. Yes I have re-downloaded the game I even have a new phone but can't seem to play. Why???
Paid for this app and it never connects for multiplayer. Very old school app, money wasted. Please fix multiplayer.
I love the game its my favorite game to play. However, sometimes the online play comes up with an error message instead of loading. This is always happening now.. Please fix!!!!
Don't know why you can't play with others on Bluetooth because online servers are constantly down
This is the worst AI ever.  It only manage to win because the odds are clearly rigged. Also, it is 3 players playing as a team against you

Want money back this is rediculous. Same grievance as everyone else, your online play doesnt work. Receive Err Ssl Version or Cipher Mismatch error.
I think this adaption of Catan is a lot of fun.  I thoroughly enjoy playing.  I do wish they would come out with a Star Trek Catan Android version though.  That'd be awesome.
Can't play online since last update because of extension. My wife haven't and she haven't that bug. Fix this please. And then - 5*
I really enjoy this game but everything I've tried with regards to registering for online play has failed to work. It's a serious  shame for what would otherwise be a 5 star game.

Now that they fixed their epic server delays I can give a positive review. I would give them 5 stars if they would add some sort of timer to the multi-player. Players have unlimited time to make moves. Very frustrating.
The game is a lot of fun but if you want to play online with people you can kiss that hope goodbye. I found the online to hardly ever connect. The game is fun but it needs online.
