I was told by their tech support to remove app and reinstall....ugh duh. I know I did that. Anywho play the free version because it works, just dont purchase expansion
The online portion of this game hasn't worked for weeks

There is definitely a bias in rolls against human players. I just watched an AI player get 35+ resources and not have a seven rolled (even though it's the most statistically likely number to roll) at all for 20+ rolls. As soon as I have over seven cards it comes up seven pretty quickly. You need to fix the randomness of the rolls.
Addictive!
Crashes my One Plus One a lot when I'm in a game. It also crashes my smart phone when I'm on the tutorial.
It logged me out and I can't log in again as the sign in button won't press.
Costly contents with a barebones starter. AI will have you pulling your hair out as it clearly rolls the weighted die to its advantage and youll get 7's every time! Save your money and your hair.
So much fun a great way to practice before getting the family involved with my actual borad game!!

After the latest update that was supposed to fix everyone's online game,  I can no longer connect.  I get a miss match error.  I used to be able to play just fine.  Even deleted and reinstalled and it still doesn't work.  I like playing against real people much more than the computer.

I'm a Stat junky in all sports and know odds in craps, poker etc...and after reading reviews about fixed rolls, it had me passing on the game.   My curiosity had me coming back and bought game.  In no way are rolls fixed.  24 game trial and I see no bias against human player.  Probably opposite...they will gang up on you when your winning but that's good strategy on their part.  Great game!
Works well but -1 star for the extra content which is paid after buying initially.
Always a problem with the online feature
I have played multiple games that ended up with the computer rolling an 8, 95% of the whole match.

Incredibly fun and you can absolutely play without in-game purchases. My only complaint is that this app finds battery juice delicious; I have never had something drain my battery so quickly! I have the Moto X Play, so it has a substantial battery in it, but I accidentally left it running in the background of my sleeping and fully charged phone and I was down to half a charge in an hour and a half! That isnt even active use! Crazy.

Game play is good, but after you buy a development card you can't use it unless it's a knight card or victory point, because the images disappear so you can't select a card to use. Plus after about 10 of so rounds, you can't see the number of roads, houses, cities, or boats you have left before you run out. Overall, still a fun game. I've been playing this app for over a year and this is the only real big glitch I've had that effected game play. Would give 4 stars if this was fixed. Acer Tablet running Android 5.1
4 bucks for about 1% of the game.
Great game with a great Interface! I can't even play the normal board version now that I have been spoiled by this app! Wish catan will come out with new exp
Love it when it works.   Controls could be a bit more user friendly.   Had a few glitchy games, and now experiencing the 502 bad gateway again like about a month ago.

Catan is great, but I can't log in to the multi-player server. I get the following error message when I try: ERR_SSL_VERSION_OR_CIPHER_MISMATCH

I had this app for a while now. It worked perfectly fine until today. I logged in to play online and there was an error message and I couldn't play. I got a message saying the glitch was fixed, but I still can't access online mode. Please fix.

The app was well-executed and I enjoyed being able to play the game on my tablet. The gameplay itself was also good. The only thing needing more development is the graphics. The AI is well-balanced and the difficulty of playing it is always just enough of a challenge for me. The game is well worth the money.
Crashes every time I play the game and is getting really annoying. Might ask for my money back.

Had the app for about 6 months. Usually great. Since latest update? The online servers provide me with an error message.

Great game, addicted to the board game, but I'd much rather play on the table with custom rules. We do numbers flipped over till all beginning settlements have been placed. Makes it interesting to what you get..
Good game interface but buggy. Game often quits for no reason and online multiplayer is full of bugs.
Please fix this ASAP!!! Everytime I'm online during a intense game, I'd get logged off the application!!! This is the 5th time since it has happened since I've downloaded 3 days ago!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Good game but a.i cheats on seafearers (treasure island). A.I goes straight to islands as if it knows exactlty where they are while i am spending all my resources trying to find islands in the fog  PLEASE PLEASE FIX
I tried to play online and it froze to where no player could make a move it crashed a couple times in single player  what does minor bugs are fixed I'll probably rebuy the game.
I really like the board game even though this is a bit different its just as fun.

I love playing the board game and this app allows me to indulge my obsession any time I want!  I also enjoy playing with distant friends, though the connection is sometimes finicky.

I wish they would fix the online part of this game.  No option to kick people off when people just stop playing for no reason.  So many hours wasted only to have someone stop playing and everything is at a stand still.

The game and gameplay are great and true to the original. The ezpansions are expensive, and they really need to add more at a reasonable price. There are about a dozen missing variations. I like to test the expansions here then buy the board games

Game is great for the mobile and so far I have only encountered one bug. The bug in question is for selecting development cards; when you have enough resources to buy one, the game does not allow you to select which card you would like. When you click 'Buy' it automatically gives you the card next to the buy option, and does not allow you to freely choose your card. When clicking your selected card before the buy option as well, it still defaults to the card next to the buy option. Screwed up my victories.
replyContent: Hi Russell, developement cards can´t be chosen freely. You will always get the card,which is on top of the deck. This is according to the official rules of Catan.

content: Captures Catan well

replyContent: Hi Laura, please contact our support via android@usm.de.

content: Love this game and it is quite addicting, but, considering playing against the bias als gets a bit old, I chose to play online. This is where this app goes way downhill. Sometimes it even switches everything to Spanish when I attempt to press the log in button. Extremely frustrating and needs to be fixed.

Not sure why they can't create and maintain such a popular game in an online app but they've failed. I love Catan but I've been unable to login, can't reset my password and the gameplay really isn't great when I was playing. I also just found out the online catan universe is going offline for good. How do you screw up such an awesome game as catan with such a loyal following!? Very dissapoining. There is so much opportunity to expand on an awesome game but unfortunately it's being squandered.
replyContent: Hi Mark, regarding the issues with the login, please contact our support via android@usm.de. We will set up an account for you in no time.

content: App great against the computer but terrible lag and crashes online.

Couple of suggestions:  Please include a chat feature Incorporate rotating screen Allow for just 2 online players I noticed a bug when turning my bluetooth keyboard on and off. The screen goes black and it restarts the app and I cannot return to my previous game ;(  However, it is well done and lots of fun. Thank you!
I like the game but when I tried to buy the expansion it keeps failing. This game is really challenging aNd I can't tell if I'll win. Please get back to me with a solution to my problem.
Great addictive game!  Kills my battery very quickly!

content: Servers are up and running and Catan is back to being the most played game on my phone!

content: Buggy

Took forever to contact the server too, and sometimes switches to German. Eventually after an hour I got my online account set up. Shouldn't be this difficult.

I have not been able to get past the "connecting" screen when I have tried to play online, which is the only reason I plopped down 3.99 in the first place. I think it let me create an account but I'm not even sure about that as I received no confirmation anywhere. Any help would be appreciated.
replyContent: Hi Christopher, we updated our servers in order to solve the "bad gateway" issue. If you should still run into problems please contact our support via android@usm.de.

content: love the online multiplayer, although I wish it were like other online board games(ie scrabble) where one could have multiple games going with different people, switching and checking back as time permitted. content: Love catan and was really excited.....until i got a "504 gateway timeout nginx" what is this all about?

content: It won't let me log in on my tab 4

This is a fun game and works perfectly when playing against bots. But the online version crashes sometimes and has actually been unavailable for the past couple of days. If that were to be fixed I'd give it 5 stars.
Online is awful. Offline is awesome but a big part of the game is playing with others.
To unlock the rest of the app costs $10 or $8 if you buy them all.

Original is fine but the expansions does have a glitch that makes them unplayable. Happens 8/10 times you play. Starts fine then anything you open (card menu or swapping menu etc) opens but won't display anything inside.

Love Catan, been a game me and my family have played for decades. Was really excited to see a mobile application to keep our family competition going. My wife has the same issue with her Android Ultra. Normal game play functions nicely but the online module is basically non existent.
Excellent adaption of the awesome board game. Sadly the online play can be a little unstable and sometimes even unavailable.
Love the game but hate that when I am trying to play against a buddy it tells us that the other person is unavailable. None of us are in a game and all are online why is it telling us this?
Poor updates, exorbitant prices for additional maps...
Cannot even register. Rubbish on Android.
Signed in with my Google account, click the online option and it says connecting... That's as far as I get. It doesn't allow me to connect
When you try to play multiplayer, the game will not let you register.          I want a refund.
They need to fix the online play connecting issues!

This app is barely usable. You require an network connectivity with their server to play with friends. Well, good luck with that. They must be hosting on a 486 dx 33mhz on a 14,4bps link. Ive never seen such a bugged online play. Even trying to login fails. You get all sorts of errors, ranging from the standard 502, bad request all the way to a login failed for no reason. Let's try and reset my password you might think. Well think again. The reset fails as well, with a German message. 0/5 isn't low enough.
Tired of the poor online management, servers go down frequently. If that was fixed I'd say 5 stars
A pretty good port, only complaints were that it was too easy to make misclicks.

Online has huge flaws. I can rarely connect and when I do people usually lag out or disconnect often. It has since been 24 hours since I was last able to play online. There also needs to be a chat feature for online.
Have only played the custom game mode, which plays pretty well. I do keep getting error messages when I try to register for online play. Hopefully this will be fixed soon.
Used to work perfectly.  Now I can never get the login feature to work so I can't play online. Would like help.
Between the basic game and the expansions, the best $13 I've spent.

Online multiplayer is *terrible*. It regularly glitches out or won't launch, there is no chat feature, there is no penalty for quitting so you can rarely finish a game because people quit, there are no push notifications or way to save a game, no rankings, the statistics are buggy and just plain wrong, I could go on and on, but... Honestly I am upset I wasted $4 on this.  If all you want to do is play solo games against the computer, it's pretty cool (but who wants to do that???)
Why have an online version if it never works

The game is great but VERY glitchy on my iPhone 6, ipad, and Samsung galaxy tab pro. It ruins the fun because I will not be able to play progress cards or make other moves because it will glitch and be non responsive. I bought this app on three different devices, along with expansions, and they are all very glitchy. I should get a refund or a game that works. Not happy at all.

I have an LG G4. App worked decently until a couple of weeks ago. Now every time I try to do anything in online mode, I get "Error 502 Bad Gateway". Please fix. No point in paying for a game I can't even play.

This problem hasn't  been fixed for a while and should be rectified immediately (especially on a paid APP!)
Just bought this it worked once and now I can't play online always get a 504 gateway error
Just like the board game.

If you're playing with your friends or against people online the game is great! But the A.I. custom matches are a joke. The A.I. will deliberately gang up on you and just rip you a new one every game. The robber will always be placed on you, and when you finally roll a seven, they will just roll a seven next turn and move it right back on you, and the A.I. will never trade with you. It is the most rage inducing thing I've ever seen.
Addicted to this game!

Great game! Nearly perfect. No qualms, but just some slight tweaks, perhaps. One suggestion: allow players to view the map when selecting which resources to claim from the various development cards (year of plenty, monopoly, etc.) and gold mines.
Brilliant, can't stop playing. The only bad point is the battery drain. If this could be fixed it would have been 5 stars.
Real game is fun but this app is a waste of time and money!
Great app for a great game. I really enjoy this app and have no issues on my galaxy s4. I just wish the ai was better, i always win.
Great app! Purchased the expansions; no regrets. I wish the campaign was longer and that they would add the traders and barbarians expansion, but still a lot of fun.
I love love love this app. Never have any issues. It's just like the board game. Love the custom settings.
Why must we pay so much for a game and have to buy DLC for the freaking campaign

For the most part, the game works. The single player is fairly solid. But that gets old and you want to play with friends but that's where the game suffers. 30% of the time connecting to online play fails. Once you can connect, there are issues with adding friends to your buddy list and adding them to games. It's also pretty obvious that the AI cheats in order to increase difficulty. I actually love this game for online play (not the single player, that version is impossible since the AI cheats like crazy) and have bought all the expansions so I could play online with friends. I like this game, but 3.99 price only give the basic game.  It would be nice to have more maps.  An YES the AI is a punk.  The roll stats in the game show that the dice is weighted.  (Wrecks the bell curve) Player has to use the Resource Bonus to get any resources. At the easiest setting the AI is still cutthroat. Nice game hampered by unbalanced play and the guest for more money.  Great game if corrected.

After playing many times, it is obvious that the rolls aren't anywhere near random. If you get a lead, the statistical probability of what happens is rediculously low. For instance, 3 7s in a row is 1 in 216 rolls, yet happened 3 times in one game. Come on.

Awesome

This game is just a simple port of the old and successful settler of catan board game.  Other app developers research their game and figure how what the rules are and how to make it well.  Since catan was already successful there was no research done to make this game great.  Thus it should not command a price as if it had.

USM: Lots of reviewers comment on how the AI works together, conspires with (apparently) rigged dice, and that the AI knows what resources and developmet cards you have. I agree that these allegations seem true. I note you never reply, except occasionally suggesting setting to easy, or using stack mode. Is this implicit admission that the ai does know more than it should, and when 7s come up is rigged? I am VERY suspicious of this game. Will you clarify that the AI onky knows what it should, and never conspires to ensure any ai wins rather than the player? And will you fix ai to be fair? Or will you ignore this, like the the other reviews?
replyContent: Hi Phil, of cause does the AI "know" some things. But not more than an observant  human player would know. E.g it knows what ressources you got on your last round. For more infos about the behavior of the AI please contact our support via android@usm.de because there is an 350 character limitation for our responses here.

I just wish the dice roll would always be random.

So after buying the game. I also bought the scenario bundle. Was expecting more than 20 scenarios...especially since there's not much too them. There's about 6 to 10 lines of inane and inconsequential dialogue before and after each one. The maps themselves are nothing special either. I do like this game and it's hella fun playing the actual board game, but they didnt take full advantage of going digital. For example. Bigger maps, much bigger. Perhaps double or triple the size of the largest map. 3 to 8 players. More customization with rules and objectives. Some C and K rules would be great. Especially a no commodity C and K map. No card map. Etc etc. Give some customization options. I would recommend this game if you got everything for like$4.99-5.99. As for online play. There's a tedious user name confirmation page that doesn't need to be there. If you wanna play with your friends just buy the actual board game. Otherwise you're just gonna sit for way too long.

I've played it through a couple times, but this time it is stuck. Could a representative give me a fix to this problem?  UPDATE: Thanks for the response!  I didn't see an ending screen. I'd love to see some new campaigns or an extension to the existing one. :)
replyContent: Dear User, the Seafarers campaign has 16 scenarios and the CaK part has 4. Maybe just the end messages are somehow missing? You can manually set the campaign progress via the cheat code mentioned in the Google Play Store description of the game.

content: The AI in the campaign mode is hillarious.   They trade to stock up on development cards and always pile up on knights. replyContent: Hi Colin, to move the robber you have to drag and drop him to the tile you want to place him on. If there are two settlements of your opponents, you have to choose which one you want to rob by tapping on the settlement. After you placed the robber and chose the opponent (if needed) there should be a check mark on the right side of the screen.

content: Loved the game as a kid, loved seeing a smooth port to IOS, but it keeps bugging on my Android ultra. It'll randomly make the side menu disappear and its game breaking (I can't roll the dice or anything) I'd give it more stars but this bug is killing it for me
replyContent: Hi Adam, on some devices there is an issue with disapearing UI elements. Please try to alter the animation speed to "ultra" und turn of the "autozoom" in the main menu. This could work around our issue. You can always reach out to us via android@usm.de if you need technical support.

Fun

Real fans of Catan will pay for this game because it's the original. Everyone else shouldn't, because it's extremely alpha, with 90's style graphics, bureaucratical registration flows, bad English, and such a lack visual feedback that the game feels like a non-mobile-optimized website in a 2G network. Also, the price of 4 € does not include 95% of the levels, it's stingier than most freemium games. Maybe it should be a reminder of the 90s, when we had to pay a hundred bucks for a few lines of code on a disk

content: Really fun and true to Catan. I would really like it, though, if online multiplayer were a little more passive. It would be great if you could leave the game and take a turn when you had time, instead of being locked into a game. Leaving right now causes forfeiture, but if you are playing with friends in different time zones or on different schedules, it would be cool to take turns when you felt like it, sort of like Words with Friends. Otherwise an awesome app.

First, the AI is awful.  Predictable.  Boring at all levels.  Second, the game cheats.  Dice rolls are not random, they're suited to what the AI needs.  Third, you buy this and you need to pay much, MUCH more for any of the expansions.  That's dishonest, since you are expecting to purchase a complete game.  Don't even give me the DLC excuse, that only applies to, you know, actual games with actually new content... and not a game that is an adaptation of a board game.  Basically, Catan is a BS ripoff.

content: Download now!!! One of my favorite board games. I'll review again later on.
I'm not sure I know how to play. Some of the training modules are broken, specifically trading and robber. Please fix so I can learn how to play

Catan is a fun game, but the way this app is coded is horrible.  Once the game starts, the robber won't go anywhere near you. Try to use this to the best of your advantage because once you get that third victory point (in a way that is not from a Victory Point card), the robber will get you nearly every single time after, until another AI player has at least 5 or 6 victory points.  You can literally be in dead last with 3 victory points, and the robber will still get you nearly every single time (There are some exceptions, but not many). It may not always steal from you, but it will be adjacent to your settlement or city.  I get it though: the frustrating games are the games people keep coming back to. It's been proven in studies. So the developers are quite smart knowing that the frustration of this game will keep them playing it.

Fun game. I've never played the board game before but even without the tutorial I was able to pick up most of the game mechanics pretty fast. I've definitely been enjoying playing regular, custom and online versions of the game. My one complaint and why I'm taking off 1 star from an otherwise great game, it does not rotate. I'm not a developer, but I have to imagine such a rudimentary feature is easily added into to any app. 1st world problem, but I don't like the direction my charger sticks out when playin
Catan rules
Computer will trade with itself when in the lead but not you.  Program it better!  Really?
Amazing strategic and very addictive

I thought i would never delete this game. Thought it was the best. Well, new expansions are unplayable. The AI is always favored in dice rolls. Examples- last five games i received a total of 7 resources in five of MY turns, over twenty rolls. I always pick good numbers. Then, as soon as i get good rolls, i get robbed. Everytime. As soon as i get more than seven, the next roll is automatically a 7, i get robber, dice rolls robbed #. If i do not have two numbers, those numbers roll 30-50%. No fun. Bye Catan.

content: Love the app, play it all the time. But two MAJOR complaints. 1. what really frustrates me is when I'm tied with the AI/bot, the other AI/bots all team up on me instead of playing the robber on one I'm tied with. I mean as soon as I'm tied, I get robbed consistently. 2. Also, my victory points are shown and that seems to play in the decision of the bots, and the bots victory points aren't shown until the end. I'll have a one point lead and consistently getting robbed, then a bot wins with 3 victory points.

As the game progresses, the graphics in the Development Card menu disappears. The same with the building menu. First the text disappears around 15 rounds in. Then 20 rounds in, the rest of the graphics disappears. You have to remember where each card is situated. Quite annoying.   Also, when you build ships in a "circle", six in a hexagon shape, you can't move the ships again. They are locked in, even though they are not locked to a settlement on an island.   Further, every time the AI moves the robber to one of the player's hexes, the next dice throw will be the number the robber is on. Almost every single time. Quite unrealistic.  It's a great game, so it is a shame that small bugs ruin the experience over time.
replyContent: Hi Morten, to solve the issue with the dissapearing UI elements, please try to alter the animation speed to ultra and turn of the autozoom. If this doesn´t work for you, please contact our support via android@usm.de.

content: The app is ok, but I've yet to play campaign or online. Please update a fix it to make this a great game, or it's junk.

content: I love Catan in general, but for some reason I can not get passed the "online register" section to save my life. I have used my e-mail, as well as my husbands, along with different user names. It will always say "username/e-mail" is in use ( I have also tried to resend password, but e-mail is "invalid" ). NEED HELP :(
replyContent: Hi Krista, our hotline (android@usm.de) will gladly help you to register, please send them an email.

content: If you try to play quickly you can click on things and the pop over message causes game to freeze. When placing settlements clicking the check mark can cause it to move. The server is down often. Online games are recovered often for no reason. Game gets out of sync between players. I couldn't sign up with my email address had to fake one. The dice is not rigged as far as I can tell but its very likely the AI does know what card to steal from you.
Does what it says on the tin well, but you have to pay more for campaign! Not as difficult as other reviews suggest.
No communication is bad

A.I. constantly robs and/or gangs up on you, whether or not you are winning, competing for roads and settlements, or whether or not you have ever robbed them. Game would be so much more fun if developers would make it realistic against the computer
Playing the tutorial, and the menu button vanishes after trading (can't reopen to build a city), leaving you stuck.
Won't be able to give it any stars... until I get a registration email to confirm and login.  :(
replyContent: Hi KrisLynn, please contact our hotline via android@usm.de. They will help you with the registration process.

content: I never received the registration email and I can't log on to play online with friends. Other than that, I like the game. Would give it 5 stars if I could play with friends instead of just solitaire.
replyContent: Hi Leigh, please contact our hotline via android@usm.de. They will help you with the registration.

content: Very buggy. No online chat when you play on the Internet. You have to buy all the expansions if you want to play with your friends. Just an overall waste of money imo
Can't even play online because it will not allow you to register an email account. Never sends any Confirmation like it entails.

Love the game however there are multiple issues. My phone, running Android 6.0 is using about 1% battery per minute and the phone gets almost too hot to hold. Also would be nice to be able to go to the game/settings menu when its not your turn. Especially online while waiting..

I purchased this game to play online, I have no interest in paying the AI. It was a huge hassle to create a username since it said my email was already in use (which it wasnt) and when I went to retrieve my password and input my email, it would tell me that I entered "invalid data". Whatever, I used a different email to register and got it to work. However, I need to respond to a confirmation email before I can log in and that confirmation email never came in. Waste of $4, really sad since I do love Catan.
Seldom freezes up anymore. I do notice when a robber is placed on a number, that number is frequently rolled the next turn. Wish it was more random, but still a fun game.

I love settlers of catan but playing against the computer players is extremely frustrating. There's only one "easy" player to play against and that character is still not easy to beat. It seems like as soon as I got seven cards the next roll would be a seven and the robber would take half. Also once he was placed on a hexagon I had a city on, that number would suddenly get rolled and then as soon as I moved the robber the number didn't get rolled again. There's a huge bias in the game.
Great game and great app.  Plus amazing customer service!
Play on my note 3 and every time I use the knight it seems to freeze my game
I'm addicted to it right now. The expansions are fun and have helped me think about what expansions I would want to buy for the physical game. I wish there was a map editor though.
Really good game, though doesn't beat the actual board game its a good substitute in the time between games with friends!
So I sign up for online and it said it sent me a confirmination code on my email then it just doesn't send the email
It's been almost an hour downloading the 66MB update file from your server. I love this game but waiting this long is painful. My new tablet downloaded the game from play in 5 seconds.
I have been playing catan for a while now and I am having troubles logging in. Someone please help me fix it!

The new online component is fantastic, though some glitches still occur, usually during trading. My biggest complaint is how the visuals suck my battery. There should be an "expert" option where I'm not promoted why a fancy graphic and explanation of every step the computer makes. Some thoughts on the AI: computer seems to confuse "and" with "or" and is often willing to trade multiple resources for just one. Also sometimes quitting and re-opening will caused a re-roll. I love avoiding the 7, but that's bad
Recommended, of course when you like the board game this will get you your fix on your closest droid screen.

Though I love playing catan on my phone, and it's helping me learn the rules, there are some issues. I'm finding the dice rolls to be too favoured around certain numbers and combinations. Also, the cpu seems to prefer bullying the human player rather than favouring whoever is ahead or has the most resources. Tweaking to make the custom game more fair would make this game even more enjoyable
You cant play computer unless you pay more money. When online its in german ,not english. When setting up you cant quit...so you have to set up the whole board before going to the menu. Frustrating
So if you buy an expansion and nothing changes, you don't get anything new added to the game, is that false advertising or bad explanations of what you purchased?

When playing a custom game, there is a huuuuuuuge chance that after a robber is placed on a number you have a settlemet/city on, that number will be the next one. If its a 6/8, there is a very big chance that if it didnt show for a longer period, it will show several times just when robber blocks your gain. There are more cheats in favor of AI like this.
Knows what resources you have when it tries to make deals. Knows where the hidden islands etc are. You choose to accept ai deal & it bugs so the ai does the deal with another ai instead.

Some updates make things less enjoyable. Others fix critical problems. However, number placement is still an issue. Number tiles have never stayed true to Catan Board Game rules. Overall app play is addictive. Love the little trials of the expansions. I likely will purchase a few app expansions in future.

Wonderful port of this classic board game. Great tech support too!   One drawback with the game is the dice rolling. In an effort to keep games close the dice rolling is fixed. Yes, its that obvious. Please shut this feature off for multiplayer.
replyContent: Hi Ted, we’re glad that you like the game and that our support could help you. Regarding the dice: We can only assure you that the dice rolls are absolutely random and not fixed in any way. We wouldn’t want to play a fixed game ourselves!

content: When i play online against my wife and the robber is thrown it stops the game and doesnt progress. Please fix or tefund us both
replyContent: Hi Joel, when exactly does the game stop? Before or after selecting the target of the robber? Please note that when there are multiple players on one hex, you’ll have to select whom to rob before the game will progress.

content: Update!  I love the game but the way the computer rigs the game is extremely frustrating.  If a thief is on your number and you are winning, that number is often rolled multiple times.  Also, the computer seems to know what cards you have, if you have victory points, the computer puts the thief on you even if you are losing by structure points.  Last, the dice rolls are far from random no matter what setting it's on.  Computer will find IMPOSSIBLE ways to win.  PLEASE FIX THESE!
Amazing app for a classic game, but the lack of rotation at all is bothersome, as is the stutter you get from sound effects when using Bluetooth headsets.
I play this game all the time cause it addictive.

Update: The support team was able to create an account for me. The support was extremely responsive, which is great. I am still concerned that I was unable to make my own account though.   I have attempted to register with every email I have (all gmail and even Hotmail) and the app claimed my emails were already registered. When I tried the forgot password link it says input error. Not sure how to pass this and I can't find anywhere to attempt to register online via pc. I am also confused why I was forced to login via Google play games and create a usm account. Others may want to avoid the app until the quality issues are fixed for online.
replyContent: Hi Jim, we use Google Play Games for achievements and cloud storage of saved games and our own service for multiplayer games. This allows us to provide cross-platform play with iOS.

content: AI sucks. Online Multiplayer sucks. Hard to find online players to play with. If you find one, he will surely leave the game after few mins. To top all that, this app isnt free. Dont buy.

Went from Samsung tab 3 to tab S and now on a bigger screen the side menus have tiny text. A strain for me to see.  Perhaps a settings menue would releave the strain of formatting for every phone and tablet. The stats menu doesn't work at all and the sound will go choppy. I have to reboot to bring the sound back. Might be an android issue caused by some other app in the task manager. Stll love the game. Issues are minor. 4 stars for me.

AI "always" steal the cards you need. AI also rolls the numbers it needs. I've  tested this multiple  times with the same results. Rewrite a "real" random number generator so the game is more enjoyable. Sad I wasted my money on this poorly made game. Gives the game a bad name with this AI.
Too addicting.
AI = Broken

So charge this much for a phone game would imply it works well, and I've had so many issues creating an online account, all my friends did too, kind of annoying to pay and not get a good product that works. Fix your online functionality!!!!
Tasks too long to find online games and compete them since pagers don't seem to be able to start a vote.

Update: tried the newer version. Same problems -App keeps closing during play.  Recently it won't even open.  I have had this app for a long time and this is my favorite game. Not happy about the current problems,  but once resolved it should be good   edit:app is note shutting my entire phone.  I narrowed it to this app.  Very sad cause I enjoy the app.  But right now too many problems
replyContent: Hi Aubria, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and provide some details on your device and Android version installed and we'll investigate.

content: Crashes on open after downloading the extra data
replyContent: Hi Sean, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and provide some details on your device and Android version installed and we'll investigate.

content: Addicting game that is easy to learn, and good A.I., I would recommend this to anyone getting into board gaming as it sure helped me get into it!
no updates plus you have to buy more maps. uninstalled.
replyContent: Hi Tyke, please let us know about the details via email to android@usm.de when you experience this issue and we’ll try to analyze what might cause this.

content: True to the board game. The game is not worth buying. In order to play campaign u need several expansions. Paid version only gets u multi-player hotseat. And online play is extensive and doesn't work.

I bought it to play with friends. Discovered that signing up for an account is annoying, adding friends is annoying (and in german, not english), adjusting settings is annoying, and at the end of the day, to play with friends requires everyone to always be on---which is annoying. Tried to return the app, and apparently you only have a two hour window to make that decision. Since I bought it at work, but obviously won't play at work, the two hr window was up before I had a chance to test. What a waste...
Love this game great app. Wish there was a ranking system.
For what ever reason I start a game and within a few moves the game starts looping a sound file which doesn't stop... So annoying
Macht spaß liebe dieses Spiel!

Robber on your land almost 100% of the time even if you're 3rd/4th. Also, CPU will play knight card to move robber onto your land from the other cpu's land.  It's not uncommon to have 3 or more resources stole in between your rolls.
Shame, as it's a great replication of the game. The AI is just really badly unbalanced.
I created a username and now I can login to it, the email system for 'forgot password' has let me down
The program keeps crashing while installing. Had to install it 4 times to get it to work. Also when ending a game the program crashed as well, and unable to restart again.

I enjoy playing this with gf. We've spent over $20 on this game over a couple years. But lately, bugs. We get deep into an online multiplayer game, and the AI will freeze and just keep spinning. Really annoying, especially after getting like an hour into a game not to be able to finish it :-(

After creating an account to play online I have been unable to login at all. Also, entering my email in the password recovery screen throws the error "invalid field" and does not successfully send an email. I have not received a single confirmation email saying that I have successfully registered, yet I am unable to create another account as it says my email is already in use. The online play was a major reason why I purchased this app yet this feature is broken and useless for me. Please fix this issue!
I can not connect with my user name and password and also i can not reset my password
works great, opponents are fair, you have to plan ahead to win . Comes with 3 different graphics packs. A great deal for Catan on the phone.
Once you learn the basics this game will slowly eat away at you free time. After that you will start to sacrifice your marage, your family, and even your career. Still worth it in the end though

I will admit that this is my favorite game to play not on my phone but in real life with real people.  I love it on my phone.  The AI could be better.  I enjoy the expansions, but in real life, Cities and Knights takes too long.  That's where the phone is amazing.  I can play a game of Cities and Knights with other expansions and still be done in 20 minutes or so.  It's fantastic.  My only real complaint about the game is that the AI isn't challenging enough.
I docked one star for some visual artifacts on my Note 4. None of the glitches made the game unplayable.
Didn't play at all the whole day. Until I realized it kept my phone awake for an hour and drained 20% battery. The game is lame anyway. Uninstall. Wish I could get money back

Every time the robber is placed on a space, that number is rolled instantly and literally every two or three rolls after that. Makes the game very frustrating. They have to be able to make the dice more random.

To the developer, I would like to play online. When I try to register it says im already registered regardless of the username. When I try to do a password for my email address it says invalid data. Help me with this issue for five stars. Im using a galaxy s5 on the most recent stock firmware.
Pretty good port.  The campaign modes plot is rediculous, but otherwise fine.
When I hit new campaign it always place the numbers in the same position. Please fix this and the rate will be 5. Besides this, the game is very very much entertaining and addictive.
replyContent: Hi Fernando, the maps have a fixed layout in the campaign. This is intentional as this setup is the most balanced one. However when you play a map in custom game mode, the layout and the distribution of number tiles is randomized. Please let our support team know if you have further questions: android@usm.de - We'll be happy to help!

content: Great game
Every time I move the robber the menu disappears and the game can't continue. I want my money back.
Amazing game!
I bought this game and played for a while. Now it wants access to my Google plus profile and won't let me play without it. Total ripoff.

Game freezes on some actions at various times, such as building roads, it won't let you cancel the action. I close the game and reopen, but trying the action freezes the saved game again. I can't recommend this game until they fix this error.

I'll admit that the ai is rigged to scream you over with the robber just have to choose wisely where you put your first settlements and you can win everytime if you are playing cities and knights just try to get all the paper commodities first then you get to pick your resources sometimes you will still lose but you can make it very difficult for the computer
I registered for an online play account but have never received my email notification. Are email triggers not working?

I like the game in person, but I created an account with my email and they have yet to email me the verification code (it's been almost a day). So far, it's a waste of money because I have yet to have the ability to play at all

Downloaded the app, then required to inst a 60+MB package. Then, after waiting, you need to purchase additional in app expansions to do anything other than play online. Went to play online 2x, the UI was unintuitive, accidentally exited out of a match before it started. Then, loaded the online match making again, it force clised. Relaunched, it wanted me to download the 60+MB file again. Uninstall... Refund... Review. Cheap knock offs of this game were better. My $0.02
Played the board game and it was fun but the phone version ia not worth the money. Please refund

It's an amazing game. Perfect in every way EXCEPT FOR THE AI!!!  Why do they only steal from me??? No matter if I'm in 1st or last they only steal from me. I will have 1 card and the others have 6 or 7 and they steal from just me. There's other players! Again I love this game but I have rage quit too many times to count due to getting AI resource raped.

I'm a fan of Catan, but this app is unplayable.  The programmers, rather than coming up with a good AI, simply stack the dice rolls 'around' your numbers to an extreme degree.  Then, to reduce the appearance of this, the game makes sure a number you've settled comes up whenever the Robber is on it.  Even with this 'correction', the skew is so far beyond anything one might consider reasonable as to make the whole game feel like an exercise in futility.  Finally, the Robber bounces around back and forth on your properties in an almost-laughable manner.  All of these lead to one thing... Round after round of you having to simply pass your turn due to lack of resources.  And that's just not fun.  I really wish the app's developers had given this board game the care and treatment it deserved.  As it is, I would never purchase an expansion for a game so profoundly broken.
Great strategy game. Many hours of fun.

You download the game and the first thing it does is get you to download again?  Then you download it AGAIN, and it says the download (which just completed successfully) didn't work so do it again?!?!  That's not the type of game I wanted to play.

I bought this game to play online with friends and none of us can login to our accounts. It always comes up with the "login failed" message. I have tried to make a new account but it tells me my username or email is already in use. "Forgot password" won't work either. I even tried using a different email but got the same results. I tried to reinstall the app but that didn't help either. Don't waste your money!
When you pay money for a game you expect to get the full version. What a rip off

Catan is a great game if you have not tried it I highly recommend it. Also the support was awesome I had a problem registering to play online so I emailed them and in a few minutes got a response and the problem was solved, I was very impressed.
I find the AI to be appropriate based on the chosen difficulty. Helps that this game rocks anyway! The trading interface could stand to be a little bigger. Other than that, no complaints.
I wish there was a way to check head to head stats versus online buddies, just for smack talking purposes
This game is really good as of lately though it seems very buggy. Please fix. Dice wont roll, atarting game glitches.

Just brutal - even on easy the computer characters never trade with you. They co-operate against you and relentlessly move the robber between your tiles, sometimes three times every round. Even when playing this with your worst enemy you wouldn't get bullied as much as you do in this game.

Very addicting. The random number generator kind of sucks though. Most of the time after the robber has been placed on a tile you possess the next number to be rolled is the number where the robber is on.

Addicted to this game....also the board game. However most complain ai is too hard,I find it too easy....AI can be better by anticipating what player is going to aim at and block him. Also this game needs a hell of a lot of expansions ...wake up programmers. Nonetheless....very good interpretation of the game....love it

I registerdd to be able to play online but im not getting any email confirmation. Tried to register again and it says already registered. Tried forget passwod option and it says invalid data. So.ething is wrong here...
Its awesome. Easy to use. Spent lots of hours on this app!!

You start everything seems fine. Half way through the game nothing gets rolled for you. 3 players team up on you. You get robbed every other turn. They somehow always steal the 1 card you've been waiting for. Stick with the board game people!!!!!

After reading all of the reviews I must absolutely agree that the random number generator is completely biased towards the computer. Even after turning the difficulty on easiest I can't seem to win a match and I decimate on the board game. I regret buying all the expansions here thinking it would be a great time. I'm uninstalling this now.

It's quite annoying how the variable map isn't really variable at all. You never have any of the same numbers next to each other. The game is exciting when unlikely things like that sometimes occur, but they never do in this app.
I play this game all the time on my tablet it has been my go to game for a long time. I will be buying all future expansions for this game! More maps and scenarios please!
I tried to register to play online. After 10 mins nothing. I love catan but hate this app.
A great game. Computer players offer a good challenge.
Can get my settlers fix without having to wait for other people to play the regular board game!
Loved this game on xbox. I had little issues with this version. Was excited to see that they expanded it.
I have tried to register using multiple usernames and emails, and it still won't let me make an account. If it works well I don't know because I have yet to play it.

I love the Catan board game and this app is wonderful. I've encountered few errors with the app, it plays pretty flawlessly. My main issue is when playing online I'm unable to specify that I ONLY want to play the original first island version so I have to keep exiting until I am added to a first island game. Also it's annoying when you want to start the game but someone is not ticking that they are ready and you can't kick them out so everyone gets fed up and exits. Also chat text options would be nice.

I own every version this game, including the packaged board games. I play online with my sons (28 & 30 years old). This new android app is my favorite version. And the developer's support team is responsive and comes up with solutions, not excuses. Great game, from an equally great company.

It really is a fun game, but the game glitches/cheats to make sure you lose, especially on 'normal'. I even caught it glitching/cheating when one of the other computer characters stole one of my resources, leaving them with only one resource card, which was a wheat card. The next person to go was me and I went to steal it back only for the resource to be something completely different. I would appreciate more of an realistic gameplay for 'normal' and that type of gameplay for 'hard'.
Continue Game option ALWAYS freezes. Please fix.

Please make the dice rolls random and improve computer AI. This game is fun but the computer dice rolls is obviously rigged. A 7 rolls usually after you've moved the knight away from your tile. Numbers that you don't have a settlement on are rolled too frequently even if its a number like 3 or 11. 1-to-1 trades occur between members to gang up on you. The battleship card in Cities & Knights plays when the count is down to 1 in order to force you to lose your city, and vice versa when the AI hasn't activated its knights yet. After you've placed your initial settlement/city and road/ship, one of the AI will always block your path even if the numbers are poor to give the other AI players a chance in the game (it's not normal for a player to voluntarily take the hit for other players). AI get more "steal" cards than normal. Seems to be worse when connected to Google Play. Still some glitches that make the counts at the left corners of the screen to disappear. Need to force close for them to come back. Missing an exit button for playing certain development cards in case you change your mind. Need to force close or commit to the play. The pirate is never used in seafarers by the AI.

Faithful adaptation of the board game with decent AI.  Bothered that the achievement system seems to be broken.  I have met the conditions twice each for Knights of the Round Table, Robber Baron, Troublemaker, Veteran Knight, and Treasure Hunter: none of them were awarded.
When I try to open it, it demands a 38Mb download.  No matter how many times I do the download, the app keeps saying I need to do it.
Just purchased the game and it won't open at all. Very frustrating.

This is the only game that when I tried to register for online play that it refuses to let you sign in until you confirm your email, an email that is never sent! Then, when I tried to register with a brand new email, just created (thinking I couldn't lose an email from them when it's a brand new email account) it says that the email or username is already in use! With a completely random username which I highly doubt is in use, it keeps saying it and refuses to let me register! Such bs. Disappointed.

Just like others have said, the AI is terrible.  As long as you are in the lead you will get robbed left and right. Anything but the default map/game is DLC. Don't waste your time, get your Catan fix elsewhere.

I've played this game frequently at the difficult level with 3 computer opponents.  The game is unfair!  The computer opponents will play against you 3 to 1 until one of them is ahead.   This will be the case even if you're tied.  Even if another computer player is ahead they will put the robber on one of the your tiles while robbing the lead computer.  Also the dice is not a bell curve.  The computer will roll to the advantage of the computer players.  I've played games where the dice throws 11, 3, and 2 often because you're ahead and these tiles belong to the computer players.  Overall fun game, but very unfair especially the dice.
Game crashes as soon as it begins. Won't let me get a refund either.
Bought game on galaxy s4 now I'm playing on my Sony Xperia I try to open the game and it throws up an error without loading
Fun game.

Bought the game can't even send email confirmation for online play and how the hell do u unlock campaign mode bought expansion pack still won't unlock....refund back...will purchase again if some one tell how to unlock campaign mode
replyContent: Hi James, please contact our support team directly at android@usm.de and we’ll set up your multiplayer account manually. The campaign consist of scenarios from the Seafarers and Cities and Knights expansion and is unlocked after purchasing either one.

content: The app started causing my phone (Galaxy S4) to spontaneously restart almost immediately after opening it. This has happened a few times outside of the app, but it got to the point where every single time I opened the app, my phone would reboot. The last time it happened, my screen also got scrambled before going black, and wouldn't respond to any buttons for several minutes. I thought my phone was bricked.
replyContent: Hi Dan, we tested extensively on many devices, among them an S4 and have never experienced any problems like this. Please contact our support at android@usm.de and provide any details on your phone, esp. if it is rooted.

content: Great game already, and well built but your AI is just broken. I give you 5 stars because you did everything right as far as the game is concerned. $11 dollars for the game and an expansion? Perfect. AI are cheaters though. It's impossible and I'm only on medium.
Its a great app about a great game I have it at home but could you please add fishermen of catan it is my favorite variant
Also great support. 4 minutes after sending an email about not being able to connect online I got a response and everything got fixed.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback tomer, our support team appreciates this :)

content: The basic game worked great, then I purchased the expanisions and no matter which senerio I play half way through the game i cant acces my resorces or progress cards. I want my money back but there is no way to cantact USM other than the review. Becareful before you buy expansions.
replyContent: Hi Charity, you contact our support at android@usm.de. We’ll be happy to help if you provide further info on your device and the issue, esp. screenshots would be helpful.

content: Such a great game!  The only reason I gave it 2 stars instead of 5 is that fact that after a certain amount of time the progress cards disappear from the UI.  This makes it very hard to see what to play and practically breaks the game for me.  Also the details of any items to build are gone as well and there is no way to see how many of each item you have left to build.  No problems with the AI as others have mentioned and after many games the dice rolls start to have a good looking bell curve as it should be.  Please just fix the disappearing cards in the UI during the game and then I can give it 5 stars!
replyContent: Hi Mindset83, we’re investigating this issue and would be grateful if you could send further details (any pattern when this is happening, device and Android version details) to our support team at android@usm.de. Thanks!

content: Repetitive, and also the same every time you play. Also, my son says it's monotonous.
Frequent problems when updates introduced
replyContent: Hi wnlharris, we’re sorry that you’re having trouble with Catan. Please let us know the exact problems and we’ll be happy to help. You can contact our support team via android@usm.de

content: Really?  As much as you are charging for all the expansions, you could make it less weighted for the AI and robber. If you have more than 6 or 7 materials, the robber is going to take your stuff. The dice is hard on the player and easy on the AI. Change this. Look how many people complain about it!

AI conspire to screw you by rotating the robber on your tiles so that you become a spectator. Almost always if the 7 is rolled and the robber is placed on a tile, on the next role that tile's number comes up. Makers will say you can choose a lower difficulty level, but that's besides the point. The AI's strategy of screwing the fourth player (you) is not how Catan was meant to be played.
I've registered but I can't do anything! My peeps love this game,  and I need to get on it.  Can't find any sort of help   on the game or anywhere
replyContent: Hi Andrew, please contact our support team directly at android@usm.de and we’ll set up your multiplayer account manually.

content: Trouble installing due to the SD card being in. Removed and works great! The only complaint is the cities and knights expansion doesn't have very many scenarios, wish they would add more otherwise very fun game.
replyContent: Hi Dusty, please contact our support team at android@usm.de with some details on your device (android version installed etc.) and we’ll be happy to help.

content: I have played this game for a while now both on the app and the actual game board. The app is a great way to play a quick game with no set up. The app runs smoothly and is true to the award winning board game. The only complaint I have is that the instructions could be difficult to understand for a new player and there are some confusing grammer mistakes as well.  Overall, well worth the purchase price for the endless play time!
replyContent: Hi M Ebert, thanks for your feedback – we’re glad you’re enjoying Catan!

content: Not beginner friendly.
replyContent: Hi Lee, please let us know where you think the tutorial and explanations could be improved and we’ll forward this to our development team. You can reach our support at android@usm.de

content: This game online with a AI player is very perdictable in rolling what it needs or wants or what will hurt you
Love it :)
One of the best games around. All these complainers just suck at playing. I rarely lose against the AI, often get 2 cards when trading with them. If you find winning hard. ..reduce difficulty.

As I reap from the hex where I harvest my grain,      I take a look at my cards and decide to play "crane."    But that's just perfect for a player like me,       since you know that wheat and ore buy things like cities.
I started it up, and it tried to connect for over an hour to download additional files. Uninstall & refund. Will try again if it is fixed.
replyContent: Hi Lynn, please make sure that you have an active and stable internet connection and that airplane mode is turned off when downloading the initially required files. This is only necessary during the first startup of the game.

content: Had to reinstall. I had already bought the expansions but got charged again which is not what it says in the Q&A. Want a refund please.
replyContent: Hi Alan, if you used the same Google account both times and exactly the same expansion (e.g. the all-in-one pack is not the same as buying them separately) this shouldn’t happen. Please contact our support team at android@usm.de and we’ll be happy to help.

content: I love the game play but was disappointed to discover that while the game has the same characters as Helpers of Catan for NPCs both of the non white characters (Lin and Nassir) are excluded. Considering the limited story and lake of complexity between NPCs this seems ridiculous that they arnt included. Especially since the only avatar we can use is one of the characters and people of colour play the game.
replyContent: Hi Valerie, please note that Lin and Nasir were added to the helper later on. We’re working on getting them into the app as well.

content: Private matches are very difficult to get going, had 4 people all sitting in online mode waiting for invites for almost two hours before we were able to get 2 of them in, we should have the standard expansion ability to be able to play with 6 people without having to purchase anything, there should be a built in message board on private games so you can talk to each other, I spent money on this app which I never do because I wanted to play with my friends and ended up not being able to play at all
Would like to have real chat options
Nice game!
Progress cards stopped working multiple times during Cities and Knights. 😢 lost many a battle after a long good game. NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!!!
Not fluid or easy. Gameplay is fun
Lig
Half a game.  In app purchases for the "second half" of the game.

Playing the seafarers single player and the game is caught in an infinite loop. After winning stage 16, it registers the match as a loss. This prevents me from advancing no matter how many times I beat the level. Very frustrating. . . . .

It looks like the pervious issue fixed itself. I encountered a new problem, where when i select a knight for the computer to remove, after playing the respective card, nothing happens. The computer doesn't choose a knight to remove, i don't get the option to place it. The only way to get out of this loop is to play another card. Using HTC M8 Google Play edition.
replyContent: Hi Dave, we cannot reproduce this on our M8. Maybe a recent Android update causes these system buttons to hide until you swipe down from the top of the screen?

content: ... And now I can play it anywhere anytime. Thanks for uploading this. Hours of fun, but, I wish there was a way of penalizing players who keep dropping out of online games it's frustrating.
I really love this boardgame and was super excited to see it was available online, but sadly it won't download due to an error.
replyContent: Dear Kristen, please check if this is a general Google Play error or something related directly to Catan. Our support team will gladly help if you provide some details to android@usm.de.

content: I love settlers of Catan, and was so excited to find this. However I beat all the levels in a few days (all expansions) and have been bored since. Please make new levels! I will pay more money! Also, there's a way to cheat which should be fixed, if it's my turn, and I roll a number that corresponds to another players gold tile, them not choosing boots ME from the game. This is frustrating beyond words as I'm usually winning when this happens, which is probably the motivation behind it.
Game sucks. Somehow defaults to German in error state. Matchmaking servers are slow. Registration sucks.  Too many graphical overlays.  SOOO much in game purchasing its ridiculous.

Great fun but the price is misleading. To get the full experience prepare to drop another  $10.00. You MUST have at least one expansion to access the campaign. This should be mentioned in the game's description. Still, a fun game worth checking out, especially if you like the board game.
I love this game world domination is whats up i bought the full version and love it more than the regular free version
How do I get my money back? I registered but it never sent me an email.  Won't reset password. Won't let me log in.
replyContent: Hi Nadine, please check your Spam folder for the registration mail or contact our support team directly at android@usm.de and we’ll set up your account manually.

content: Please developer fix online gold glitch that you play,with others
Ai is not correctly balanced. Ai almost never trades with you. Also get ready to have the robber dropped on you 2 to 3 times a round.
Don't waste your money.  Game is rigged.  Dice are rigged. Computer targets you.  Compete waste of time and money.
It keeps crashing on my phone.

Anyone who plays Catan in real life knows that players can't see your resources. In this game, the AI not only knows your resources, it knows the development cards you hold, and the dice rolls that are coming up next. The dice rolls are also "fixed" by the AI to give it an advantage when the human player is winning. 20 rolls in a row and 15 of them are 10 and the other five are 4, all held by the AI, is not statistically likely. In addition, the game runs the processor very hot and burns half of my battery while playing one game. I have a Dell Venue 7000 running virtually stock Lollipop.
replyContent: Dear Jason, dice rolls are purely random and of course there will be games with unusual dice roll distributions. In the long run this will even out in the overall statistics. If you want a less random dice mode, you could select the card stack option.

content: This takes all of the fun out of Settlers of Catan.  The AI players always target the human, resulting in a constant barrage of being robbed and unable to do anything.  It's the equivalent of playing with three total jerks that gang up on you at every possible opportunity.  You will consistently get stuck at 9 points with nothing to do until one of the computer players comes from behind to beat you.  Also,  it won't send the confirmation email, so I can't register to play online.
replyContent: Hi Michael, please check your Spam folder for the registration mail or contact our support team directly at android@usm.de and we’ll set up your account manually.

content: The app is fun and realistic. It's extremely fun playing against other people not just AI. The main issue is with the apps stability. One second you're having fun getting into the game then you have to restart the app because it froze or the dice won't roll. Now you need to close the app, re-launch, and hope no other player left the game or else you're stuck playing with AI. The stability really needs to be addressed.  Also, another annoying nuance is the inability to leave an online match without starting back at the main menu. Why wouldn't it kick you back to the online menu vs the main menu.  I'm running a stock VzW, Droid Turbo (64GB) phone with more than enough RAM and CPU. I don't really see how the hardware would be the factor as to why the two issues can't be resolved.  Side note - How do you propose a trade with only one player vs all players? I've looked up and down the internet for an answer with no luck.
replyContent: Hi Rob, please contact our support team at android@usm.de with some details on the stability issues and our developers will investigate. Currently trade offers are only possible to all fellow players.

content: I have the board game too... but prefer the app. No set up, and pack away, and no crying children to console if they didn't win ;)
No campaign unless you shell out at least another £2.99

The game is very good in most regards. I am enjoying being able to play even when I don't have enough people to play the board game. No real complaints, except that the AI won't trade with you if you are ahead even a single point--regardless of how much you up the ante. I read in the previous comments that changing to the easy setting and selecting the easier AI characters would change that. This statement is untrue.
replyContent: Hi Abi, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and if possible send a screenshot of the situation where the game seems stuck. We can’t reproduce this issue on our test device similar to yours at the moment.

content: I find that it crashes when use "Road Building" resource cards.
replyContent: Hi Gene, does this always happen? We are not able to reproduce this, so there are likely specific circumstances that cause this. Please provide any details (e.g. map played, game situation etc.) to android@usm.de and we’ll investigate.

content: Fun as the board and game play is fast.  Good AI makes game challenging
Love it.
According to the expansion section I should have access to the seafarers lite and the cities and knights lite, but the campaign section is locked...please help
replyContent: Hi Mindy, these scenarios can be selected in the custom game menu.

content: Could not register, even after ensuring my email was not already in use and after making sure I was using a very unique user name.
replyContent: Hi Matt, please check your Spam folder for the registration mail or contact our support team directly at android@usm.de and we’ll set up your account manually.

content: Game keeps uninstalling itself or crashing on my galaxy note 10.1 2014 ed tablet. the only fix I found for it is to uninstall and reinstall app making it impossible to save ranking/status. Online does not work. Registered and account but confirmation email never sent to my email. When I try to re-register it say email already registered yet it won't let me sign in with the username/password I did create. Very frustrating since I do think this is a fun game when it does work. Battery drain is noticeable but nothing ridiculously bad.
After unsuccessfully registering for Catan Online on my own I contacted the customer support. After about three days I was successful in creating a Catan account. I do enjoy this app.
Gameplay is pretty smooth and like the physical gameplay. Animations can be sped up to take less time, and the AI is rather effective.

Good thing I tested this within my two hours. I'm getting my refund. There is no way I'm going to spend that much money on a mobile version of settlers of catan! Basically they want 10.00$ for the expansion pack.
Extremely awesome game! Extremely unoptimized app!

The game is difficult to beat as the game always plays in favour of the computer players.  They always gain resources on every dice roll, unless they roll a 7 in which case they always rob from you. Why is there no options for easy, medium or hard mode. There are no details anywhere on what the in game icons mean only instructions on how to play catan. The game looks good but plays poorly. Multiplayer is a joke. The developers dont care, no updates since last year!
replyContent: Dear User, you can select an overall difficulty in the game’s settings (gear symbol in the main menu)

content: Won't let me or friends register an online account.  Help.
replyContent: Hi Tyler, please check your Spam folder for the registration mail or contact our support team directly at android@usm.de and we’ll set up your account manually.

content: Needs more scenarios or new games. My friends and I dominate the computers 1 on 1. Need more games for online play.

Little bugs in game can get very annoying for the playing experience. For example when the AI wants to trade with you and you accept the trade the act as though you declined trades with another AI. I was hoping if I could get information on whether this is a bug or just a part of the application.
Huge fan of the board game and this app represents the game 100% but saved games often don't load or crash on all all my devices. I don't expect this from a paid for app.

Every time I go to log in it says log in failed so I assume its my password I go to foregot password to change it type the email that I gave it says invalid data so I go to register new account and when I put the same e-mail and username but a different password it says username or e-mail address already seems to be in use but I go to type the same e-mail address in foregot password and it says invalid data I even changed the username to register again with a different password and still won't let me log in
replyContent: Hi Jake, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and we’ll check your account manually.

content: Kind of buggy.  In cities and knights sometimes cities get sacked even if you have sufficient active knights in play...
Need help
replyContent: Hi Walker, you’ll need to set up a free account before you can play online. This can be done directly from the game in the multiplayer menu.

content: Awesome! Love it! So addicting, and online play is great

Love catan so automatic 4 star but miffed at the uncanny ability of computers to magically move the robber with a knight right to the number they roll.  Every single time.  Maybe check dice randomizer because this seems a little too coincidental
Tech support is unable to reset a bad email address when registering for online play.

Das Spiel selber kenne ich als Brettspiel und bin absolut begeistert. Leider ist die Umsetzung für Android alles andere als gelungen und verdirbt den Spaß:  Texturen sind in extrem schlechter Auflösung * Bedienelemente und Texte sind auf großen Displays viel zu klein * extremer Energieverbrauch, nexus 4 wird extrem heiß
It would seem that while I only receive resources from the second City I place, the computer receives all resources at the start of a new game.
So I need to pay for an expansion to just play campaign? It's insane!
Unplayable without internet connection
replyContent: Hi Craig, of course the game can be played offline. You’ll have to download required art assets for your device once at the first start of the game – after that you can play offline as much as you want to.

content: Can't login!
replyContent: Hi Christopher-Ryan, please contact our support team at android@usm.de with your account name and registered email address and we’ll be happy to help.

content: Seems to be an excellent app.  I originally delayed purchasing because of so many recent negative reviews.  But having used the app, I don't understand all the bad reviews.  I think some of them might be complaints of just how smart the AI really is or not thinking thru battery issues given that the screen remains "on" the whole time you play.  But many of those issues can be "toned down" as the game has options for AI difficulty and various opens for robber and dice behavior.    Sorry that I delayed purchasing the app... already made a 2nd purchase to put it on my son's tablet so we can play against each other (without sharing devices... which is also possible).

I got this app to play with people online. The app won't let me register or log in. It says my user name/ email is already in use (which they aren't,  I even tried random letters as my username). If I try to login it says log in failed. This app doesn't work.
replyContent: Hi Sofia, please contact our support team at android@usm.de with your account name and registered email address and we’ll be happy to help.

content: I purchased this for my Android phone ( LG Nexus) and cannot seem to be able to roll the dice on my turn... help!  **UPDATE** Using a tablet now, so I figured I'd try again. Now during the tutorials there is no build menu for the trading tutorial. What is going on?
replyContent: Hi Malissa, the bug in the trading tutorial will be fixed in the next update. We’re sorry for the inconvenience caused. If you’re stil having trouble with the dice, please contact our support team at android@usm.de.

content: I am playing it with my Nexus 9 device, most of the times during the game I face this issue: building roads,settlements,etc. and replacing ships on bottom half of the board freezes the app. You can get away with closing the app an reloading the game, but obviously a show stopper for online gaming. This is a serious issue!
replyContent: Hi Mehdi, if you are using any kind of custom ROM or extensive UI mod on your device, please let us know via android@usm.de and we’ll investigate further. We have tested on a Nexus 9 running the latest available Android version and were not able to reproduce the error you are describing.

content: Ok

I had to create to different accounts with two different emails to try to get it to work, but it wont. I cant login with my email OR nickname, nor can I create an account with the same credentials. Please help ASAP, because I don't want to pay 4 dollars for a game I cant even play.
replyContent: Hi Stephen, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and we’ll be happy to help.

content: Whilst playing online, Game freezes constantly. While playing, when trying to view cards, they are not visible. Frustrating as I then eventually have to quit the game.
This app has so many issues I don't know where to start. It's a shame really because the game is the best ever

The game itself is well done.  Though i can't really foresee wanting to pass my phone around the room to take turns with human players, this makes trading, difficult.  And memory of what you have, resources, comes into play.  This game wasn't worth the money since you're only playing computer players.  If there was an online multi-player version of this, it would be worth it.
replyContent: Hi Aaron, Catan does have an online multiplayer mode: Simply select online in the main menu, register an account, and you can play online!

content: No way to open the menu to build.  Missing grey circle to swipe open.  Nexus 7 2013
replyContent: Hi Lance, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and provide a screenshot is possible. Thank you!

content: After a little hiccup it installed onto my phone. It's a quality game. Can easily pass a few hours playing it. Great for traveling long journeys or just having a lazy afternoon in the sun. The campaigns are fun and addictive. Overall a great phone version of the board game!
replyContent: Hi James, this seems to be a Google Play error message that we regrettably have little influence on. If you contact our support team at android@usm.de we’ll be happy to help.

content: I am not sure what others are complaining about as I can find nothing wrong with the game. The AI is perfect. AI may be frustrating at times but that is how the game is played. The AI acts just like a person would. I have tried to find another game as good as this one but have had no luck.  I will keep playing for a long time.  I like the online multiplayer that was added a little while ago.  I would enjoy seeing some more missions and expansions.  Great job on this game.  I love it!

After selecting which card to play, unable to select which opponent to use it on, which settlement to turn into city, where to place the robber, build roads, etc. Pretty much makes the game unplayable when the A I and other players can use game mechanics you can't. Added star for dev attempts at trouble shooting... will see how it turns out...
replyContent: Hi Samantha, when you have to select a target player, you have to tap on one of their settlements and cities that are highlighted in these situations. Is this highlight missing or do the settlements/cities not react to input? Please contact our support at android@usm.de with some details and we’ll be happy to help.

content: Can't start playing online. Can register
Tried to reset password.  Sent me to some BS German link that doesn't work.  Refund please.
AI can steal a knight and use it to displace the robber in the same turn.
Its not brilliantly explained. But is fun.

But sometimes when I play enchanted islands, I set the victory points all the way up, and it's happened twice now the computer won way before they ever reached 24 points.
