Once they won at 12, and once they won at 15. It wasnt because of victory point cards either, because I can see how many progress cards were in their hands and it didn't add up. What happened? Just happened  3rd time, won at 15 points. Very annoying.
replyContent: Hi Kelsi, we’d appreciate if you could send a screenshot of the final game screen when this happened (preferably with the whole board visible) to android@usm.de. Then our developers can investigate further.

content: Not realistic and annoying
I was charged twice for this game. But all of my emails to to developer are completely ignored. You owe me $3.99. Please issue me a refund immediately.
replyContent: Dear Sara, we just checked with support and bookkeeping: Your emails were all answered under ticket # 9169 - please check your spam folder as well if you missed them. Furthermore we only have one Google Play order number from you on June 21st: 12999...1358762895515455. Please provide the second order number and we can check for that as well.

content: Catan is great as a board game but until these programmers develop a fair AI that doesn't rely on rolling 7s as soon as the human player can be robbed as well as other cheats, don't waste your money. I have had roll configs analyzed by a stats professor and he confirmed that it is consistently statistically unlikely for the rolls to come up like they do.
Game

***UPDATE: "Card Stack" rolls feel more natural and balanced.  Rating accordingly.***     I'd like to know how it is possible to have #6 rolled 7 TIMES IN A ROW.  Also, its as if the app was written to favor the AI making it nearly impossible to win a round.  I've played the board version of Catan and never has it been as frustrating as the mobile app.
replyContent: Dear Jason, dice rolls in Catan are purely random – and although rolling a number 7 times in a row is indeed very rare, it is one of the effects of a randomizer that these things can happen. If you want to have a more even distribution of dice rolls in every single game, you can select the “card stack” dice mode in the game options.

content: Firdt the dice rolls show a solid pattern of numbers you do not have, I had almost all but two numbers and for 3 cycles around it was one of those numbers. Then as for menue for build and cards. After the game gets full of other aspects the graphics of cards and other back data disappears
replyContent: Hi Daniel, dice rolls in Catan are purely random – and although rolling two numbers several times in a row is indeed rare, it is one of the effects of a randomizer that these things can happen. If you want to have a more even distribution of dice rolls in every single game, you can select the “card stack” dice mode in the game options.

content: Zero stars.  Was unable to download additional content on my Nexus 6. Tried multiple WiFI connections and my LTE data network.  Cleared data and uninstalled app and tried again. Still no go. Would like my money back.
replyContent: Hi Martin, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and we’ll be happy to help.

content: Great app.  Stays true to Catan rules.   AI is really easy though, but you can play offline with a friend and pass the device for offline play or if you both have the app you can play online.

Playing on a Motorola xoom. Cannot accept road placement after trying to place a road in the place I wanted which was a task in itself. Cannot quit the game at all , had to jump to the home screen and then stop app from settings menu. Just isn't fun.
Much faster than setting up and using a real board too.

The AI always rob from you if you're leading the game; even human does that. AI trade with you only if he has benefitting from. The trade of course, humans do the same. You can't except to play against AI and think, they are stupider than you... This game is just awesome. Last thing, you can't give a bad rating if your phone is heating. I have a nexus5 which always heat with other games but never heated with Catan til now. Thx to the developers; $3 was a good investment.

The "Brawn over Brains" achievement isn't awarded even after you meet the requirements. Online multi-player is unplayable because there's no way to kick someone who stops playing. The dice rolls when playing vs AI are not random and are programmed to give numbers you don't get resources from more often. I had a game with 17 8s rolled and 0 6s because I had no settlements on 8, only on 6. Etc etc
replyContent: Dear John, you can kick a player and replace him with a computer when the time limit is reached. Dice rolls are purely random and of course there will be games with unusual dice roll distributions. In the long run this will even out in the overall statistics. If you want a less random dice mode, you could select the card stack option.

content: Its a good game but it needs some way to talk to other players online or something. The online play has all these different board games for online play but they are locked and I dont understand how u r suppose to open em. If u buy the expansions u get one board for that expansion. Other than that its fun.
replyContent: Hi Stephanie, when you buy an expansion you can select all included scenarios in multiplayer custom mode. If you play an multiplayer quick match, a random map that all participating player have will be chosen, most of the basic game as this is available to all players.

content: After playing multiple games I've become frustrated with the AI and random number generator. First, the AI cooperates with itself whether it's in the lead our not. It does not matter who the computer player is. Second, the supposed random numbers are anything but. The moment you get a lead, resources stop coming in. I have to play with the resource bonus on our go upwards of ten rolls without getting anything. It is a faithful port of a classic board game, and fun to play online.
replyContent: Hi Michael, if you want a less random dice distribution you can select the card-stack dice mode in the game options.

content: This is a very fun game to play and is just like the board game. There are a couple of features that could be added though. 1. Allow for complete randomization of the board (have a mode where 3 wheat or 3 wood can't be connected). 2. Allow for people to send game invites to friends even if they are not online, make them get a notification when they are invited to a game. 3. Send a notification when it is that person's turn, also put a 30 second time limit on trades. I think these features will help the game

Drains battery extremely fast, even if I just open the app and then background it without playing a game. It will just sit on the background draining the battery. Running stock android, battery screen shows Catan as top battery consuming app. I always have to kill the app after playing a game.
replyContent: Dear Nathaniel, our development team is currently investigating this issue. So far we were not able to reproduce this on the same device you have but will continue to work on this.

content: Game works fine, AI can be kind of difficult and biased but it's a digital dice game so it's expected..... Just put it on easy.   There are quite a bit of issues with the GUI with the pop up screens when it gets further into the game. Would be 5 stars for me if there were no issues.
replyContent: Dear Ryan, if you contact our support team at android@usm.de and provide some details on these GUI issues, our development team will investigate.

content: It's impossible to win a match you get ahead by 4 points then they manage to come back? 7 is rolled 4 times in a row what are the odds? Worst 5 bucks spent buy the real game
replyContent: Dear Tyler, dice rolls are purely random and the 7 is statistically the most-rolled number with 2 dice. Furthermore the hard computer players will always to after the player in the lead to have a chance at winning themselves. You could always change the difficulty settings or change the dice more.

content: Have to "register" by providing an email address AND the actual password for that email address... then confirm it through that email.   [EDIT] Got a comment  from the developer (I guess) claiming they didn't need my password. I must have tried the typical approach 50 times (random numbers, names etc.) Nothing worked until the ONE time I created a fake email and provided the password.  Weird, but I'll give them the benefit of the doubt.  That being said I have played single player, and I'm hooked, it's a great game.  Sometimes the rolls seem a little too convenient for the opponents, but that may be a way to balance their poor decisions.  I know they claim it's random and even show a normal pattern, but the ORDER of the rolls seem fishy to me. But it's probably just my confirmation bias...
replyContent: Hi Jack, of course we don't need your email password! You simply have to select a username, new password (for Catan online!) and provide an email address for that account as a confirmation. We will send you one account confirmation email to that address - That's all. If you have further questions, please contact our support team at android@usm.de.

content: There are a lot of complaints about a difficult AI, but if you have played settlers before, you know that the best strategy is to place the robber on the person doing the best. This game does this very well and makes winning a challenge. It wouldn't be fun if winning was too easy. If the robber being placed on your property when you are doing well is too difficult, then turn down the difficulty. One thing that could make this app better would be an option to not have resource draw animations.
replyContent: Dear Scott, thanks for your comments. You can speed up the animation up to the “ultra” setting in the game options.

content: Best board game I've ever played, both irl and on the android.

I agree with everyone about the dice being rolled to favor the AI.  That isn't "fierce competition"-- it's pain old cheating programmed right in. The 2 and 12 get rolled an inordinate amount of times, right when it's convenient for them. And if you play with 3 AI they rob you, and only you, even if you AREn't in the lead. I've played this for so many hours it's embarrassing, but I know the patterns now. It's a lot more satisfying to lose against a human online,  because at least you know they didn't cheat.
replyContent: Hi Zachary, we can do no more than assure you that the dice results are purely random. If you want are less random and more even distribution of dice results in every single game you could try the “card stack” dice option in the game settings.

content: Great alternative to waiting to play with friends. #foreverAlone

as a player of the board game version, it is impossible to nail down three other people for a couple of hours. it is almost as though this game was made for mobile, but just happened to be a board game first ♥♥♥

While I can certainly think of improvements, this version does do some things better than other implementations. I love the local pass & play option for one: great use of the platform, albeit slow to play (preferable to setting up the physical game with several expansions still though).  I don't know if they play games, but progress cards are blatantly implemented as stacks with no discard, so that makes some C & K games pretty broken, it bears mention.  Some major flaws no matter what they seem to fix.
replyContent: Dear user, we are looking into this issue already. If you have any other feedback, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and we will collect feedback for the development team.

content: So as soon as I throw a 7, I move the robber and the game can't move on. Complete waste of money until that gets fixed.
replyContent: Dear Michael, if you move the robber to a tile where multiple players have settlements, you’ll have to select whom to rob before the game can continue.

content: The AI remains awful. Even on easiest settings, computer controlled players rarely ever trade (even to their great benefit), RNG breaks all probability models when it hurts human players, robber is constantly set on human players tiles (even when there are no resources to take) with rare possibilities of ever moving - I could go on. Terrible game that ruins Catan and wastes $3.99. I rarely regret purchases, but this game is an exception. Awful experience.
Can't access menu, every time you reopen you have to install the same additional download
replyContent: Hi Charlie, you’ll need to download the additional assets only on the first startup. If you encounter any problem at this time, please check your firewall settings or try downloading from another WiFi. If this does not solve your issue, please contact our support team at android@usm.de. Thanks.

content: The AI on this game is very frustrating and not very good.  I want to play a harder AI although it should be more realistic.  It almost always starts off robbing you 80-90% of the time until one of the computer players is up 2-3 on you.  I love everything else but I'm about done with playing because how annoying it is that they automatically come for you regardless of the situation.  Just seems like a harder AI only means they all come after you unless your down two points or more.
For a board game on a phone it's great and does kill my battery but it's worth it
Play with me la

I thought I had purchased the game, but it seems I only purchased the ability to purchase the game. The campaign mode is completely locked, I can only play custom games and possibly online. When I buy a game, I expect to play the campaign and not just random matches, I want to something to accomplish. This was a rip off.

I love this game and being able to play while im out and about is wonderful. However i wouldnlike to see updates to the AI. My issues are that the computers will make trades that no sane human player would make. Also they do not take the number of development cards a player is holding when choosing to place the robber also, ownership of a 2:1 resource port. the computer players should make more decisions that are based on a variety of factors, like a human would, rather than simply the # of victory points
replyContent: Dear Greg, thanks for your feedback. The AI does base its decisions on other factors than VP as well, but is does not plan as far ahead as a very good human player would.

content: The game is great, but the app needs a lot of work. Before i even played it, it used 10% of my battery in a day without touching it. I played it once and uninstalled it. Bummer i lost the money, but hopefully they'll fix it soon. I noticed it has a service constantly running, you can't shut it off. On a stock moto x, no modifications. You're also only buying part of the game. They don't make that clear, kind of a shady business practice.
replyContent: Are you running a stock android version or a rooted phone with extensive UI modifications? Catan shouldn`t use that much battery and we weren`t able to reproduce this on similar phones. In the meantime you can manually close the application as a workaround. We’ll be happy to help if you let us know further details on your device via android@usm.de.

content: I have an Asus ME176. I have to reinstall the App whenever I turn off/ on my tablet. Customer  Support, please advise or give me a refund.
replyContent: Dear Martin, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and we’ll be happy to help.

content: The app is glitchy and crashes a lot when playing online.  many of the features do not work.  The game itself is good and easy to play but it's very frustrating not being able to use features and having glitches happen regularly
replyContent: Hi Cerissa if you provide some details on the issues you mentioned to our support team at android@usm.de we’ll investigate further.

content: Very clean and easy to play. Not sure why everyone is complaining about the AI.

Extremely fun and challenging. I could play this game for hours. (The ai does target you when you're on the lead but i think thats normal n should be expected. I welcome the challenge and after getting the hang of things so will you).  The problem is that the game crashes, frequently. Often shutting down my phone together with the game. Happens so often that I have to take off 2 stars from an otherwise perfect 5.
replyContent: Hi Aranay, thank you for your feedback! If you provide some details on the crashes you experienced (ingame situation) to our support team at android@usm.de, we’ll be able to investigate and fix these.

content: Three games in a row I have been up by as many as 7 points and have lost as the computer quite literally robs me of everything. No one trades because you are in the lead. What am I supposed to do, buy nothing and intentionally suck in the beginning so I can come from behind and actually have a chance? Your algorithm is to extreme. It does not work. Carcassonne it is then.
replyContent: Dear Todd, please note that you can always change the difficulty setting in the options. Preparing for the last turns by having access to a harbor that trades a resource that you usually get plenty of is a good example to counter late-game trade blocks by humans and AI players alike.

content: Game makes my phone and tablet very hot and kills my battery  100% to 0% in 2 hours
replyContent: Hi Tal, are you using a custom ROM or just the stock Android? This battery consumption is definitely unusual and isn’t caused by Catan alone on our (similar) test device.

content: Won't download.
replyContent: Hi Patrick, the initial download after installation from Google Play might be blocked by firewall settings of your connection. If you can, please try another WiFi to make sure it’s not a problem based on your current connection. Thanks!

content: So I got the game for 4 bucks then installed it and opened it. As soon as you click play it asks for another 4-9 dollars to play. Not exactly sure what you are buying other than the ability to buy more stuff.
replyContent: Hi Omega, the app includes the Catan basic game that offers all the content of the board game and additional scenarios. The campaign consists of scenarios contained in the Seafarers and Cities and Knights expansions.

content: Technically really good, but have to agree that seafarers no.6 is difficult, but if you're very calculated in placement then you can win. Great if you need a fix of catan when you can't get together with friends too often for catan. Downside is if you look like doing ok, have loads of great cards about to cross the line and it comes to your turn-every time you pull 7.
A great game and a lot of fun. I bought all the expansions and have played hours of this game. Also it has made me an excellent Catan player
Love this game and heavily addicted. The Google play achievements are very buggy, though

It's to the point where some players quit during settlement placement if they don't get their way. Even worse mid game if you build where other people want to build. Less than half the online games are completed due to quitters.
Needs chat function

Although after the update, you can no longer see and use others cards, now on others turns you can not see your own cards... Fix it, then you will get more stars... Fantastic besides the impossible AI... Fix those two MAJOR problems and you can have a better rating...

Social networking aptitude and mental muscle builder all in one.    Very inspiring. Five stars for more consideration regarding social balance.       Keep it up.!        God is good!! Jesus is great!!!

The game is great, but after one-two games starts eating up the battery and causes system lags. Also dialogs content disappears, e.g. dev. cards, which makes it unplayable. Now it just hangs, nothing can do - no clicks, nothing. Clean android, no 3rd apps at all. Using android 5, nexus 10
replyContent: Hi Nick, we have this device for testing as well and have not been able to reproduce this behavior. Are you running a custom firmware on a rooted device or extensive UI mods? Please contact our support team at android@usm.de and we'll try to help.

content: As soon as the lead is secured the ai target the player.  After stealing all your resources you will go turns without getting enough to build and by that time the ai will have too many development cards to compete with (this is the easiest ai settings).  Hopefully this problem is fixed soon.
Sweet game but AI is unrealistic.  I will be down by 3 points and in 3rd place and all 3 AI will still use a knight /roll robber and block me. Makes no logical sense at all. Still fun though

Good implementation of a great game. Random crashes, bugs like being able to buy development cards without resources or place settlements on top of one another make the quality more on par with a free game.
Locks up after initial download
Keeps crashing. Absolute garbage.

Playing against the AI is like playing 3 against 1: they will constantly move the robber over your resources and steal from you, turn after then, even when you are not leading or have any advantage (I've played countless games where I've has less than three cards each time it was my turn, for too many consecutive turns). Makes you just want to throw your phone across the room. Also, the "resources lost to robber" statistic for the player in the game summary is ALWAYS zero.

Computer cheats.  was 1 point away from winning, ahead of everyone else by 4 points. Had cities and villages on 7 of the 11 number. For the next 15 rounds (1 round being everyone played had rolled) none of my numbers was rolled. Literally sat their and watched the computer play  each other. AI took my resources with the robber and then AI made critical trades with AI that was closest in points to me so computer can win. Game is fun but it's not everyone against everyone it's everyone against you.
Hi,  I purchased this app and it will not download. I do not have trouble with any other apps downloading to my phone.  Can I be refunded?  Or have this fixed?

The app itself runs great, the interface is nice, but the Computer's mechanics are very clearly rigged. The dice aren't actually random, and neither are the cards. There's a 14% chance of drawing a monopoly card, but there were 3 drawn in the first half of the game.   They also would roll a 7 any time I denied to trade with them for what cards they wanted so they could just send the robber to me and take whatever they needed. I must have seen all 3 players roll 7s in a row, clean me out, and then when it's my turn I have no more resources so I just have to roll again, like three times in one game.   They also manage to build up multiple settlements and cities while still getting 1-2 dev cards on every round because the computer trades with itself (obviously it knows what all 3 hands contain), which means they have at least one victory card, and they always have at least one knight card on hand so that they can take your resources from you. So even if they don't roll a 7 they will use a knight to take what you denied them in trade.  This is generally how these games go against the computer in this app.

Have had game save issues before, but I just learned about the cheat. This makes up for the bug. Also, I'm sick of reading reviews that think the ai is too difficult. The ai plays logical without emotion. So when it sees you competing for resource or in the lead they fight against you. They fight amongst themself if you are losing. Also, if you are being targeted by the ai you must be winning... So they must not be too difficult if you happen to be winning. Great game... Probably my favorite android game.

Cross-platform online play. Play with friends on iOS. Fantastic game play. True to the original. Solid design. Scenarios are great and all the expansions have been worth the money. Can't say enough good about Catan.
Thanks for the reply, maybe I'm just unlucky for rolling the dice when playing with ai, very unlucky, 5,6,7,8 lot is not as often rolled compared to playing online, not sure why

AI is a joke. Just counted 18 rounds in a row I got robbed. There's a 0.1% chance of that happening with 2 opponents, but this happens pretty frequently. Online isn't much better. Wait around for 30 minutes to get a 4 person "quick match" only to have an opponent leave after their 10 minute turn.
replyContent: The number 7 is most frequently rolled when throwing two dice. Furthermore only if you play against strong AI characters and are in the lead you should notice the competition getting fiercer,e.g. the AI using the robber against you frequently. You can always lower the difficulty setting or select easier AI opponents that will play less competitive.

content: Seldom can you trade with an AI opponent successfully, but the AIs simply exchange resources as they know what the other AIs have and what the others need. But that's not the worst part. AIs always rob you whenever they have a chance and no matter how few the stars you have, making the game totally unplayable and unrealistic. The algorithm should definitely be redesigned, especially for the hard difficulty.
replyContent: Hi Albert, only if you play against strong AI characters and are in the lead you should notice the competition getting fiercer, e.g. the AI using the robber against you frequently. We try to offer a challenge for Catan veterans and beginners alike, you might want to lower the general difficulty setting or play against easier AI opponents.

content: Settlers is the Monopoly of indie games. It's a horrible game, governed by random chance, where you can watch yourself lose for an hour and have absolutely no recourse, that everyone seems to play. It deserves less than 1 out of 5 stars.
replyContent: Hi Jason, while Catan certainly has random elements (dice, drawing from a card deck), careful planning and the right strategy play a huge part in winning. However as with every game, getting used to the different possible tactics and ways of playing take some time. We’d be happy if you give the game a second chance ;)

content: Love the app but it should be so that whenever we trade or get robbed, it shows how many development cards and roads/settlements/cities we have left. It could affect the cards we let go.    For example, yes I will trade my wood for wheat so I can buy a development card. My turn is next, all cards gone. Wasted wood, and no one likes wasted wood!
replyContent: Hi Greg, thanks for your suggestion – We’ve forwarded it to the development team.

content: I read alot of comments from android and other platform that can play catan. Many go back in years but the AI trading with winning AI is still an issue. Patching these little thing should be easier than hiring someone to keep replying negative feedbacks.
replyContent: Hi Ponlathep, the AI uses the same system to evaluate trading with human and other AI players. That means that the AI will only trade with the winning player (no matter if human or AI) if it can then build and important project themselves. Replying to negative feedback also helps us to improve the game.

content: The Ai cheats it's a simple as that makes the game unplayable and extremely frustrating. Computer has yet to role a seven and get robbed, I've rolled 7s and got robed lat 3 turns running
replyContent: Hi Thomas, the AI  does not cheat and the same random dice generator is used for AI and human players. However you can tune down the randomness of the dice by selecting “card stack” as dice mode option.

content: Dice are always against you and your opponents trade one for one all the time,no matter whom you choose. Frustrating.
Great mobile version  of a classic board game!
Computer players just bully you constantly with the robber which means some games are boring and frustrating.
replyContent: Hi Billie, only if you play against strong AI characters and are in the lead you should notice the competition getting fiercer. You can always lower the difficulty setting or select easier AI opponents that will play less competitive.

content: When playing against the computer the game will cheat once you get a point or two ahead. The more you pull ahead the more difficult it gets. It doesn't matter what you do to the settings or the computer player you choose, you will get hit with 7s, knight cards and odd number drops until the computer wins.
replyContent: Hi Rob, as in the board game, players will most often target the player currently in the lead. Only if you play against strong AI characters and are in the lead you should notice the competition getting significantly  fiercer. You can always lower the difficulty setting or select easier AI opponents that will play less competitive.

content: I am a big fan of the settlers board game and this mobile experience defiantly lives up to that. I would absolutely recommend this app for anyone looking for a mobile game that actually challenges and engages you. One question I have is, have the development cards changed? I deleted the app and reinstalled after a six month break, and upon playing I find I can't switch tiles. Is there anyway to uninstall updates?
replyContent: Lovely you like Catan! The development cards haven’t changed. We’re not sure what you mean by “switching tiles”:Is it the inventor card you are referring to? This still works as before,e.g. selecting two number tiles to change places. Please contact our support team at android@usm.de with some details, screenshot and we’ll be happy to help further.

content: I tried my phone number as a username and a new email account it wasn't a problem on my end help please

I love this game and play it a lot. But for some reason recently it just won't open and I have to unistall then re install it to get it to work again which is so irritating.. I get one or two games played then it crashes again. Running it on a Samsung tab s 10 and as far as I know have nothing weird running on it that might effect it? Please fix this bug

Love the game.  It can be frustrating and hard, but with some strategy and figuring out the strategy that the AI is programmed to use it becomes easier to compete against, there are also difficulty settings. I see that others are frustrated with how hard it can be to win.  Remember it is a dice game and there is a level of chance that makes its a little more difficult to win on purpose like chess for example.  The game is far less glitchy compared to other apps I have downloaded so i am happy with that.  If it seems hard or really difficult use some perseverance and figure out how to get better at it that part of the challenge and part of the fun.  Don't blam the game for being "Hard"  I give it a 5 because i have played the physical verson and am just as pleased with both versions, i like that is has a campain and fun maps and add on packs.  and that i can play the game online with others or the AI any time instead of finding people to play with me at the kitchen table.  I would rather play in person with someone if i have the choice.  but i Can also do that with this app as well.

The AI will never trade you what you need and will always put the theif on your hex locations and then steal from you. They never steal from each other it's always you. They will trade with each other but never you. Makes it impossible to win. If this gets changed I will give it more stars but as for now this game is Crap!
I havnt had any problems with this game. I love playing it on here and game board. Definitely cheaper than the actual game though. Online is good too!

Every time a 7 is rolled, the computers go after the player. It gets very tedious when all of your resources are stolen, and of course, the material you need most. Just an update after months of owning game, still stacked against player even though I'm far from being in the lead. This makes me want to stop playing. As a response to the same tedious reply from the developer, I am at medium difficulty, not in the lead and they won't trade with me and the robber is always being moved to my hex.
replyContent: Hi Casey, only if you play against strong AI characters and are in the lead you should notice the competition getting fiercer. You can always lower the difficulty setting or select easier AI opponents that will play less competitive.

content: Kills my battery unless I force stop the app when not in use.
replyContent: Hi Jeremy, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and provide some details on your device and the installed Android version and we'll try to analyse why it drains the battery so fast in your case.

content: Fun for a game on the go

The app is good and you don't need to buy any extras if you don't want to, and you still get the game and two expansions. I didn't see right away what everyone was talking about with the rigged dice roll but it definitely happens to an extent. Almost every time the robber is moved to one of my spaces that number is rolled immediately after. However the development cards are where things get shady. Every time I've lost it's because the computer player has 3 or 4 victory point cards. Still a good app.

Does this issue persist after restarting the device or are you running a rooted device and/or extensive UI mods that might interfere with Google Play? Please let our support team at android@usm.de know about these details and we'll be happy to help.

Please contact our support team at android@usm.de with any details that might help us to analyze this behavior.

content: Game plays well but pretty basic. Certain aspects are incredibly stupid, definitely not worth purchasing. Even tried giving it another shot, this game is an absolute waste! If you purchase this app you are going to regret it regardless of the cost.....not even worth free. Game play with the AI is so bad that I just uninstalled it. Worst game I have ever played.
Play online against players in seafarers and cities and knights

A few of the controls were so tricky I almost gave up and thought it was a glitch with the robber. But eventually I figured it out. The tutorial is missing a few crucial pieces but once you get the hang of it the game is so much fun. I've spent so many hours addicted to this game!
replyContent: Hi Meri, just let us know what info you think is missing from the tutorial and we’ll review if we can add this. Furthermore many important keywords and rules can be checked via the included Catan almanac.

content: It's a great game in the flesh, but in this, the robber gets rolled way too often and when it doesn't, the knight card gets played way too much by AI. In seafarers campaign scenario 1, Mary ann will almost always win. As soon as you take the lead the AI works in concert to specifically deny you any resources including almost constant stealing (by way of robber) or refusal of resources (no trade and robber blocking numbers from being rolled. On MEDIUM DIFFICULTY)
Great for killing time at work

I like this game so much that I am considering buying the original boardgame. I haven't had the time while at home to play my beloved Sid Meier's Civ/Alpha Centauri games for years so I searched for an app thinking I would probably be disppointed. "Settlers..." is part Stratego, part Yatzhi/Risk, part M.U.L.E., and the heaviest dose of Civilization. Games are relatively quick. No matter how smart you think you are, the robber, roll-specific resources,and event cards always throw curve balls. Love it.

Game requires two downloads.   Second download from USM doesn't work.   When I asked customer service he keeps telling me to make sure my phone isn't on airplane mode.  Equivalent of "are you sure its plugged in?" Not helpful at all.
replyContent: Hi Adam,we’re sorry that our support team couldn’t help. Please note that we had many people asking about this and airplane mode was the cause very often. Therefore we asked about that first. If you let us know about your connection (maybe a firewall etc. is getting in the way?) we’ll try to help and figure out what causes these connections issues!

content: Great game, brilliant features - would have 5 stars. However you can only play one way in landscape and the game will not flip the other way which is very frustrating for chargers etc! Hope to be able to give 5 stars soon :)

Fun game but terrible implementation of trading in the app. Often a computer player will make twenty(!!!) or more offers, all rejected by the user, in a single turn of the player. FIX THIS!!!! don't repeat rejected offers and provide an option to reject all offers from a specific player for that turn.
They don't actually five you the game. You pay 4 bucks for the lite version and another 9 for the actual game. Common you crooks.
The computer's refusal to trade with you when you're ahead -even by just one point - and then expecting you to trade with them isn't how real people play the game.
Best app for a board game ever! Love the fact that I can either play with my friends or online with a new group of skills!
App says "Catan stopped working" "com.exozet.android.catan stopped working" when I try to open it with my Note 3. I have tried reinstalling. Fix this and I'll happily give this app 5 stars!
replyContent: Hi Max, we're sorry that you're having trouble with Catan. Please contact our support team at android@usm.de and provide some details on your device settings and when exactly the shutdown happens, e.g. before or after the additional download. We'll be happy to help!

content: On occasion the game would desync,  ending the game early and would skip my turn entirely at times.   Great Game but needs a patch,  BADLY.
Gameplay much improved. Nice game.
After a while playing, I'm starting to repeat the maps over and over. I wish more maps to be released soon.

If you plan on playing against the computer, be prepared to be frustrated. They start every round trading resources with one another at 1 for 1 rates until they all have significant stacks of development cards, then they will alternate all the knights they receive between your various properties constantly and steal your resources. You can still win, but it isn't the least bit fun to play against.
replyContent: Hi Shane, AI player will only refuse trade with the player if he is in the lead or currently competing for a building spot. Only if you play against strong AI characters and are in the lead you should notice the competition getting fiercer. You can always lower the difficulty setting or select easier AI opponents that will play less competitive.

content: It crashes constantly but by deleting and reinstall it temporarily clears the ONLY problem with this app. Otherwise five stars. UPdate: reinstall have fixed the problem
Made me invest in table top gaming. Pity about the AI and the way the game throws sevens.
Need to talk to text to each other
I love the board game so obviously any chance to play any where anytime is awesome
After purchasing the game you need to purchase also some packages to play the campaign mode. I think it's not fair.
This version is amazing. I'm so glad that these guys stayed so true to the original!

The dice rolls feel rigged sometimes. Honestly, I blow at Catan, but when I am winning, the rolls begin to feel rigged.  Also, the cpus never accept any of my trades, unless they initiate the trade first. One more thing, the seafarers lite pack is glitched. When I try to move my ship, the screen scrolls off the map, and I can't move it. Look into these issues, especially the last one, please.

Updates have killed this game! Game was fun when I first got it, but as updates have come it's gotten worse. The cpu  rolls an average of 5 to 1 on the 7s  against human. The cpu rolls the numbers that human player is not on. Example cpu will roll lots of 11s  if cpu has those and human does not. Very lame!
The expansions are a little spendy, but great game.
I really enjoy the mobile version of this really great board game!
i play campaign mode  now i win 18 level but on the title screen show i stay at level 16 , maybe it's a bug?

Honestly if I could get a refund I would. This game has such a biased dice roll, no matter how it is played, that it isn't funny and has ruined this game for me. Three games in a row despite having settlements/cities on 5, 6, 4, and 10, THEY WERE NEVER ROLLED. The AIs had 9, 11, 12, 8, and 2. Guess what got rolled? 9 and 8 were the most frequent numbers next to seven  and six was the second lowest only eclipsed by 2. 5 and 4 were also in the bottom four of dice rolls. Last time I checked, you can make 4 and 5 with more combinations than you can 11 and 12 put together. The dice rolls need serious work no matter what of the three "types" of dice roll is going on. I have gone in two games now without getting any resource FOR OVER 20 TURNS. AIs have over 15 resources and I have 0. Random dice? Ha try biased dice.  Update: The dice are the worse I've ever seen. If the robber is on a 5 and you have a five that is shut off and it's never been rolled, all of a sudden, it's being rolled. FIX YOUR RANDOM NUMBER GENERATOR. Further update: While it limits the player to four progress cards, the AIs can have infinite. Not cool.

I love this game, but the AI is waaaaaaay to aggressive.  I understand them ganging up on me when I'm in the lead, but even after they've overtaken me, they constantly move the robber to block me, and steal from me exclusively.

Had this app before the update for playing online. It worked fine. Updated it to include the online play. Try to get online to play ( I can put my username and password in and that's as far as i get) I ALWAYS get the message after it says it's connecting "Error while handshaking"!!!  Deleted and reinstalled the app hoping that would fix the bug, but no same problem everytime.  Paid for an app that I can't even play online. Unhappy!
$3.99 for a game that immediately has only locked content you have to pay to unlock?  You're joking right?
This game is great in person but it doesn't have the same feel in app. I was really let down by the expansions costing so much extra in game. There isn't even campaign unless you pay at least 10$
Dice rolls adjusted to benefit AI once you start winning.
I love settlers of catan and having a app version is even more better for those times of bordem and waiting. Thanks for fixing issues.

Hard to fault apart from the AI are never as much fun as playing with real people! I really enjoyed the campaign however.
Online multilayer should be able to leave the app and come back and play over a longer time period
This game you have to pay for the game and you only get a lite version of an expansion then pay for an expansion to play campaign mode! This is more of a money grab than a good game!
Awesome to have settlers on my phone but the frequency the robber comes out kind of kills it. They should down weight it slightly imo

Love this game, but purchased the new scenarios and can't find them on the menu to play them. Where are they? They show as purchased and installed.

I downloaded the game, tried to open it. It said that it needed to download extra data, I accepted. I accepted four times and everytime it says download was successful but when I try to open the game it asks me to download the extra data again. I just want to play the game!
Created account and it fails to sign in. Tried to reset password and it says invalid data.
Able to play custom games just like the board game, it is fun. But if you want to play campaign you have to pay more for each unlock. So just beware it's not buy once get everything.

So buggy, unplayable.

My recommendation is to make the single player mode available without the need for the constant updates. Other than that, it's a great game. I still update it, but it seems like the update frequency that is required to play single player is a bit excessive.
This game is so much fun but I think the game board game version is way more fun personally;)

Like many others, I am stuck on campaign 6. I also noticed the thing about rolling 7 when you have 8 or more cards. Also once you get near a win, the AI can rob you literally 5 times before you get a turn. Not to mention the AI will make bad trades that let them get ahead. Also last game the AI won with like FIVE victory cards. It feels extremely cheap. They could definitely improve the AI and stop putting all the difficulty based on the robber frequency and how often the AI get victory point cards.

After playing thus game for a week, I have decided to stop playing.  The robber ai makes the game unplayable.  You regularly get robbed 3 times a round making it extremely unlikely that you can do anything for several turns other than watch the computer play... The computer players seem to choose the human whether he is winning our not

I am incredibly happy this is on the app store and I spend hours on this game. Although one major problem I have is the choppy design. If a developer is selling his game it would probably be for the best to continually update and work out the kinks in the offline and online gameplay. Glitches run rampant which can make online gameplay kind of frustrating. Additionally, why is that there is a price tag on this app but then to unlock additional maps you have to spend even more money? I find weird.

I'm amazed at how well the game plays, and the user interface is well nigh perfect.   I do see what others have been commenting on, the computer much seems to stack the dice rolls. If you are ahead and over 8 cards you will see a 7 nearly every time. Very predictable and not at all random. Then you can expect to see your robber blocked numbers rolled.  My belief is that they do keep the whole set of rolls relatively random in the game so the distribution chart looks right. But very much will add an edge for a 7 if the player is ahead.   The AI opposition also seems to know your Victory Point cards even if not played, where you do not know theirs.   Also, have not been able to make the online work. ID never logs in successfuly even when created fresh. Will keep trying though, anxious to play against real players and not the cheating AI. :-)   I'm thinking some statistical analysis is in order! :-)  This game could (and should) be a 5 if the non-random dice rolls were addressed.

Love the improvements with the latest update, especially the cloud backup of saved games. However, when using bluetooth headphones the music is stuttering badly - I assume this is a bug with the new sound engine. Other than that, great game!

Used to work fine on my phone running 2.3.6. Now that I'm on 4.0.4, it won't start, crashes phone. I managed to fix this by turning off WiFi, removing the app (it showed up in the Play Store, so I clicked Uninstall), restarted the phone, got it thru the store over the cell network, works fine now.  Update to my review: Still a great game, but the new version with the online features killed the battery on my Tab4. I left it running in the background and my battery went from 85% to <5% in less than 24 hrs. The game also takes much more battery when playing, too.
Love the board game and this mobile version manages to capture most of that fun. Any chance of adding support for multiplayer on a Chromecast?

The online mode is good, but if you decide to pay for the already pricey campaign mode, prepare to be let down. The AI is similar to that in monopoly, if its losing, in order to keep being a challenge the game clearly stacks the rolls to have consequences for the user. Pair that with the NPC's working together to attack the user and make the game challenging, instead of working toward a win, it moves the game from pricey to OVERpriced. Ive never been in a real game where two players build up someone else.
Every time I reboot my tablet it requires that I re-download over 60mb of additional data. This is NOT an option as I travel a lot and don't always have the ability to do so.  This needs fixed.
Needs update
Love this game. A really good translation of catan to phone. Would be 5 stars but there seems to a problem with some of the achievements.
If i wasn't constantly robbed then have my blocked numbers rolled I'd continue the scenarios but it's a waste of time with the way the ai is. Good online at least.

In scenario #6 the computers have ganged up on me. I leave and start a new game and they continue to gang up on me, Always with 7 and knights. if I am only ahead by 2 they gang up even if I'm behind them they gang up. If you can fix this I will change my rating.
replyContent: Hi Ivoire, please note that the computers will likely use the robber or knights against the player in the lead and try to win themselves. Furthermore they will try to interfere with the player that builds near a building site they also target. Medium or easy difficulty opponents (adjustable in the general settings menu) will be more forgiving.

content: I bought this and seafarers expansion and game always freezes when a computer player has to choose a resource when on a gold mine. If your going to charge me 5 bucks for the game and 5 per expansion make sure it works...
Sometimes buggy, sometimes frustrating, always addictive.
When I open the app for the first time on Nexus 5 it needs to download files but the download doesn't progress.
Better with multiplayer but very fun regardless
This game has provided hours of entertainment.
Awesome
I even managed to learn Cities & Knights through this app. Thanks for fixing a few bugs. The best game EVER, Klaus!
Not the full game. In app buys. Interface not the best.

The robber really is a little overwhelming. My suggestion is a robber mode where the resources aren't entirely blocked and the robber lands on your settlement or city and takes 1 of every 2 resources received from adjacent hexes. This would keep the game from feeling like a grudge match. It gets a little frustrating at times. I wouldn't purchase expansions as is.
Soaks up all my data for nothing...settler scum!

Already personally thinking this game was a little highly priced but I went for it anyway just because my friends like the board game.... Bought the game just to find out that you are only buying about 30% of the game. You have to spend an additional 10-15 dollars just to unlock features like the campaign mode and all the maps. Clearly packaged as an incomplete game, and this company is looking to vulture money where it can. However fun you thought this game is, don't support such a terrible buisness model.
Enjoy the game but 3 updates is just silly. Will uninstall
Wants to run in the background. Takes too much battery and ram for just a game, uninstalled
the online play option is not user friendly.  trying to link up with a friend to play is just impossible.
Every time I move the robber, the menu for ending my turn disappears.
Tried the second part of the tutorial and it won't let me select any tile...
Very well done
Every time i open the game now, it says i have to download 37.5 mb of files before i can play. Fix this please!
Game freezes during game on my galaxy 5. Haven't been able to finish a game yet.
Great now
Waited forever for this and aside from the occasional reboot I am not disappointed. Certainly not a deal breaker...loving it...thanks!
AI consistently rolls numbers it needs. Runs perfectly though, no crashes.

Trying to register online but tells me my username or email is already in use. Tried multiple usernames but tells me the same. Tried to recover password with email I never registered but tells me invalid data.
replyContent: Hi Damian, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and we will help you with the registration process.

content: Hours of fun. Very similar to the board games
replyContent: Dear Catan player, you can find the new scenarios in the customs game menu. They are in the list after the Cities and Knights scenarios.

content: Samsung Galaxy 5 with Lollipop.  Game is now unplayable,  constantly stops (force stop). Tried to reinstall, but still doesn't work.
The newest update makes the game unplayable on a nexus four.  The menu icon doesn't work and the secondary one from the older version that was in the upper right hand of the screen has been removed
Include all expansion!! Love this game!!

I love your Android App so much that I bought all the expansions AND bought them for all of my friends, but today I am heartbroken. I've been playing through the campaign mode for weeks and was about halfway through but today the game completely reset and now it shows me on Scenario 1! I've emailed support and will happily change my review if they can help me!
replyContent: Hi Juliet, we're sorry that your savegame was lost. Please note that you can restore your progress with the cheat-code mentioned in the FAQ section of the app description in the store. You can use the similar code "CaKWarp*" to restore Cities and Knights campaign progress. We hope this helps you to start playing again!

content: Love the game... But there should be an option to create our own game board.
This version follows the rules perfectly, and the conversion to digital is really good. All the features work fairly intuitively, and it includes a set of scenarios to teach you different strategies.
Great update. Glad to see Google Play Games support and cloud sync.
Getting better and better
second time having to download additional data....now doesn't work at all...needs to be fixed
replyContent: Hi Karina, please contact our support team at android@usm.de - We'll be happy to help!

content: When creating an account there is no password confirmation. Retrieving an account using an email does not work either as the system will tell you it does not exist. The slap in the face is the game telling me that the email is still in use.
replyContent: Hi Robert, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and we will help you recover your account.

content: Fixed single player....

Since the 9th March update my game crashes as soon as I get to the winning score. I won't be playing anymore until this is fixed, as you don't play a game you can't win! After each time it crashes it also resets all my settings, which made the music start blaring while my wife was sleeping.
Bug fixes needed!!!
Even when the game occasionally freezes, it just lags for a sec. Never had it fully hang.
The game simply crashes as you approach a winning score. Hopeless.

It plays just fine on my S5.  The game play seems to be right on with the board game.  I read a lot of reviews about cheating dice rolls, but I have not noticed it myself.  Sure there are times when 2 players roll a 7 and a couple play knights in the same round to drain your resources, but if you're ahead in victory points, that is just brutal strategy.  There is no appealing to the emotional side of the AI.  The dice counter shows a distribution graph that lines up pretty well with expected odds.  Also, I don't think your VP cards are visible to the opponents, at least the game doesn't behave like they are.  For example, playing friendly robber, I have a VP card right away, but they still cannot place the robber on my tiles. You can play 2 humans on the same device, though it is cumbersome and not very fun.  There are a several options to play with just the base game, though no campaign mode unless you buy the add-ons.  Overall I am pleased with the purchase.
Downloaded the new update, it crashed 4 times in one game. Fix it guys, Catan deserves better than this.
Can only play a few rounds before the darn thing crashes on me. Useless app until it's fixed, wasted my money so far. Nexus 4. I want my money back.

My favourite board game has been acturately brought to my phone. The AI are fantastic BUT the new update for HTC layers the menu button directly on top of the accept button for trades. I'd love a fix to this!
After new update my game won't open force closes right away
The new version keeps stopping mid game.  Cannot 'continue game'  I have uninstalled.  Full of bugs.
Awesome game

I couldn't even open the game to play it once! "Checking required files..." flashed up on a grey background for one second, then nothing. I got refund after first installation, reinstalled, same problem, now no refund. Complete crap. I won't be using USM again.
Cant place the robber on a tile with more than one player settlment type on it or the app crashes, please fix
The developers of this game were apparently never informed that it should not be evident that the ai is cheating. It really ruins the experience.
True to the board game with a decent AI.
Conveniently takes more than 15mins to download 21mb so you can't get a refund.

The game performs well, good stability and randomness on both my Galaxy S4 and my Nexus 7. HOWEVER: The price of the in-app purchases for expansions is too much. Also they differ by 20% between my two devices. What's the deal with that?  The full game can be played without the expansions, but the ridiculous pricing structure does not make you want to buy the in-app expansions.

Never fails that I finally get the last card I need to win the game and then I miraculously roll a robber. Losing all my resources. Then the AI rolls the all so frequent 11 and gets what they need to win. AI will each be within 1 or 2 VP of winning and have tons of resources. I will have no resources and be no where near winning and they will swap moving robber to me. Once or twice is one thing, but this stuff happens almost every game.

Doesn't ever give you credit for the victory card points you buy and you can't predict when you will pick one so its not fair or fun to play when the computer wins with the same victory card points as you. Especially since you paid  real money for this game. Fix this or refund it!

Good game. AI is challenging. It would be better if you could customize tile placement. It is very difficult to play online.  There needs to be a way to select players in an online forum. Expansions are a little pricey to purchase, but scenarios are good.

Not fun. Only frustrating. The computer steals from you so relentlessly, that if you were playing with these people in real life it would result in a fist fight. Seriously...I want to punch the developers in the face.

I agree with Andrea. The app is rigged to roll in the computers favour. Ive have the droids recieve sometimes 20 to 30 resources to my 2 or 3 even if I have 6 and 8. Just not possible in real random dice. It is rigged to be competitive once player is ahead thus giving all resources  to droids and none to player. I have never played the board game would love to because I enjoy the game just not this computer version. WISH I HADNT SPENT THE MONEY. DONT BE A FOOL AND DO LIKE ME SAVE MONEY AND BUY BOARD VERSION
It works just fine and gameplay is as expected. Unfortunately this version is extremely limited. You need to buy expensive expansions to unlock the rest.
Very easy to use interface to play Catan
But overall a fun and easy way to play this great game! Love the campaign mode!

This wound up being a user issue (!). Its hard to tell but there is a selection that needs to be chosen when more than one   opponent on a hex. Game works well once ur used to it. I still think resource counts seem off.
Looks like bugs have been fixed with latest update!

Fine technically, ie doesn't crash. User interface is a little odd at first but you get used to it. I echo others' comments about the uneven player/AI treatment of VP cards, which is quite important since the AI's attitude towards both trading and use of the robber is determined by who's 'winning' as measured by VPs. The online mode is good to have but I'd like to see at most sixty seconds permitted per move (other then when a player is waiting on responses to a trade offer).

I spend the $3 for the game and see there is a problem with the robber (it FREEZES) i spend the extra $8 for the expansion hoping the problem will be gone, of course not why would you as computer techs allow a game to sell on the market that WOULD WORK, sell a game that doesnt work and try and make money... LAST time i buy anything from you!

Whenever I go to enter this app the first time it will always force quit on me, and then the music will keep playing while I am at the home screen and causes the whole phone to freeze up. Must be suckling the juice right out of it then, or RAM cram or something! Also when someone disconnects or quits, it will take minutes before the game goes back to the main screen. Expensive app!

I experience repeated force quits. This is completely unacceptable for a pay game, ESPECIALLY one with a relatively high price tag. Buyer beware, I love Catan as much as the next guy, but it's no fun if you cant ever get a game finished. Wish I had tried the game immediately, then maybe I could at least get my $16 back. (Bought the game for me, my wife, and two of our friends in the excitement to be able to play Catan together)

Frequent freezes or crashes on launch. Seemingly biased dice throws. When you are winning, the AI players gang up and rob you while rolling a ridiculous number of 7's and using the stolen resources to buy knight cards. At least hold off on buying DLC until you're VERY sure that you don't regret buying this game.
Good game on my phone,  but won't even open on my tablet.  Bummer
Need expansion love the game
I like the game but every time I open the game, it asks me to install 21 mb of stuff for over 5 minutes. Is it supposed to do that?
Love the game. Hate the app. Would be fine if it didnt keep randomly uninstalling itself every 30mins or so. Completely useless. Utter rip off!

Amazing game

The "build menu" does not always show - not even during the tutorial! Shocking really.
Good game but has some bugs that are annoying like turn skipping, not getting cards sometimes, or roads being placed where you did not place them.
The bug causing the crash was fixed, so it's back to being a good game. The AI is pretty predictable after a while though.
Works just like the real game, I haven't really tried the expansions.
Best game on Earth
I bought this game bout 3 weeks ago and have won every scenario. Most awesome game I have ever played on my phone. Just wish it had more scenarios and levels.
Great game, been playing for years before the app. Dunno how to play with others around me though. Help with this and a 5.

Great game but too many bugs.
Which is ridiculous. Why can't I play on my own without a connection to the internet.

Every time I roll a 7 and the robber gets a move, all my options on the screen go away and you have to quit the game in order to progress with the game. No updates since December!?! Unacceptable. Do not buy until it is fixed.
I could care less for this game. So I just want to know how I get my money back?
Especially after I spent extra money for expansion.  Now I can't even finish a game.  Very frustrating.
Play it every day. Great fun!

you can see other players cards, you can only target one player for multiple player cards like commercial harbor, and then there are other bugs that just make the game occasionally unplayable. also there is no chat system. and there is a timer on turns which sometimes let's people play for minutes and sometimes it's ready to boot a player after 30 seconds.
It's fun but sometimes it shows you your resources and even tho they are enough to buy something it won't let u
The urge to play again is so strong, it should be a banned substance! So close to the real board game - very good; well woth the cash.
You need to make the app track our online wins and losses, but more importantly those that quit because they are losing. It ruins the game when they quit. Also maybe some rank advancement.
The game is great. My only criticism is that the AI isn't very smart.
Freezes at 97 percent when trying to download

Galaxy s5. Every few turns the menu button disappears. I can't roll, trade, etc. Just zoom in and out on the map. Also happens when you place the robber 100% of the time. I made it 8 turns so far. Out of 10 games I can not finish any. Only getting a few turns before the bug happens.

Great game, true to the original. A little buggy at times but pretty good.  PLEASE MAKE IT LIKE WORDS WITH FRIENDS SO I CAN PLAY WITH FRIENDS THROUGHOUT THE DAY. These prompts to hurry up with my turn shouldn't come from the computer. I shouldn't be exited from the game just because I'm not online.  Leave it up to the real human players to kick people out, not the computer players.  I want to make a couple of moves and then leave it alone for a few hours if I have to.

I love the actual board game but this app is NOT THE SAME. The computer players seem to be programmed to constantly steal from only you, I have never seen them rob each other. I get robbed 1 to 2 times every round. They also manage to roll their numbers everytime but hardly ever roll yours. You are set up to lose from the start. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
5 stars for the game itself.  Forever freezing and refusing to do certain actions though.
Haven't had any issues on Nexus 6. Runs smooth and you can play the original game for just the app purchase. Expansions will cost you $4 each
I recently played the board game for the first time. I liked it so much I had to buy this game.
Easily my favorite board game of all time. When I saw it on Play Store I HAD to buy it. It lived up to my expectations and was worth it.

Sometimes the AI is too easy to beat when late in a game it will stockpile resources without buying anything. AI also overvalues metropolis points -- I often beat it with no metropolis points. Still, a fun way to kill an hour.

Online game don't work properly and it doesn't hardly connect to the server. Also, UI is not fair at all if you have to exchange resources...sometimes you offer a much better offer than a opponent...but you lose the trade.

Even on the lowest settings it is set up to make the player lose.  The robber is moved back and forth between live players best tiles only.  The only time live players numbers are rolled is if the robber is on it.  Computers had most of its players settlements on two numbers 6 & 8. 8 was rolled 5 times in a row.  7 was rolled 3 times in a row and moved between my tiles until all my resources were  taken.  Then it rolled 8 for several more turns.  I bought this wanting to learn how to play this game but it makes me angry. The scoring system is a mystery and will not allow you to win.  Every computer player will target you and will not trade with you unless you only want sheep and do not need sheep.  Stay Away From this App!!!! The only ratings that can be trusted are the ones with less than 3 stars.
I can view other players' progress cards when I press the button to view my progress cards.  The cards belong to the current player with the dice.
You pay to install then have to pay more if you actually want to play the game.

There are definitely good improvements, but there are some bad ones too. I play on my tablet and now the box for trading or any boxes with instructions are to small to read.. wish I didn't update now.
Great game works flawlessly on my Note 4.

This is by far one of the best games out there. My husband and I both have it downloaded. We play it so much!  We have also downloaded (in app purchase)  the rest of the game which let's you have ships to get to islands. It's definitely worth the money.
Just playing the tutorials the menu icon disappears and never comes back. I can not do anything since I need that menu to trade, build and exit.

The only major thing that is semi annoying about this game is that you can't play it just 2 players. It forces you to add a third which in my case usually ends up being a bot, which makes the game take longer because bots love trading ALL the time. Other then that, it's a great game!
Solid mobile catan app.
Works well as a tablet based game

Sometimes they're not even added. Was waiting long for crop, got it finally, and in one turn it was gone. Nobody played neither monopoly nor raider. Not much fun like this. AND keeps on crashing... Really frustrating after 1h of the game to fall out!

Love this game... app works great when it stays installed have had to re install it over 5 times already in less then a week
Very happy

Regardless of difficulty level or which opponents you select, the AI takes turns vollying the robber between your spaces. It's common for two or three 7's to be rolled in a row and the AI to select you to take from. The result is that I often begin my turn with no resources at all, regardless of how many I had when I ended my last turn or how many I collected during the round. I could have one resource and they'll still target me to take from. Meanwhile, my opponents will all have 8-12 resources each.

So I saw some people complaining about not knowing what buttons do what, but there are tutorials included. You can zoom in on the board too. I had no problem winning against the ai. I love the board game, the online game, and I love this app. I haven't tried with actual people yet, just the computer. But I like it. Worth the 3.99. :) Also, I am using this app on a Samsung Galaxy s5 with no problems.
Fair layout. Comp tries to hurt you, not what works best for them. lopsided AI. Not buying expansions till AI adjusted
This game is wonderful. However the user interface (UI) is not very intuitive. should be done in a more clear, simple way.
Keeps on crashing randomly for no reason. Please fix
Good game but Ai makes you feel like its a 2v1 or 3v1.
You get an option for $5 you spend... A big ripoff... Also the AI always rob you and never anyone else even if you have one card
Needs a full exit feature from the game.
Attempted to install three times and will not do so. Error message pops up, holding me back. No option to refund. Boom. No thanks.
Runs very well had no problems with it. Classic game.
its the game but youre paying for an android 1.0 interface and a glichy game and a sub-par ux

I have never seen so many 7s and so many rolls for everything but what the human player has.  Every time the robber is moved via knight miraculously a 7 comes up and wouldn't ya know it... Rarely comes up again until yep, you guessed it.. Human plays knight card and the robber is always put on human even if human is losing.  Also rolls for resource for AI are statistically highly improbable with a random roller.  Fix this and will update review.
If you like the number 12 rolled everytime then you are in luck. Why cant you people check your updates before hand. Refund please!
This makes for an excellent single player experience. The pass and play option can be annoying with a game with this much player interaction but it still works

Whoever made this has no idea about the actual probabilities of the rolls for the dice. All they do is a gaussian distribution around 7 which makes the game no fun to play because then the computer just continues to steal from you and keep you from getting resources. I want my money back.
Purchased the game but requires an additional download that doesn't work.
If you  love  Catan, then this game is for you. Work your  strategies  against the computer before going  against  humans.
This is an awesome game.  The only thing I don't like is that it is a total battery hog.
The basic game is great but C & K has many progress card glitches. Opponents can use my progress cards for their own gain! What?
Highly addicted to this game after playing the board game. Learned a lot of tricks from bots. I hate the placement of the numbers and resources though.

Been playing this for a few days now and I'm really enjoying it, but the AI is horrible beyond words. Playing a three player game against two of the weakest AI players is an exercise in frustration. The majority of the time they only trade for resources you have zero use for and well not budge on what they will trade to you at all. Trading sheep for anything to the AI is not an option.  It's as if they can see your entire hand at all times. If you ever get even a one point lead on them, they will actively target you for all theft for the rest of the game. And once you have close to the resources you need to accomplish something useful, there is an unbelievably high likelihood of the dice throwing multiple 7's in a row, allowing the AI players to drain your resources and lock you out for the rest of the game. I've had to resort to building multiple settlements on ocean edges just to have any reasonable source of trade since the AI is coded to turn down any offer that might benefit the player.
Tge 4.0 version was good, and hopefully the new update will fix all the  bugs.
I just lost the game
So, was loving the game but now it won't launch on my LG G3. I've not changed anything so must be an update to the game. Not happy as a paid app. Save your money - you pay then it stops working.
Good app of the real thing but PLEASE FIX THE BUG which prevents human knight cards showing properly and prevents humans getting the largest army. I had to get 12 points to win today!
Faithful version of the board game. I can play this for hours.
Love the game, but not happy about it always crashing...always. please fix and I'll rate 5 stars!
As others have said, the AI is stacked against human players.  The frequency of numbers rolled is skewed which can make for frustrating game play.
Fun, addictive game, especially now that they've worked out must of the bugs:-)
Vale cada centavo

When I play, and this has been thelast 4 times in a row, the popup tool box to move the knight or buy something doesn't appear. At the top of the screen it says I'm in that pop up and if I can guess right I can buy something....but even when I do the game freezes after this. Help.
Good game but it keeps freezing if an AI player is collecting a gold resource
Awesome

Catan is one of my favorite board games. No complaints there. I wish I could say the same about this android incarnation, though... The interface is poorly implemented and confusing at times. The buttons could have labels, or at least tooltips, telling us what they do. And then there are the constant glitches when you try building something: the interface freezes and you can't click on the proceed nor the cancel button.  The only way out is to close the game and restart it,  only to get stuck again... Wish I could get my money back...
Really like this game
Just too many crashes...

I heard great things about the board game so I bought everything for this app.  I can't finish parts of the tutorial because the menu to build items disappeared.  I went onto campaigns and the same menu disappears at times (most when I get the robber).  I have yet to complete a single game!
Awesome game!
5 star game. 3 star app.
The computer players seem to roll perfect numbers and pick on me when I'm winning.. I've played over 50 times and haven't won once.. :/
Working now. ..

I love Catan the board game, but I expected more from the app. The expansions cost extra, which I bought but maybe not worth it. Campaign mode is not interesting -- just play through all the boards in some order, while enduring pointless banter from the computer opponents. Please (1) add more boards to play, (2) provide more icons to represent players instead of reusing those of the computer opponents, and (3) allow players to completely customize the board.

Still no refund (thanks theives) and now no accessibility options (tiny fonts).  Crashes my tablet every time.    Being unable to use the app, I've  asked for a refund, with no response.....  Update: 3 days since purchase and refund request, still crashing my tablet, with no response from the developers.  You have delivered a poor product (for my tablet), I would appreciate a response, and refund.  In the future:  Although it may cut into your (illgotten) profits, a list of platforms the game is compatible with would be great.

Pretty ok

I'm very frustrated.  I haven't read a review with my particular problem.  Some progress cards just flat out don't work.  I'm trying to build a city for 1 grain and 2 ore and it took 5 minutes of tapping a settlement to finally get it to blink.  The green check to accept the change is highlighted but when you tap it......nothing.  The only thing I can do is quit the game and start over but then on the next game it will be something else.  Like moving the robber but he turns into a giant and covers the whole board and you can't get him to shrink back to normal......had to quit the game.  Or stealing a knight but can't place him.....just blinking at the end of your road......had to quit the game.  I haven't come close to completing a game in the week that I've had the app.

This app keeps shutting down when I'm in the placement phase of the game. It worked okay for the first few weeks... with the occasional collapse, but now it just won't get through the beginning. Complete rip off!

My game crashes 10 to 20 times a day.  Game play is quick enough,  but the dice rolls are skewed way to the computer players advantage.  I can go 2 or 3 turns in a row and have 3 -  4 resource cards taken by opentents rolling 7's or playing knight cards on each turn. Totally skewed to make you lose all the time...  Not impressed. To top that off,  often i buy development cards and when i go to use them,  they arent there.
It will not let me add buddies to my list which enables human multi player + yes AI is ridic. ALWAYS HITS IT'S #S

Closest thing to Settlers of Catan out there. Problems with the game: you automatically play your victory points but the computer doesn't. This puts you at a disadvantage as the AI continually attempt to spurn you because they know you have the victory points. Also, I know the app has a die counter for seeing the probability that a number is rolled, but in playing 10 games where a # is roll a number consecutively to help the AI who monopolize one or 2 tiles is incredibly frustrating.
Says email is already in use. When I tried to recover password, it says email is not in use and is invalid.  WTF!

Great game, would give it 5 stars if not for the fact that the AI cheats with the dice. The AI often puts the robber in your number just before it rolls, clears their resources when you have a (hidden) monopoly card, and in the campaign, refuses to roll your numbers. Just closed a game where only I had access to 8 and it never rolled even after AI reached 13 out of 17 pts to win. Absolutely unbelievable. Would be MUCH better if dice settings were enabled for campaign.

Everything about this game is poorly programmed from a terrible randomizer that often gets stuck on the same number roll like 11 or 3 over and over to a crazy uncontrollable zoom in/out at random intervals to constant game threatening crashes. Paid $12 for the base game plus expansions and feel extremely cheated. Wish I could get a REFUND!

The board game stays fresh in the long run because you can arrange the tiles however you want. This app misses that whole part of the game. You end up playing the same scenarios over and again or put it down. Recently, the only online board available is the first island, so there's no reprieve there either. It needs a lot more to match up to the old board game.

Running lollipop 5.0.1 on a nexus 7. The game is great otherwise, would be great to get this bug fixed though.

Timer in online multiplayer is badly needed along with a notification when it's your turn. You also need to improve the way you chose which game variant you want to play in multiplayer. A quit or leave ratio for every player should be visibly and you should be able to select players with at least the same radio as yourself. In game chat is another must.
