Only two suggestions: It would be awesome to play friends over a local network. Also, I think having to 'slide out' from right for a common function like passing dice is a nuisance. I would think it should be on the main screen since it is done every single turn. This game is awesome, so 5 stars regardless of my knit picking.

Really, I love this game. We own the original board game, the Nurnberg special edition and the card game. This game on the phone is amazing! We play it regularly online with my family and we have massive amounts of fun. It's superb. Why 4 stars then? I feel the poor multiplayer interface (getting the game going), the lack of online chat, the stupid AI and the constant crashing when minimising the game is sloppy given the amount we pay for this app. This awesome work deserves to be polished better!

Bought all of the expansions for this game and the campaign will not save. Have to start from the beginning every time you open the game. Online play is only functional every once in a while. The ability to boot a player that goes afk or just takes 10 minutes to make a move is non-existent. All and all it has the capabilities of being a 5 star game, but was put together poorly by whomever programmed it. Wish I could get my money back.

Was super excited to find this app, since I really like the board game. Noticed after a few games what others have mentioned - it seems to be stacked in favor of the AIs. I tried a few different ways and resorted to playing against all of the "least experienced" AIs, still didn't seem to have a chance, examples:  - AI picks locations near low-probability roles (2,3,4) - all three AIs bordered a '3' and in one turn around every player (including me) rolled a '3.' - When I get the robber I'm not able to move it to locations that negatively impact AI players, though they are able to block me over and over.  -When I manage to do OK, the AIs suddenly use the robber to take cards from me every turn. It would get to my turn and I'd literally have been picked clean, over and over. -AIs will not trade with me when it would allow me to build even when I offer 3:1 trades, but trade with each other constantly - AIs block my road building when it does nothing to benefit them. I get that can be strategy, but since they trade with each other, it means they always win when racing to build.  Was a bit relieved to read that others have experienced this too. Overall, a big disappointment.

The game needs significant overhauling.  The general mechanics of the game are there but it's not a polished app by any means.  After one game to 10 I can lose 50 points on my battery!  Please fix this!  Also, please fix your servers.  Online play is down more than it is up.  I'll up my rating when this app gets significant updates.

Anyways, just some thoughts on its issues that I couldn't fix myself. Hope fixes come soon, it's a great game!

replyContent: Hi Kris, please contact our support team at android@usm.de - We're happy to help you to solve these issues. Some information that can help us to identify the problem: What Android version are you running, does the app fail to open right after updating or after downloading the additional data? Does re-installing the app help?

For all the people having crashing problems after the update, uninstall and reinstall the app.  There's something wrong with the way it updates from a previously installed version.  After this update, my app ran a lot slower, and crashed every few minutes.  But after I tried uninstalling and reinstalling (it saves all your in app purchases like C&K and Seafarers, but not your campaign progress), everything was fixed, and not only that, but it runs better and faster than ever, with less buggy animations and less laggy of a trade menu.  This is easily my favorite app, love all the different scenarios that put a different spin on a board game I love.  Hopefully with the next update they figure out what went wrong on this one, but a fresh install of the game works beautifully!  I suggest everyone try this!

Bought about a week ago and was great! Now it's to the point where it crashes 1-2 minutes into the game. You can restart and play a couple of moves before it crashes again. Aside from that, I love it. If the crashing problem was fixed, it'd be an easy 5 star review.

The game I happen to love as a classic boardgame, for which (with extensions pack) I paid 10€ (not so cheap) is constantly crashing on my SGS4. It also throws me back to scenario 1 every single time! Just 5 minutes ago, I was allready playing scenario 7 (again), the game made my phone chrash/reboot yet again and I'm back to the beginning, with all data wiped out. You really have to fix this for android phones. Seriously.

After update, immediately noticed weird issue. When I hit custom game, the "create game" dialogue slides in, but then a blank dialogue box slides in right after. Then playing the game, often the circular option button would be unresponsive. I thought maybe I needed to re-install. After, I tried playing two local games, and both crashed mid-game. Also, stats for left players randomly disappeared. Don't purchase this game right now, as it's too buggy to play.

This was a really fun game when I first bought it. It was working fine despite some bad reviews, so I thought it had been fixed and committed to the expansion packs. That was when the trouble started. It worked ok for a couple days, stopping at least once per session, but always saved my game so I still felt ok. Then finally it started throwing errors to the point that I can't get through more than two turns before it dies again. This is unacceptable for a paid app and must be fixed immediately.

App used to be awesome and would normally give it 4 stars but the most recent update completely broke it. It's almost unusable atm as it's so slow, glitchy and constantly crashes. Real shame as I would expect extensive testing to be done before the release of a new update. Especially since it's a paid for app

There needs to be penalties for people disconnecting. I join a game online and almost always within 10 minutes every other player quits or disconnects. Penalize players for this somehow! Make it so they can't get into an online game for 12 hours or something. I don't know, but it's ridiculous. I might as well just play bots since that's what happens every time anyway. Figure this out and my rating will definitely improve.

I've been playing this game for years over multiple devices. This latest update has made the game buggy and the animation jarring. The previous version was smooth as butter on my sgs4 - now it feels like a cheap product. I will go back to 5 stars if the animations get fixed. AI seems improved, but it is overshadowed by the new bugs.
I have the physical boardgame and I love it, so I thought I would love the app, but to unlock any features you have to give them more money! It's like I bought the free version!
Great game, rich with features, but crashes a lot. Sometimes I can't even open it.

Its not cool! I have paid good money for cities and knights and now I can't play online the other maps???? Please change it like it used to be offline, that you can play the other maps as well, even if there's a boats there...

Spent a lot on this game + expansions, would like a better quality product!

Well built and very good  gfx...but I think this game is rigged especially the dice: computer knows your next rolling number and knights it, you can't never have more than 15 resources no matter how much gain you'll roll into 7 at your turn, computer still trade each other even when one is close to win, certain computer knighting you  even if you're at low point but all computers attack when you are the highest.

This game needs more color options. When playing I can't discern the green and red pieces. I have to pick red or green every time just to differentiate.   Also I encounter an error when confirming a trade offered by other players. I click the check mark to confirm and instead it will cause them to trade with someone else.   Otherwise an enjoyable game.
I really hate that the dice are not random.    I don't mind the bots playing together against me,  but the dice need to have an honest random roll.   Also please fix the start up bugs.

I love this game on my phone (Galaxy S4) and would give it 5 stars if it didn't crash multiple times every game.  For no apparent reason, phone will either lock up (about 10% of the crashes) or the phone will suddenly just restart (90% of the crashes).  This is the only app on my phone that has ever been this buggy.    Crashes aside, this app is a great way to explore strategies in the base game and the various Seafarer scenarios before getting all your friends together for a real world version of the board game.    Request for the programmers: please hire some good Android programmers and debug this.  You are keeping what should be an awesome game from being more than an annoyance.
DRM beyond use. When I tried to play it after buying all the add-ons it lock itself as I had no Internet access, it doesn't even use the Internet.
If you have ever played the board game then you will enjoy this. I would like to see and the other expansions.

Sometimes I just want a quick basic game,  but I HAVE to choose three other players every time! Please let us play a quick 2 player game if we want to. I was disappointed that the game cost 4.99 just to make me pay more to play the campaign. Feels like a rip off or scam.  Don't get me wrong,  but for the price I was hoping to get at least some gameplay beyond the custom game I can't really customize

Was good for a while.  Back to being a piece of s%&#$.  Cheats!  Won't roll whatever squares I am on.  ALWAYS rolls robber if I have 8+ resources uninstalling stupid POS.  ... Just checked back on current comments and, after many months of many complaints about cheating dice, this has still not been fixed.  Fix this, and I will reinstall the game and up my rating.  Until then, leaving it off my device. ... To the user who said it rolled 8s 8 times in a row, the odds are 1 in more that 7 million!

This game is a lot of fun, but is not random at all. If you are winning the computer throws dice in favor of the computer. For example I've seen five 12s rolled in a row. I suggest you don't build the first settlement or city.

Love this game but please have another developer redo it. Really buggy and unfair. It's not random dice rolling. The balancing is essentially AI cheating. You guys should invest in dev track and report some bugs to your programming team. Maybe hire some QA testers? It's only a crucial part of game development.

It keeps saying "login failed" and/or switches to German language. Activated my account through email and everything. Tried to reset my password - same thing. So f&@#ing frustrating.

The game freezes during the second tutorial repeatedly. And you pay $3.99 and right off the bat you have to pay even more to get a campaign? Think you're pushing your in app purchases a bit hard there? I was really looking forward to this game.

Mobile Catan is disappointing. No substantial innovations thus boring. Seafarers and Cities & Knights expansions are easy wins in a weekend. The designers created predictable algorithms w. cheating dice rolls, unfair robber attacks, forced skipped turns. Make Jean go first to be guaranteed 6 & 8. BUG ALERT: Cities & Knights, hard mode - once a resource traded for resource AND commodity, game freezes. Online MP option is ridiculously slow. Desktop version expensive. Best playing the board games with friends.

I really love this app and Play often,  I would play more except the online experience is very limited.  It allows you to join a game with a friend. But lacks the following features: - has no effective way of communication with other players.  - has no ranking system like most chess apps for determining your skill relative to other players - has no way of setting a turn time cap.  So some players take like 45+ seconds to make a move, so games end up taking longer even than the physical game...
Robber glitches the menu, cannot move next turn!
It keeps Stalling ... force closing .... amd delayed responses .... Other than that its cool ... Id rather have the board game though ....

The online finder of your friends sign up and likelihood of locating a friend brings down this game app significantly. It would do well with locating others on Google Play Games in addition or replacement to the current online system. I want to play with my friends, but the online system fails me.
If you like catan and you commute a bit this is super fun. Still haven't played online but I'm sure I'll get less done. Good practice for the actual games.
This is a great implementation of Catan.  I highly recommend it.
Awesome.

Unstable is the best word to describe this app. It crashes constantly, multiplayer times out frequently, and it is the biggest battery drain off any game I own.

Finally there's online play and either your server can't handle the traffic or these idiots are playing with dial up. Haven't finished ONE game because it just stalls. You need to add chat. You need to add a time limit per player move. You need to add the option to kick a player. This is so amateur it's laughable.

You have to tactically try to not have victory points too early or you'll lose. Stick to the board game!

I'm a huge fan of the board game, so I was really excited about the mobile version. The price is a little high - 9 Euros if you want the game and both expansion packs, but it's so much fun that it's kinda worth it. The conversion is great, especially when compared to the clunky online version. Online multiplayer is fun as long as players don't quit half way in... a 'nudge' option would be great! Campaign mode is challenging enough - the AI is far from unbeatable, but reasonably adept. Highly recommended!
Hooked on catan again... thanks a lot... what about the cardgame though? Loved that and would appreciate if it came out as app

Great simulation. Plays as well as the board game and doesn't completely destroy my battery life!

Dice doesn't seem to be random at all. After the robber is placed to the hex the number is almost always rolled on next turn. If it happens to be your hex. Also in C&K AI players sometimes can activate knight and move the robber on the same turn. At first I thought I'm dreaming but it happened more than once. Like others have been saying AI players happily trade with each other but hardly ever with you when you initiate trade. It's getting kind of boring when you sit 2 or 3 or 4 rounds without getting any resources even you have your cities on 4-9s. And I just lost my city to barbarians - we had 3 players, 4 cities, 3 active knights. 1 was mine and 2 belonged to other Ai. One AI had no active knights. And on next roll barbarians attacked but I lost the city! Not nice. Also noticed that if you share the hex with other AI player and he has active knight and robber gets placed to that hex the AI doesn't often use the knight to move the robber. Not logical at all. Finally we tried to play multiplayer with partner but couldn't see each other! Make the online game usable! Pretty long complaint :) I was thinking of giving it 3 stars but it's really 1 with room for improvement :)
Im a fan dont get me wrong but I cant even do the campaign without paying more
Good mechanics crappy dice.

Bought this and the expansion, it's now my standard time-filling amusement. Loved the board game, this is almost better. C&K expansion is definitely better, and multiplayer works well in either version. Months later I'm still playing.
Love this game but the online playing could be faster

Great game, have played through the full base campaign, seafarers campaign and working through Cities and Knights.  Also done a few games with a friend on his iphone (I'm on a GN2).   I had no issue's until the recent update a few days ago now causing the game to crash randomly quite frequently.  Probably once every hour  of game play or so, and I've lost scenario games mid game.  (sometimes it recovers and sometimes its gone).  Update : can't save game or exit app or recover from crash; lose game
Glitches. Glitches. Glitches. Dropped online matches are really bothersome.
Good times.

I was just introduced to Catan (board game) by some friends and was instantly hooked. I decided to try the app for my Galaxy Note 3. Paid for it, then even purchased the Cities and Knights expansion. The concept is outstanding and seems true to the board game but game play is really buggy. Constantly freezing, and force closing. Game and expansion was not worth the $7.00 that I paid to have this experience. I'm on the latest android update so this shouldn't happen.

AI works well.  However on C&K, cards that are specific to 'players with more victory points' are set wrong . AIs that play these can sabatoge players with equal victory points while human players can only attack players with more VP. Also the barbarian status blip does not update at the beginning of each turn.  I.e., it showed 7:8 barbarians:knights at the beginning of the turn, after building one city it jumped to 9:8.  I am also having the issue of only being able to play up to round 4 on C&K campaign.
The app running again.  It would be fun if you can in the setting rate your opponents. Now you win too easy
Update broke it.  Won't work. Rebooted, toggled wifi, uninstalled/reinstalled.  Don't waste your money.
Wicked game
I have loved this game for about two years now. But after I got a new.phone I am unable to continue past scenario 4 on the C&K campaign (droid mini). Please fix for 5 stars

I find myself playing this game quite a bit. Board games lend themselves to the mobile platform quite nicely. However this game is in dire need of cross platform multiplayer support, more similar to how words with friends allows for multiple games simultaneously. This is evident by the mediocre AI that is easy to beat consistently. Should add more maps and the new expansions. Should allow for 2 player games and 5-6 player games.

Great implementation of the board game, my partner and I have been enjoying it on a Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 (4.0.4). However, we cannot really play it on our phones (both HTC Desire X, 4.1.1) due to the following major bugs: 1) when a custom game is loaded, the game is loaded from the point where it was first saved; 2) a campaign/scenario cannot be continued, the “continue” button just won’t show up. Generally, there are also many minor bugs, such as: could once have more than four progress cards.

After a buggy initial release, this game is now solid and reliable. Kudos to the developers for all the patches! The computer players are well balanced, if predictable. Pretty easy to win consistently.
Makes my phone overheat wrote than other hand.  Doesn't seem like it should be that CPU intensive.
Great fun!  Follows board game rules closely. Graphics are great.  Recommend.
Love the game, but this new update is really hard to read on my tablet because the words are so tiny. I didn't have this problem with the old version!
I think the board game is awesome so to have an app that you can take anywhere and play at anytime is amazing! I highly recommended it to everybody!
The app Version has made me a better player of the regular game.
i love it! i only wish the rating system worked
Would give 5 Stars, but still after 5 or so days I have not received my registration email so I can play online.
Getting message repeatedly even after downloading "this game needs additional data (21.14 mb) to run on your device.  Do you wish to download? "    running galaxy s3 android 4.4.2
I love catan...one of my favorites!!!
Then it would be perfect.
Its awesome. Pretty much all I do when commuting.

Settlers of Catan is a fantastic board game, and this implementation is very well done. It has great animations, lots of customization, and even offers for the Seafarers as well as the Cities & Knights expansions. Excellent work!
replyContent: You can use the cheatcode "CaKWarp1" to "CaKWarp4" to recover the corresponding game progress in Cities and Knights. Could you please provide a screenshot as well as info on the Android version you're running on your device to our support team at android@usm.de? Thank you!

content: Great game!!
I love this game! And more that now is online multiplayer!
Game locks up when I play the robber or knight.
Updated: they fixed this with an update ---> Needs support for larger screens like galaxy nexus. Icons look microscopic on it
Great version
whenever I can't play the actual board game with friends.
My version was HD but I was forced to update and now it has reverted to a very low quality resolution. I can't play like this, it looks terrible.
Updates helped a lot and the game is playable on my nexus 7. I'd rate higher if it had online multiplayer with friends. Edit: added multiplayer so you get a higher star count, great support
No issues at all, great interface. Addicted!
Galaxy s4 works great. Worth the price considering the base board game is like 40-50$

One of the worst A.I.'s for a boardgame I've ever encountered.  It's pretty obviously not set to act randomly; but to try to make the game play harder by acting in a less than scrupulous manner.  It's still winnable, but you will be playing against all of the computer players acting with a team strategy from start to finish.  I just hate when a game is supposed to have random elements, but is definitely not actually random.
Best board game on android apple and windows 8 phone
Although challenging, the game is super fun.
Relaxes my mind from the day and allows hours of enjoyment.  Sometimes seems like the AI is cheating but other than that it is a must-have app on Android or IOS.
I really like this app but it keeps crashing and loses all of my data! Please fix
Good game but has been crashing a lot lately.  Also, cities and knights is unavailable sometimes even after purchase.  Developer needs to do some work on this one.
I had already purchased the expansions and now after the update they are trying to get me to purchase them again? Ridiculous!
Beat me if you can with online battles
Changed phone. Now nothing works... Everythings lite
I bought the city's and knights expansion pack been playing it for 6 months
Superior!

This game's "random" number generator is severely skewed against the player, as soon as you have above 7 cards a 7 will roll. Numbers with a low chance of rolling will be rolled often if PC opponents are on those resources. The PC opponents will actively trade into victory with each other, but will not trade with you if you initiate trade while you are in the lead with VP. Even using the number stack will be biased against you and you may never get certain numbers because the game stacks the deck. Garbage.
This would get more if......trading system better labeled........ custom placement of tiles.....bluetooth to other devices.......better label of stats
Multiplayer never works, the game itself is insanely buggy, crashes often, and the $4 is only for a demo version. To play any other sort of version you must pay more. Not recommended. At all.
with the online version now theres no need to think just buy this game! KNOW THIS youll need to spend 3X the price if you want the campaign and expansions too
Great game
Game sucks. Wish I never paid for it. I do not recommend this to anyone.  Wish refunds were possible lol.
Very good
Catan any time I want!!!

Buying every expansion is lame. Also: The AI knows what every dice roll is to be before they happen. Raising the difficulty only makes them always steal from/block you as well as act on knowing the game's upcoming dice rolls. Raise the difficulty--the AI doesn't scale, but simply cheats (knows the rolls) more often and focuses on ruining you. It's still possible to win (sometimes). Also, this needs to not force rolls across all games to match theoretical odds based on recorded stats.
My only complaint is the AI is crap. They never want to trade with me for stuff when I need it to win. Or is that working as intended. The world may never know.
Online players who quit games midway through should get penalties/temporary bans. So many babies who bail at the end, just because they don't want to accept the reality of their loss.

The game plays well but the ai is not great. I just had one bot interrupt my longest road and handing victory to a different ai, losing the game for herself. Also needs to have a victory defeat screen show when some one wins by starting their turn with the requisite victory points. At the moment nothing happens and your only option is quit out. No sense of win/loss at all.
Works well play with my family all the time

I'd give it five stars but every other game someone has to quit because it won't let them take their turn. AI filling in for people leaving is great but until these bugs are sorted out its hard to suggest to people that they buy it.
Exellent game although for some reason when I reach the victory points needed to win, the game just stops doing anything. All I am able to do is go to the extra options and quit

This game is a little buggy, and can crash periodically.  However, it saves frequently so you rarely lose more than a single move.  Could use some more maps or the ability to submit custom maps.  Otherwise, very addictive and fun!
I can't add friends.  I am on a galaxy s4.
One of my favorite games!
Fixed the problem I was having and now I greatly enjoy the game again.

This app is a no brain buy because I have spent the last 5 hours glued to the campaign mode in the expansion. I havn't tried the board game version but I will definitely buy the classic mode after trying out the app. One dilemma is that the ai gets progressively more difficult. Sometimes it seems like all the ai characters are ganging up on you, as they don't attack each other nearly as often. Otherwise, great fun.

This is a good, long form, challenging game.  Lots of great strategy and paths to victory. I was irked that expansions cost extra but its $3 so I'm not gonna cry.  Got the Cities and Knights expansion and was frustrated at first, but a couple games and reading parts of the rules more carefully & I love it.  The people complaining about "cheating" dice rolls are probably the same who "can't believe!" my luck on the board game.  Can't wait to dog my friends next board game

I accidentally uninstalled the game. When I re-installed I ended up with a few issues. I emailed them. In less then 24hours they responded with a solution. The quick response and the fact that this is a great game I never get bored with makes me a happy camper.
Updated. Gave this game another chance and it is still terrible. Rigged dice odds and cheating AI. Resources are impossible to come by and the AI will never trade with you.
I've been a fan of the board game for decades, and this version for a year, now it keeps asking me to repurchase the game and expansions. Go to hell, united soft media.

I play the settlers of Catan board game, regularly and am fully aware of "random" dice rolls and how rng, should work. When playing this game it is impossible not to get frustrated with how the computer has an unfair advantage due to the programming of, supposed, balance. Please correct the bias for computer dice bonuses and I will correct my rating.

Great game to play.  The UI could be better (why not be able to tap a house to upgrade, for instance?).  One problem - I am trying to play online in a private game, and when I click "Invite Buddy" I just get a blank screen.  This happens from either device (my TF201 or my son's Nexus 7), so we have no way to play against each other.
I bought an expansion and randomly it stopped working

I love this game and playing with the expansions but after an update the game is now telling me I have to purchase these expansions again.  I feel like re-purchasing expansions I have already bought is ridiculous and once you've bought them they should always be available to you, no matter what.  One shouldn't have to re-buy after an update nor should they have to pay again if they add the game on a different device.
Nice interface, works well but a bit too expensive
Awesome game!! :)
$4 for a buggy map,  more maps and expansions cost extra. Lame

I enjoy Catan, a lot. So, this is disappointing having to leave such a bad review. Multi-player is very slow and often FC; the Options Button is inaccessible when in the Playing Board (hidden by the soft System Buttons); and, you have to buy expansion packs on top of the cost to really enjoy it.

Playing on my Nexus 5, the game routinely freezes, and once every couple weeks loses any saved progress, settings, or even the fact that I've paid for the expansions. It's fun when the game works, but that doesn't always happen.

2 things: When it's my turn to roll it doesn't give me my turn but acts as if it did. So I don't actually get to roll, I just have to make a decision to build, trade, buy a card, or let the next person go, with never getting to roll. I just played it against computer and got robbed 5 TIMES IN A ROW. I mean really? I paid too much for this game for that to happen! Fix please and I'll be happy to give 5 stars, thanks.
FYI, I cannot continue my cities and knights campaign games. My only option is to create a new scenario of whichever I'm on. Very frustrating.

Good luck finishing an the online game. I don't know if its an issue with the app or the online servers but I find it incredibly frustrating waiting for other players to take their turn because sometimes it never happens.  Then that player gets replaced with an artificial intelligence, which means that you could have just started playing against the a from the start and finish the game.
Got both expansions, but the game freezes constantly! Usually right when I'm about to win against the CPU too, and in knights that's an hour plus commitment to just lose from a bug.
Classic  game and alot of fun. Maybe some new big maps would be good ?

When playing against AI, every player places the robber on your hex every single time, regardless of who is in the lead. I've had trades glitch out, where I didn't receive the agreed upon resource even though I lost one in the "exchange." I've had an AI player win a seafarers game with only 10 VPs, even though I had 11 and we were playing to 13! Fun, but completely buggy.
Love the game but can't finish half the time because it glitches and shuts down. Very annoying! Hope they fix soon.
I can confirm that the wedding card is broken on the new update also you can move unlimited ships each turn. Has anyone managed to find opponents online yet?
Game errors out for me on Samsung note 3 when attempting to trade.
Can't wait for the update to play the expansions online
it's a good game if i cant find time or friend to play the board game. unfortunately, seems there's a bug when i tried to move the robber.
Love this game and the app.
They need some more scenarios for the C&K expansion.
Yapanın, bulduranın elleri dert görmesin. Beş pek iyi aferin, teşekkür ederim.

Only complaint/wish is that it had a turn-based online multi-player option. It would be similar to Words With Friends in that you get a notification when it is your turn or there is a trade offer and then you respond and another notification goes out and so on... It's not often I have time to sit for a full game, so this would be an option for anyone like me.
I'm pretty much a catan addict. This is my fix.
A game which works beautifully when not online fails miserably when playing online.  Crashes midgame, resets game settings to default and generally loses connection.  Is a real shame.
A fun to play version of b the now classic game. Replay value is incredible
The newest patch locked the campaign and expansions which I had previously unlocked. Now fixed! Yay! Am greatly enjoying the app.
No tutorial and a bunch of locked content in a paid download. No thanks.
Crashed during online play, no way to rejoin game that I can find. Solo its ok but would like to play against other people
Awesome game. The campaign is fun, but too short.

I love Catan. Its my favourite game and I loved this app when I first purchased it. I decided to purchase the sea farers expansion and it was great. Then an update was pushed through and in the past 2 months I have lost my purchase of sea farers once and had my campaign reset 4 times (having lost over 20 levels of game play) It's very frustrating.
Minus: no real dice randomness, as a replay of a scenario triggers almost same dices
I tried to download and is said It could not find memory or usb. I can't get my money back also.
It stays true to the board game and has great random maps and the campaign is cool too. (I just wish games like these weren't so thirsty on my phone's battery)
You can't save the game when playing in Cities and Knights campaign mode. I like to play at my leisure and its impossible without this fix.
Great way to spend an hour or two.
God game
Challenging, but Cities & Knights expansion has few bugs. Play is great.
Game would be more fun if it worked better. Crashes alot and doesn't always save progress..
Previously this would not run and would Lock on Samsung tablet 10.1. Just related it on a whim and it works. Very good game. Fun AI.

Worked fine until the update. Now it resets everything every time I go back into it and I have to redo settings, opponents, etc. So annoying I'm rarely playing it anymore. Samsung S4 btw. Edit; it's now freezing mid game and erasing the entire game. Time to uninstall.
After installed I came to the main menu. Campaign mode is locked out until you spend more money. It feels dishonest and it feels like the developer is ripping people off.

If your battery runs out you lose your save game. The other plays pick on the human player which makes the game boring. Even if you are down by a couple points the robber only steals from you. Overall disappointment from this app.

The problem I find is the AI mobs the player. I played one game where I did not make a single round without the thief hitting me result being at the bottom of the ranking. It makes the game overly difficult to play to give an idea, I have played where 9 7s week thrown by AI in succession, and no resources received for 12 rounds. Fix the math guys. Updated. Just played a game were the game rolled 20 5's in succession, rob user on 8 or 6 then roll the number succesivly. The randomisation engine is crap. Dont pay good money for this one.
I bought cities and knights but cannot create a custom match online

I've started counting rolls in this game just to see if my suspicions are correct.  In one game I had settlements on locations with 5, 8, and 9. The AI's had 6, 5, 10 and a few others.  8 was rolled 4 times, 3 of those right after the AI moved the robber on my 8. 6 was rolled 23 times. 9 was rolled three times. 5 was rolled 11 times. 10 was rolled 14 times. 7 was rolled 11 times, only once by me.  Other games showed similar results. Pointless to play like this.

The AI in this game is poor. That's not to say they make bad choices, but rather they are supplemented by a unanimous agreement to focus on the human player. If a 7 is rolled, you can be confident that it will be placed on your hex even if you are not the strongest player and it is not the best location.  I should have been wary, given that it asks for a microtransaction payment for an option on the main menu. Do yourself a favour and buy Ticket to Ride instead, which is much more balanced and well produced.
Nice game but expensive
Same numbers thrown over and over, the chances of that happening are astronomical.
It perfectly matches the board game. I love catan and this makes the set up and clean up much easier. The campaigns are really sweet too. It gives you a ton of unique maps.
Game play is good. Slightly frustrating that game never saves on knights / cities campaign mode.
I've been hooked for the last 3.5 years

For being an avid catan addict this app has gotten me my fix more than a few times. No clean up, no pieces laying everywhere. A bit expensive to get all the expansions and I've had a slight bit of trouble getting the expansions to activate after buying them But over all if your looking to get some good games of catan in this is the app for you. The AI could use a bit of work as lately I haven't. lost a game.but it's great practice for your home games.
Game will not open. Crashes every single time. I've had this app since it's initial release, and haven't had this problem. Return Catan to it's formal glory.

I love the game, the in-app statistics are a nice plus, but the multiplayer aspect of it lacks significantly. A free version should be available for simply player vs computer play. The paid version should be an upgrade to allow the user to link to social media and challenge friends (which would be free advertising for you guys) and people can enjoy a turnbased multiplayer game with push notifications. Want extra money? In app purchases could be for coins to spend on skins & choice of turn in the beginning.
I'm so excited for the online part and have already played over wifi with a friend. It's everything I've waited for! I play it on my Nook tablet & it works great once you get it going!
The game apparently has a hard time calculating longest road when there are both ships and roads combined.
I have enjoyed this game for several years in various formats. I am now disappointed with the latest upgrade. Text boxes are too small to read.
Good matchmaking system and server response time the only problem I have with the app is that the variable map generator is flawed leading to a lot of uncompetitive games.

Love most of it, but I find it difficult to play because red and green are identical for colorblind people. Would rate 5 stars if you added the option to change some colors even to like black or white.
Awesome version mini

I've played this game for years,  both the board game and on my phones.  Both iphones and droids.  I've now come back to droid,  downloaded and what?  The changes suck.  It's so unenjoyable and frustrating that I can't bother to play anymore.  I used to start energy single day with a game.  I'm done and you ruined it for me.  Not to mention that I've already paid for all the expansions multiple times.   So frustrated.  Screw you and good bye.
After getting $4 c&k expansion, game crashes. I didn't pay $8 total for a game to start crashing..
As other have stated, the AI will team up on you regardless of who id winning and roll constant 7s and their own numbers.
Really good game. Encountered no glitches yet. And I haven't been forced to buy the expansions... yet.

Pretty greedy to charge for the app and then reveal that its only a demo.  Love Catan and seafarers; gameplay is good but AI tends to pick on you with the knight regardless of which other players might be winning.  Makes it challenging at least.  Also, the game is a bit buggy at times.
Crashes. Freezes. Causes my camera to crash forcing me to reboot my phone (xperia z2) and even worse for the $4 paid you don't even get all the levels
For a paid game it's terrible. Doesn't really fit a 4.7 inch screen, distribution of resources takes annoyingly long and worst of all paying for a demo version is really a ripoff
I love the board game, but we can't always get enough people together to play. Having this is a great way to still get my fix! ;)
Never lets me down! Love this game!

$4 for a good game is reasonable but this pays for a demo version and you have to pay and additional $4 for each "expansion pack" to make it useful. It is buggy and the multi player system is poor. After this 20mb download there is another 60mb download before you can play from a server that is apparently on dialup. The whole thing feels very greedy.

This game has so many bugs, to the extent where I can't even play. The trade window glitches out, and sometimes the dice don't get thrown and the game is stuck.  Also, can't refund my money for this half-assed app.  :(

I purchased this a while ago then got a new phone it was not showing up on my list of items so I did what the faq  said and repurchased and it recharged me. Also the cities and knight wont go past scenario 4 I keep beating it over and over.
Thank you for putting this board game app on Android.

EVERYTHING is locked except 1 level. You pay $4 for a trial and then have to pay to unlock any map except the first one. Campaign mode also requires pay. At $3.99 the developer has already made $399,000 off this app and still tries to rip everyone off.
Works perfectly fine on samsung galaxy s5. Add more campaigns with harder difficulty level !
But the app is poor and slow for multiplayer on the same screen.
Loved the board game and this version does not disappoint.
If you love the board game then this will keep you occupied.

The latest update fixes a few bugs and it no longer crashes. If you reach 13 while it is not your turn (because you have the most Knights when the barbarians land) the game hangs when it gets to your turn, and you have to kill it. The dice rolls statistically work out right, but it gets amazing how often the rolled number is yours with the robber on it.
Fun alternative to the board game when you are out and about.
Lovely board game brought to life on the small screen! Was so good I bought the board game.

I was kinda hoping to play Catan, but upon opening the app it takes me to a background of wood... and that's it. No buttons pop up until I randomly tap around, then I found something I had to register for (presumably online play) but I couldn't even do that because it said my username/ e-mail was taken. I tried changing the username to random numbers and characters and that didn't work. So I tried the "Forgot Password" button and entered my e-mail, but it said invalid data. Kyocera Hydro using Jellybean OS.
What the hell is going on with the battery life? It is just ridiculous. Playing this on a regular new tablet and battery drops to 0 within minutes.

Updated: In the latest version the AI uses the robber in a much smarter way.  It target one of the front runners.  Also the dice feel much more random now. I no longer get the dice against me constantly like before.  It does happen sometimes, but it also happens in my favor too.  Feels random now.  Also added network games support.  Good update!  Raised to 5 stars, I am happy.  Settlers is a great game but the AI in the Android version must be improved.  I always get the robber even if you are not in first place.  Why?  You should add a difficulty selection or something so I can set whether the AI is playing to win or playing to make sure I lose.   Or at least make the AI make sense.  Also, I cannot prove it but it really seems like the dice favor what the AI has over me.  I have played many games and I have never had a "lucky" game where the dice tend to favor me but I have had many "unlucky" games where I go the hold game with only a couple rolls on my 6 or 8 space.
Please refund
Not worth the money. Unless you buy the expansion pack, you can only play online or against the worst AI in any android game.
Works well!  Painfully addictive. Haven't noticed any of the issues mentioned in other reviews. Works on my Note 3 and Tab 3.
Great game
The game no longer keeps my player name if I'm playing single player.
Fantastic strategy gem and a good conversion of the board game.
The most recent update won't allow campaign play past senerio 4 in knights and cities. The game also randomly shuts my phone off. Other than that it's an excellent game.
Good for practicing. Not much fun for playing against people.
Holy robber

I really loved this game, both on my phone and on my tablet, but since the update the font size and graphics on my tablet are way too small.  The game really needs to give you the option of a preferred font/graphic size.
The AI is irritating,  but it's a great game.
The electric version is great too.  No need to set up the board and pieces or even socialize with your lame friends that want to play Monopoly instead.
Fixed.
I love this board game. I hate this app. The in app dice are rigged against you..nothing to do with actual odds..game devs screw you. Takes all of the fun out of it when devs cheat. Uninstalled.
Computer opponents aren't very good.   Never lose to them.
Very replayable
Now has online support. That goes a long way!

This is fun and well designed. Plays significantly faster than the pc version. But...  The action menu button is right beside my home button so I exit accidently often. If you let me rotate my screen I'll gladly add the 5th star.

I had unlocked the entire campaign and paid for 2 add ons. Then I didn't play for several months and when I returned, there's a new update...And now campaign mode is locked!! Not only is all my progress gone, but they expect me to pay them MORE to unlock it again and replay through all my progress! No thank you. I love this game but that was a pretty despicable move.
Good game - online play poor
replyContent: Hi Samuel, your InApp purchaes are linked to your Google Play account. If you use the same account you initially bought the expansions on, you can click on Buy again to re-activate them. You'll not be billed twice!

content: This seems shelled out quickly. I have family I would like to play with. To link to them via network hasn't happened yet because it won't search for them. Connecting to friends is difficult to do. please make this feature easier to operate. This was the only piece of the app that sold me on buying it. Hope to see an update tip help fix the issues! Thank you.
Avoid it.   Hate the new May 2014update!  Everything so tiny that you can barely see it and often tap wrong thing.

Since I bought this game my phone has been randomly shutting off. I can be in a game online or against the computer and it shuts off and reboots my phone. Dice rolls are also not done properly. Otherwise gameplay is fairly easy to use
Great game but needing to buy IAP to make it actually functional is a bit of a ripoff

I had heard of this game and downloaded it for the first time and wanted to learn how to play so I bought this app. I can tell it's a fun game but the AI constantly roll their numbers over and over again and before I know it they have bookoos of resources and are trading on 4:1 twice in a turn when I'm struggling to even build a road. I have played 10-15 games in the last two days and I've yet to win and only came close once. I've checked dice odds to maximize my chances but it makes no difference.
Amazing game, love that even if the app crashes it can recover the online game. Needs to be polished and battery draining problems need to be fixed.
Great game, good interface.

Edit on 5/21/14  Since writing my original review, USM has pushed an update to Catan.  And I'm glad to see that the update makes the game work on tablets.  Along with appropriate graphics, the menu has changed from the circular "ChronoTrigger"-esque style to a much more functional side menu.  Now the game lives up to the price I paid for it.  Well done!  Original Review: I was recently introduced to Settlers of Catan - and I was looking forward to honing my skills at the game with my Acer A500 Tablet.  It worked once - the first time I downloaded it and installed it.  Now, it loads to the menu screen, and no matter what I press, it completely resets my tablet.  Completely unacceptable.  What I don't understand is how it ran perfectly fine ONCE, then it didn't.  Fix the app USM - there are lots of Android users out there that WANT this game to work.

I wish I could play a custom game of Cities and Knights with up to 6 players, sadly I can't on the current version, or for that matter Traders and Barbarians. Could be better at explaining various concept.
Just what you would expect.
Bought both expantions  Wouldnt let me play past level 1 on both campaigns. Now is saying i need to pay for both of them again ?? What the f**k

Update: newest version works great!     I love Settlers of Catania and was excited to play this version. On my Droid RAZR, it worked fine. However, I moved it to my Xoom and now the game always crashes at startup once I select a mode (campaign or custom). The tablet is unrecoverable and either reboots automatically or I have to reboot it manually. I'm excited for when it works right, but may be moving it back to the small screen soon.
Thanks for updating with multilayer! !

Catan is one of my all time favorite boardgames. And I was delighted when it came out for my smartphone. The wait was long but finally, today, the C&K expansion came out. Another star can be gained if the AI is improved.  -Edit- so, the bugs have been fixed. 2 Extra stars. I will also add a star if remote multiplayer is added. - Edit - as promised, an extra star for multiplayer. The last star can be gained if the AI gets better.

So far in multi Ive been disconnected from half my games, reconnected once and had my dev card given to another player and been kicked for idling when it was never my turn.  Its totally borked.  Also didnt get credit for at least one game win.  How do you actually +1 a buddy?  AI trades 3 to 1 too easily.
Awesome game and steadily improving the quirks and faults of game play and crashes. Would give 5 stars if not for those.

This game has become unplayable, the randomized dice rolls need looked into I have played many of boards and the same numbers roll 5 to 9 times in a row, not to mention 7's constantly being rolled by the NPC. When the NPC roll a 7 or have a Knight card they all team up against you no matter if you are winning or losing, even if you have no cards the all place the robber on you. Also if they roll a 7 they rob you then they use a knight and Rob you. Then guess what next NPC turn, they roll a 7 they rob you

Bottom line -- it works but is a little clunky. It's hard on a phone to see detail and especially hard to see colors of the other players, especially yellow settlements and to differentiate between blue and green when they are near each other. It's hard to initially learn the digital interface and how it works.

Love the game and the implementation, however would love to play it as more of a board game, want to leave the tablet in the table sit round it and only show cards as and when we want them, would bring the social aspect back to the digital version
The new update rearranged the resources at the bottom of the screen and wiped all the previous data. Terrible!!! Please fix. I used App Monster to go back to the old version.

Introduction of multilayer is great. But still needs a lot of work e.g. chat (in a game and while waiting for players), giving moderator more power e.g. able kick people taking too long, and better way of handling when Internet connection is lost (most people use their phone network so this happens a lot) e.g. replace left player with AI but if player comes back again they can choose to resume their game & take over the AI again do the game doesn't stop. Also introduce nudges & time limits for turns.
I play online with friends and kill so much time with game.  Just a easier version of the board game and i love it! Definitely worth the $3.99
Great game for many ages.
I have the board game and it's so much fun and having it on my phone to play whenever is fantastic
Too many crashes

I payed for this app then payed to buy all the expansions. I played all the expansions for a couple days and now they are locked and I have to buy them all again. I payed $11 to get the expansions taken away. Seriously lame...
I enjoy playing,  but get frustrated when I go to buy a development card  and the game freezes and closes me out. Otherwise I enjoy it!

I'm not saying I don't enjoy a challenge, but the dice rolls do seem unnaturally stacked against you, especially when you're waiting for a certain number to come up for round after round, and then the moment they move the robber onto that hex, it comes up. Otherwise, great game, v addictive.

Until the newest update messed it all up. Now the campaign mode is locked, even though I had bought all the updates and my place is destroyed and lost!WTF!?! Nexus 7 Google Android kitkat. Now it's unlocked but I still lost everything.
New update doesn't allow me to progress through the campaign. Only allows first level to be played even though I have bought every add-on. DROID RAZR HD
It would be better if new maps were added now and again for people who have paid for the game.

Do you want to retry it?" Therefore, I can no longer play Catan on my tablet. Please help and/or fix it! This is ridiculous. I have rebooted and reinstalled several times, to no avail.
I loved it before. Now it's really buggy and causes my phone to freeze. Also, no saving?

Since this update, my battery drains without me playing or Evenki being online. I have played the campaign, but you can't get past seafarers island 1. Even after you win, you start over. Way to push out a horrible update! Morons
Frustrated that after the upgrade I can't go past Scenario 3 on Campaigns no matter how many times I win! I loved this game before...the upgrade was a mess.
Game cheats hard. Multiplayer needs to be done through Google's play game services. Can't pause an online game, HAVE to finish it in one whole sitting.
This game is so addictive, I love that I can also play against friends>

Luvin it
Love this game and the online feature is a great idea. Keep up the good work.

Ive lost my expansions will change when i get them back thank you
Love the game.  It's a well done and faithful recreation of the board game.  I don't even mind  paying for the expansions.
When playing,  the text and graphics are too small. They were a much better size before the update.  Multiplayer and other additions are good though.
4.04 has improved match making and seems to have fixed the unwinnable game bug. Just keeps getting better. Thanks for the work you've put into this!
All time favorite
The trading UI is still a bit clunky and it's missing online gaming.

One crappy player screws it up for everyone. The following are necessary for the online mode to become playable:  - time limit for turns: pass the turn on time or drop out of the game. - computer replaces dropped players.  That is without even mentioning the option to chat, add friends, or a ranking system... which are basics as well.  Also, computer players are too easy to win. You need to add some better players to choose from.
Great game but after the online play update it has become completely frustrating. Uninstalling itself constantly. Tried contacting the developers via email and no response.
replyContent: Hi Aidan, our support team already responded to your mail. Please check your spam folder, one does not always notice it there!

content: I'd love to see support for more of the add ons.  However,  the game plays solidly on my Atrix HD and is very fun.  The online portion is pretty good, but we encountered some synchronization bugs.  Closing the app and quickly getting back in solved those.  This update did cause me to lose all my campaign progress, but it doesn't take long to regain that.
Since the multi-player online update this app has been slaying my battery. Even though I haven't played the app at all it shows over 3 hours of cpu usage. What gives?

Some issues: - No chat option. Smiles don't help. - Gamers take too long between actions.        - Consider option to allow the others to terminate turn after a certain amount of time.        - Consider capturing average time per turn. Than create a cumulative record that will be visible to all users on the start game screen.
Why does it use the 3D graphics. This game drains my phone battery because of it. Make a 2D mode so I save battery and you'd get 5 stars.
Added multiplayer. Perfect.

I'll just add the ones I find here: 1. Game crashed (during normal play, I could not determine what caused it) 2. When AI filled a lost player, the AI did not do anything 3. When resuming a game, there is no limit on how long it waits for a player to return (as long as they're connected) 4. When trading takes too long, it targets the one who initiated the trade rather than the one not responding. Remarks -  After playing enough games, I'll forward this to USM. So far I have attempted 3 games and completed one, against AI after everyone left/was kicked :( Mark this review as helpful if any of these problems happened to you.
Up the zooming sensetivity and ill give 5 stars

But on the online multiplayer. When your kicking someone's butt, they just drop out, or kick you. Thats BS. I'm so sick at this game its unreal. I was playin greater catan, and i was at 18, and the orher two people were 5, and 3, in a game to 21. And i got booted. Wth

The game does not download the additional data required for the game to run (after installation). It says that the game can't detect the WiFi connection. Running on a Samsung Galaxy Tab 3.  UPDATE: Disabling airplane mode fixes the issue. Good support from the company.
where is the in app store?
Awesome!
replyContent: Hi Joshua, please contact our support team at android@usm.de and provide details on your device. We'll be happy to help.

content: The multi-player mode is a great addition.  With the tablet the trading window is too small.  Please scale larger with the view port.

replyContent:
Hi Joe,
we published the update in a staged rollout phase. Therefore 50% of users received the update prior to other users.
You should be able to update to the current version right now. If you have further questions, please contact our support team: android@usm.de. Thank you for your patience!

content: Need to be able to save/resume campaign. Other than that great game.

replyContent:
Hi André,
the multiplayer update is currently in a staged-rollout-phase, meaning that the percentage of users receiving
the multiplayer option will be steadily increased. Right now about 50% of users are playing online, and we will
be at 100% shortly.

Thank you for your patience!

Best Regards,
USM

Great app - bugs with v4 seem to be fixed, and all is good to go. Kudos to the development team - they rolled out a buggy update, heard the feedback, and fixed the problem. always nice when that happens.

content: Hi, didn't know where to ask about this but I bought all the expansions before the update, now it has reset all my campaigns I had completed and it's telling me I need to buy the expansions again :( My stats are still on there, but otherwise it thinks I've just bought the app
Great strategy game
Used to work fine, then crashed and froze so I thought I'd try a clean install. Doesn't install anymore on my Samsung galaxy 3.
Great time killer when there's no one around to play against and to play with others.
Thanks for adding online multiplayer! This is EXACTLY what the game was missing and it is now perfect!

The graphics are great the play is smooth but online needs to be worked on, especially before you launch Cities and Knights. There are some games where I have won and the game keeps on playing until 15 victory points. Or even I'll win and have 13 victory points and the other player gets to 10 or 11 and wins. I haven't had the up end of that deal yet haha. Also if there was a way to show how many people are online while your waiting for a game would be nice. Anyway just some advice.
Since the update, the quick match online playing crashes every time.  I've sent reports and hopefully this and the lag time between players' turns will be fixed soon.
I bought this game without hesitation because I also bought the iPhone version,  resources, setup, etc.). It did have some issues here but they are fixed now! Excellent!
Some glitches. Doesn't explain scores. Doesn't unlock all games when you purchase the expansion packs.

Now when you win in C&K by gaining a victory point the game freezes on the AI's turn, it has done this every time and you have to abandon the game. Also the robber is only allowed to be placed on certain tiles in 'normal' mode.

Love game, but multiplayer needs some fixes.  The battery life is terrible on multiplayer for a samsung galaxy s4 and tablet 10.1 2014.  Should be a count up clock going when it's your turn to respond to your turn or trades.  People tend not to notice when it's their turn.  You should be able to see graphs when it's not your turn.  A chat option would be nice.  An option on tablets to run two multiplayer games would be awesome.  A list of joinable games would work as there's too many idlers in some games or a way to vote kick people in a quick match.   A taskbar notification on a starting game or your turn would be nice for those who start doing other stuff while waiting.
Love the board game, and the app is just as nice. Good work!

The game is great (how could it not be?) and fairly priced. The AI opponents seem reasonable. Unfortunately it seems to drain the battery something silly, and I'm not sure why it should since it's obviously not a resource intensive game.
It's fun

People have mentioned the update crashing the app and the multi-player being too slow.  I have seen another problem with the update. The bots are now making very poor decisions, even on hard mode. They are choosing very low resource-producing hexes at the start of the game. They used to be very strong competitors and fun to play against, but now they are terrible. The update ruined this app completely.
Game is awesome, but each addon costs so much...:'( Reduce cost at least to 2.5-3 $, it will give you more money...
On a mobile device. Need I say more?
Zaps battery life, and also a bit annoying that you have to manually close the app after you exit.

Thoroughly enjoyed the game before the update, but now the context screens have a strange background that was clearly not meant to be there (looks like old Windows 2000 screens when they froze and you'd see a bunch of horizontal lines). I'm sure its just a bug with the update, and will be fixed soon, but I wouldn't suggest buying this app until you know they have been fixed. When it works, it is a blast. I'll five 5 stars when it is fixed.
replyContent: Hi Aaron, we'd appreciate if you could provide a screenshot and some details on your device to our support team at android@usm.de. We tested on the device you're using, too, and haven't had any issues like that. Thank you!

content: Multiplayer online is inexplicably slow, virtually impossible to play as a result.

Package file not signed correctly...Will not install on my galaxy s2. It finally installed then crashed and disappeared after restart phone. Will not reinstall. EDIT: Installed and working for a few weeks...good game. Better in person though...marked up...then installed update and more  crashes

Please add Play Games support. Especially for Multiplayer!!! Also remove the dreaded menu button
Now with Multi player,  it only gets better!
Have yet to complete a game as it frequently freezes forcing me to hard reset my tablet. Not impressed!
Dice consistently defy the odds in the computer players favor. Not fun. Ruins an otherwise good game.

Which is really weird, you don't get to see other peoples cards in the real game, and if I pass the tablet after my turn to the next player they can still see my hand... Needs to refresh and clear faster.  Graphics are simple so its strange they are not on top of the game play. Comes across as a cheaply produced app with a top dollar price tag! As in real catan you have to pay to play the variations (seafarers etc) but if you like catan enough you'll put up with it. This could be so much better.
Love this game when it works. It reboots my phone after pkaying for more then 10 minutes.  All the time. Will give it 5 stars when it works.  Mad I paid money for a game that doesnt work
replyContent: We are sorry that you are experiencing problems with Catan. You can help us solving this issue if you contact our support team at android@usm.de and provide detailled information about the situation at which the crash occured, e.g. does the reboot occur randomly or at a specific situation e.g. a computer player's turn etc.?

I still love this game, and appreciate the multiplayer, but am I crazy or are the AI characters way less aggressive than they used to be?  I feel like before, Knight cards or rolled 7s would have the players attack me as long as I was in the lead, even if I only had 3 points. Cool as original boardgame! It's wonderful implementation. Don't believe people who are not smart enough to figure out why all over sudden they are pressed so hard by AI.
Internet multiplayer!!! I love you!
Omg it's catan on my phone. Just wish the expansions weren't extra money.
Every time I play the campaign for cities and knights its stops at 4, is there only four campaigns for the expansion. Is there any option to play online if so how do I access it?

I played this game daily, and I was giving the update time to fix the many bugs. When the game doesn't crash and necessitate an uninstall/reinstall (which is every two days) there are major flaws with the new game. The wedding card is completely useless, I play it and I receive ZERO resources yet when the AI plays it I have to comply. The menu on the right side blocks the green and yellow players in C&K, and it needs an enlarge/minimize option.  Three months ago I would have rated this 5 stars but with these issues one star is generous.
Have played this game more than any other, but after updating it stops working at random times , dumps all my progress and has to be reloaded.  Samsung Note 2, with latest Android version.

Brilliant. Thought there were few bugs recognising bought expansions but in a while it picks them up. Very true to original tactics, has longevity of interest and variation. In scenarios maps are not static which is great for interest, variation, novelty and diverse thinking. Great stuff!

I hate that it won't let you set the orientation to the opposite side because it won't display on the correct side for those using cases made by Google for their nexus series tablets. Little lack of foresight, but otherwise an excellent app.
I hope the developer of this game take us seriously as this is serious fault when an app cant even load up!!!
5/5 for the game. 4/5 for the app as it crashes a lot. It seams like it cannot get all the calculations right and it goes crazy sometimes becoming unplayable.
The reviews describing online play are fake. There is none,  and I just blew $4 to find that out.

Play store would only let me install v3 on my Galaxy Tab 3. Graphic fails almost everytime you switch to a different app. When you come back to the game 1/3 of the screen goes black. You have to force close the app to reset it!  Games will also hang for no apparent reason in the same spot so even when you restart the app and return to continue the game it will hang if you try to repeat the same action.   I will say that the save function is a major saving grace. You can resume from exactly where you were.

Knights, cities and settlements block the cursor. I have trouble moving the robber, and can'tbuild roads or ships in lines 'above' knights. Not acceptable for a paid app. Also, can't play 2 player?! Why not?

After the update to 4.0 the game has become extremely glitchy!   There seems to be a problem with the dice rolling. The dice rolls during AND after turns, stacking up. This results in an unpredictable game state, where I once ended up playing as one of the computer controlled players.  It has become unplayable. Running on cyanogenmod, S3. Very unfortunate for a game I've payed good money for.
Like the board game. Very good, very addictive.

Nice game, greatly enjoyed it but the fact that the packs are so expensive is not something I realised before buying.   Why would you charge so much for expansion packs on a mobile game? I don't know about other users but unfortunately in my case that means no repeat business
It's got everything you need to play Catan.
Playing with 3 AI, the wedding card doesn't cause resources to flow to me? Pls fix thanks
It's Catan! If you like the game then you know what you're getting lol.
I almost finished a C&K game when it randomly crashed and now it doesn't open.
Why did all of my expansion packs disappear with this upgrade? I should NOT have to buy them all over again!
replyContent: Hi Clinton, your InApp purchases are linked to your Google account after purchasing. Sometimes they are not properly refreshed after updating or re-installing an app. You can select buy again and they expansions should be unlocked again and you will not be billed twice as long as you are using the same Google Play account you made the purchase on.

content: Great game. AI pretty realistic, dice rolling probability can be a bit off, but lots of fun.

When the computer has a knight next to the pirate, He can displace the robber instead of the pirate but the player does not have this option.

Great game but some odd bugs like on long games the turn order becoming corrupted and the human player getting to control the computer player but being unable to take their turn! It even sometimes uninstalls itself without warning. Weird.

This is a very good implementation of the game and is flawless on my Galaxy Note 2.

Is good

content: Update: New update broke it for my phone now.  Very disappointing!   Previously: I'm using a Samsung galaxy tab 10''. After clicking on create game, the options disappear and the screen freezes. Please fix soon!

I'd like to chime in with the miniscule font size. It bordered on unreadable. It's fixed and now it's an awesome game!

replyContent: Our QA team tested the latest update on many devices including a Nexus 4. The UI displays properly on our test devices. Could you please contact our support team at android@usm.de and provide a screenshot and details (Android version installed) on your device? Thanks for your help!

content: The app upgrades automatically, and now it wants me to pay for the expansion sets again. Unacceptable that you can't get something that simple correct.
replyContent: Information on InApp purchases is linked to your Google Play account. You'll never have to pay again, even if you select purchase a second time on the same account. Sometimes this information is not immediately updated from Google Play when reinstalling or updating.

content: First let me say this is a great adaptation of the original.  I have been playing AI opponents for weeks, and enjoying it thoroughly.  Today I got the update that added online multiplayer support, however after trying for about an hour I have yet to find a single opponent.  Fix the matchmaking and this will be a 5 star app.
replyContent: We're using Google's staged rollout function to distribute the update. Over the next few days the update will be available for more and more users and you'll certainly be able to find opponents to play with.

content: It crashed and now it crashes every time I try to run it.   Now I probably need to clear local data to be able to play the game again :-(
Worked flawlessly for 2 days. Now it won't even open.

The computer opponents cheat very obviously. I have had no crash issues, but any time you get more than a point or 2 ahead of computer opponents, the computer will get rolls to "catch up". I have seen (many times) the computer roll a 2/3/11/12 five or six time in a row when they get behind, as long as that is a number that I am not on. Tradeoffs are important to this game because the dice are capricious tyrants, and chance will get you: human or AI if you aren't willing or able to flex your strategy. Resources in your hand never work as hard as resources spent on you dominion.  I would like to see a hotseat, LAN, or server-based multiplayer expansion too so I could play Catan with my wife w/o having to set up the board first. I'm a fan of the board game and generally think the app developers did a very good job of translating it to Android.  However, the dice rolling can be incredibly frustrating.  I've had games where a particular number (e.g., "5") was rolled twice the entire game and another number (e.g., "4") was rolled 12 times.  Guess which hex I was on?  The next game I made sure I was on the "4" hex and..."5" was rolled 12 times and "4" was rolled 3 times.    I've played the game about 20 times now (all solo against AI opponents) and experienced the same wonky dice rolling every time.  In a game of resource management, the ability to acquire resources is kind of important.  I know from playing the board game that dice can do some strange things but come on!  How about an update to provide for better randomization on the die roller?!

Will occasionally start rolling future players dice will still conducting current player's turn. Example: Mary-Ann rolls a 4.  Dice immediately roll again and get a 6.  Resources start distributing for the 4 and Mary-Ann completes her turn.  On Louis's turn, the dice roll and come up a 9.  Resources start distributing for the extra 6 from the previous turn, but get interrupted for another extra dice roll.  This time, a 7 comes up. Louis completes his turn.  On Sean's turn, the dice come up 12.  Resources start distributing for the 9.  Confused?  Yeah, me too.  Makes the game practically unplayable. Though I have never played the board game version, I picked this game up after seeing Wil Wheaton's Table Top video on You Tube covering Settlers of Catan. I bought the basic package, as well as the two expansions. While I will not go so far as to say that it was a rip-off, I do agree with many who have already stated that to have to pay almost $12 to get a complete game is a bit ridiculous. The base package should have been free or 1/2 the price it was if you were just going to charge for the expansions that make the game complete. The biggest problem I see is the overly aggressive AI, and what seems to be an obvious "screw the player" game play. Game play seems heavily skewed in favor of the computer players, and the player is left struggling just to be able to make a mark on the board. It's a good game, but the AI needs some tweaking, big time.

* All AI becomes ultra aggressive as soon as you get a one point lead. Regardless of player play style. * Trading often becomes bugged, requires you to use "do not trade this round option". * AI makes early aggressive settlement placement to block or prevent player from progressing outside first settlement. Even "mary-ann" ai players (ezmode). Based on numerous tests. * AI wouldn't matter if there were internet play against other players. This is an obvious feature that is missing.
Not being fully unlocked is annoying.  Lacks online multi player option which it really, really needs.

Would benefit from an option to set up a custom board and choice of rules rather than limiting you to preset layouts. Include that and you get five stars from me. Very stable on my phone, very buggy on my tablet, but it's more fun on the bigger screen.
Provides the joy of Catan when friends are not around. Multiplayer (network) would be nice. The only issue is it FC. CM10.1 on GS3.
Some minor bugs, lack of online multiplayer, and relatively easy AI make this Catan app a bit of a disappoint. But it's good enough to satisfy my Catan addiction on the go.

I just bought the Cities and Knights expansion and I enjoy it a lot.  There still seems to be some bugs in it.  Some of the issues I've seen.  The game I just played the computer opponent played Resource Monopoly four times in one turn.  Maybe it was just dumb luck that out of the deck of Merchant cards he pulled ALL 4 off they top, but I doubt that.  I had four Merchant cards in my hand and those were the first four cards I pulled during this game. While I understand that the same number has the same chance to come up when dice are rolled, I cried foul when the seventh 11 in a row was rolled and it was the only number I did not have a city or settlement on.  Also when the barbarians attacked, the green opponent had 1 active knight, I had 2 active knights (all were basic knights) yet I lost a city and he did not.   So if they can get these things fixed, I think this would make for a GREAT app.
Besides that its good. Fix for 5 stars

In many ways, it's a great game. The interface takes some getting used to, but you figure it out quickly.  Even with the toughest opponents, the game is too easy. I crank up the victory point required for a challenge (a nice option) just to make things interesting.  But the big problem is the glitches. I've seen other review which mention it. Basically the game becomes a runaway train and keeps rolling the dice, not allowing you to act on your turn, etc. This really needs to be fixed. Spending 30-60 minutes on a game, and being within striking distance of a victory only to have this bug kick in is a deal-breaker. If I could get a refund, I would.

Catan is a great game, and the app does it justice. I would definitely rate it five stars except for a few missing app features. One: there is no forfeit option. You only have the option to save and exit. Two: there is no way to manage saved games. You can't delete saved games that you no longer want. Three: as a novice player it would be nice to have an undo option. This way you can correct game play errors as you learn and also to correct errors as you become familiar with the apps layout.
For standard game with 12 victory point,  often crashes in the late game. You can't vontrol anymore nor win the game.  Please update and resolve the issue. I paid for this game.

I really love this game. Any avid Catan player should get it because it plays just like the board game, and if you're willing to shell out a couple extra bucks, you can get any add-on you want and that's all kinds of fun. The only reason this game isn't 5 stars is because I hate the AI. They NEVER trade with me. Seriously, I've tried offering 10 resources for 1 resource, just to see if they'd trade. And still, they refuse. It makes no sense. And yet the AI will trade with another NPC who has 9 victory points, allowing them to win the game. It's ridiculous.   On top of that, so far in every game I've played, the NPC's always, always, always steal from me. Did I mention always? It's so annoying. Even when an NPC has to place the robber on a space that affects both me AND them, they will still put it there and steal from me. Very frustrating.   But from another perspective, the bad AI system does add more difficulty to the game, and so I like that. It just sucks losing when all you need is one wood to win and no one will trade with you (no matter the offer), only to have the very next player make an immediate successful trade and win the game.  Still, all in all... Fantastic!

The AI isn't intelligent enough. Frequently AI characters do things that do not help them and which make no sense. Catan is a good port of the classic board game. My girlfriend and I play it often. Unfortunately this game has some bugs, which are very annoying. Often, the first player is not able to offer trades with other players. Sometimes man cannot apply the new position of the robber, when moved, so the game doesn't go on. And other bugs occurred. When these things are fixed, it'd be a perfect port and I'd buy extensions.
No online multilayer, minus one star.  Too much is an in app purchase, minus one star. Computer failed to win on even the first attempt. This NEEDS online multilayer to be worth anything!
